story:
The Toughest and Fastest Charging Cable You'll Ever Own... plus a Lifetime Warranty! 

Volta XL is a new fast charging USB-C cable that includes a built-in magnetic connector much like the MagSafe connector Apple removed from its MacBooks in the transition to USB-C for power.

Volta XL is mainly a charging cable and fully supports 67W USB-C power adapter charging for 15-inch MacBook Pro, 60W 13-inch MacBook Pro, HP Spectre, Windows Surface, Google Pixel XL/2 XL/ 3 XL, Galaxy s8, s9/Note 8, Note 9 or Android USB Type C devices (and more)! 

 

The VOLTA 2.0 magnetic cable is a sleek 5A charge and sync magnetic cable that's a standard USB on one end, and an open magnet on the other. (Scroll down to learn more). 

 

The MagSafe - Back and Better

A lot of Apple users raised concerns about the shocking removal of the MagSafe feature from the newer MacBooks with only USB-C ports. With the launch of Volta XL, you can expect to get this feature back. 

 

Charge Anywhere - On-The-Go  

You can now transform your phone into a battery pack with Volta XL. 

On-The-Go charging functionality allows you to share charge between your devices without the need for a charger or a power bank.

You can now safely fast charge your Nintendo Switch and other gadgets as the VOLTA XL Magnetic Cable features the 56 Ohm resistor.
 

Volta XL Compatibility Chart

Works perfectly with your MacBook Pro and ANY USB C Laptops and NoteBooks.

Apple Laptops
15" Macbook Pro
13" Macbook Pro
12" Macbook Pro
iPadPro 2018
MacBook Air
MacBook Pro 2018
 
 
USB-C Smartphones
Samsung S8/S8+/S9/S9+
Samsung Note 8, 9
Huawei P9 & P10
Pixel /Pixel  2XL/ 3XL
HTC 10
Sony Xperia X
LG Nexus 5X
Xiaomi Mi 6s
One Plus 3
e.t.c
Other USB-C Laptops
Chromebook 2
Samsung Notebook 9
HP EliteBook Folio
Huawei MateBook X
HP Spectre 13
Microsoft Surface Book
Lenovo ThinkPadHP Chromebook 13
e.t.c

 

 

Volta XL On LTT & Unbox Therapy

 

 
We have been featured over four times by Linus Tech Tips and Unbox Therapy. We have also, successfully delivered over 100,000 pieces of Volta products worldwide. We have the experience and know our onions. 
 

Volta XL Overview

 

How Magnetic Cable Work

With VOLTA, it's safe, simple, and easy to transform your existing charger into a universal charger:

1) Insert the connector tip into the port of your device(s)

2) The VOLTA XL Magnetic Charging Cable will magnetically connect when placed near the tip inside your device(s)

3) You're ready to go!

 

Snag Safe 
SnagProof  - The MagSafe is Back and Better

Like MagSafe, VOLTA XL offers an extra protection by detaching from your device instantly if you accidentally snag the cord.

 

Super Fast Charging

Don't let low battery hold you back. VOLTA XL gives you the gift of time.

 Our 4.3 Amps, 18K gold-plated copper core plug & 24 AWG copper wires, along with the Volta smart chips, guarantee a lightning-fast charge. Now you can spend less time charging your device and have more time enjoying the effectiveness that Volta XL brings you. 70% faster than 5W charging cable when charging a Nexus 6P or Google Pixel XL or similar power delivery device from 0%.

 

Toughest Cable You've Ever Owned

The most durable cable you've ever owned.

By offering a LIFETIME warranty, we make a promise that no other cable company can match and saves you $$ in the long run. No arbitrary time limit, no questions asked.

In the unlikely (apocalyptic) event that one of our cables does break, we've got your back. All VOLTA customers get a lifetime warranty. 
 

A Lifetime Guarantee

By offering a LIFETIME warranty, we save our customers an average of $90/cable a year.

 

 

 

Reversible Strong Magnet

Connect anyway and anyhow. The perfectly aligned rare Earth magnets got your back. 

Two perfectly complementary rare earth N52-Grade Neodymium ‎reversible magnets in a 360‎° orientation deliver a powerful and stable connection always.

 

Dimensions - Volta XL USB Type C 

Colours and Length

The Volta XL comes in 1.8M (default). 

 

Volta 2.0 - One Cable for ALL Your Devices

The VOLTA 2.0 magnetic cable is a sleek 5A charge and sync magnetic cable that's a standard USB on one end, and an open magnet on the other.

With the reversible Volta 2.0 magnetic cable and tips that connect - instantly - every single time, you can now use ONE cord with interchangeable connectors for both Apple, Samsung, Android or low powered USB-C devices +more!    

 


 

The Volta 2.0 comes in 1M and 2M and comes in Silver, Black, Red and Blue!


 

Note - All Volta 2.0 cables and tips will not be compatible with the VOLTA XL cables or previous model Volta cables such as the Volta Original Improved. However the Volta Original Improved Cables and Tips will work with all previous Volta Cables, Magnetic Adapter, and Tips apart from being compatible with the VOLTA XL.

 

Dimensions - Volta 2.0 Tips 

Volta 2.0 Lightning Tip

 

Volta 2.0 USB Type C Tip

 

Volta 2.0 Micro USB Tip

 

Volta XL Vs Volta 2.0 Vs Volta Original


Note - Volta XL and Volta Original (Improved) Cables and Tips are NOT compatible.

The VOLTA 2.0 cable is a sleek charge and sync cable that's a standard USB on one end, and an open magnet on the other. With our reversible magnetic cable and tips that connect - instantly - every single time, you can now use ONE cord with interchangeable connectors for both Apple, Samsung, Android or  USB-C devices +more! 

They’re perfect for fast charging all your lightning (Apple), micro USB (Android) and  USB-C devices.

The Volta fast charge ability reduces charging time for these controllers, increasing play time and simultaneously keeping the gamer as far away from the game console and monitor as possible coming in 1M & 2M cable length options.

 

Accessories 
Our accessories can be purchased on our website at www.voltacharger.com 

 

Original Volta Reviews
See What Customers Had To Say About VOLTA Original

Our VOLTA Original Magnetic Charging Cable received incredible reviews. VOLTA XL is even better.



 

Our Story & Mission 

Help The World, Not Just Our Wallet 

VOLTA isn't just about creating great and affordable products, we are about touching lives. We achieve this by donating a percentage of our earnings to health and education projects in third world nations. We are proud to say that on the 18th of May, 2018 we took our community efforts one step further by carrying out a medical outreach in Opebi, Ikeja community in South-Western Nigeria. We gave out over 200 insecticide-treated mosquito nets, tested residents of this slum community for malaria and general health, and gave out medication. We know that this does not amount to world domination but we are keen to do as much as we can within communities that have the needs.

When we first launched on Indiegogo, we pledged a portion of our earnings to rehabilitating a school in Ago-Iwoye, Nigeria. We are proud to say that not only did we renovate the school, but also we donated desks, chairs, books, and other materials to students in that school. We also took it one step further and provided full scholarships to over sixty (60) students in that school.
Check out the update section of the campaign to Learn More.

 

SKEPTICAL ABOUT INDIEGOGO?

We’ve successful crowdfunded and delivered TWICE to thousands of backers. Our production processes are fine-tuned and customer service is second-to-none. And if you still have questions, just click reply to this email and I’ll get back to you ASAP

 

Our Passionate Team

Welcome to Team Volta, we are an Australian start-up located on the beautiful Gold Coast. Our team has sacrificed up everything from jobs, houses, businesses, taste buds (2min noodle life) and even schooling degrees so that VOLTA could become a success! We were passionate about creating a company that produced products that set the standard for the industry. We refused to take shortcuts like many do in order to make a larger profit margin. Rather we focused on producing a quality product that our customers would be glad to purchase without any regrets!


Timeline 

 

Media Kit
Do you want to talk about The VOLTA XL and Volta Original? We have a prewritten article for those who wish to share something great with their viewers. Along with amazing photos, videos, and other advertising materials.

You can also EMAIL US - nadim@voltacharger.com


Follow Us

Be sure to follow us on our various social media platforms to stay updated about all things VOLTA and take part in our various competitions and constantly thriving community (click to connect)!

 

Join The Volta Insiders
To stay abreast of all that is happening at VOLTA Charger and also to receive some of the free prototypes of our upcoming new products, kindly join other happy customers in Volta Insider Facebook group and have all your questions answered by us or other customers. 

 

FAQs

What does your LIFETIME WARRANTY include?

Simple as this, if the item(s) breaks and no longer function how they should, all you need to do is contact us at care@voltacharger.com and pay the reshipping fee of AUD$9.00 required for the product(s). The only time you won't need to pay for the reshipping fee is if you received a faulty or broken item upon delivery. Example: The item did not work as advertised or an item fell apart due to factory defect in the first few days of receiving it. Otherwise all other issues or defects and faults can be claimed via our warranty, only requiring you to pay for the reshipping fee as mention above. Please take note that this warranty is only valid for items that are still being sold by VOLTA. If an item has been discontinued we are no longer able to provide warranty on that item.

How strong is the magnetic connection between The VOLTA Adapter and device?

We used the world's strongest magnetism (N52 Neodymium magnets on both the tips and adapter, providing a strong pulling force). The VOLTA Adapter was designed to be the strongest magnetic adapter on the market, so strong in fact that it can even lift your iPad without disconnecting!

RETURN/Cancellation Policy.

Returns are accepted only when the VOLTA product you have purchased is posted back to us with all its original packaging and all products must be in perfect resellable condition and working order. Refunds will be given only when the returned product has been received and checked by our team. The refund amount will be the price of the purchased items, minus shipping the fee and also a 15% deduction fee. This is due to the Indiegogo platform fee’s we are charged as a company and is also applicable to those who request a cancellation of their order. However those who cancel their order without us shipping their item out will get a full refund of their shipping fee.

What are the Shipping/Delivery time frames?

When a shipping time frame is displayed, for example: 3-10 business days. This time frame does NOT include public holidays, weekends or any time spent in customs. These factors and other various factors may affect the time frame given for all orders anywhere in the world. These are factors that are out of our hands and also the courier's hands. However generally speaking majority of orders WILL arrive in the estimated time frames given.

Where do you ship?

We ship ABSOLUTELY EVERYWHERE! We ship from our head office in Gold Coast, Australia.

How much does shipping cost?

Our standard shipping cost is just US$8.

How will my order be shipped?

All orders will be shipped with tracking number(s) and will be delivered in most cases by your local or national postal service. Orders come in a waterproof plastic satchel. If you order a large order, generally 12-15+ cables or more it will come in a cardboard box and waterproofed.

When can I make correction or change or cancel my order?

We ship Indiegogo orders roughly within 24hrs after you order but it can be much sooner. If you want to make a change please contact us at care@voltacharger.com  we can't guarantee we will be able to make the changes before we ship off your order but we will do our best

What is included in a Volta XL single pack?

A VOLTA XL single pack consists of x1 VOLTA XL magnetic cable + x1 connector tip ( USB Type C).

What is included in a VOLTA Original single pack?

A VOLTA single pack consists of x1 VOLTA Original magnetic cable + x2 connector tips (Micro USB or Lightning or Type C) and a single cable can be used interchangeably with all the 3 tips, so one VOLTA cable would power an iPhone, All Android devices, and all USB C devices.

Will VOLTA affect the charging speed of my device?

VOLTA will not alter the charging speed of any device. It can, however, handle any charging speed of any device (adapter).

Can I plug VOLTA into my computer, laptop, car charger or power bank?

Absolutely YES! The VOLTA Charger is compatible with everything that your existing USB cable is. This means The VOLTA Cable will work with all your devices that are USB compatible.

Is it easy to remove the connector tip from the device's charging port?

The connector tip will stay perfectly steady in your device's port for any general day to day usage, even if you drop your phone. You can easily remove the connector tip by using just your fingernails. If you don't have long enough fingernails, each VOLTA Magnetic Charger pack does come with a small device that enables you to pull out the tip with ease.

Does VOLTA support higher amperage and voltage charging?

Yes VOLTA supports all of the higher amperage and voltage charging. Does having a VOLTA tip in my phone negate the waterproof/resistance of my mobile device? We have tested this by putting the device in water for 30min. After taking it out the device still functioned along with the tip being fully intact. Although it's possible that water under unusual circumstance can be trapped within the tip causing corrosion never the less this shouldn't affect the device's ability to be waterproof/resistant. However after taking the device out of water be sure to thoroughly dry the tip before charging otherwise you could cause damage to your VOLTA tip!

Is the Volta XL compatible with Oneplus dash charge?
Can the VOLTA magnetic cable damage my device in the long run?

No, VOLTA magnetic Cables will never damage your phone. You have nothing to worry about!

How to buy a larger quantity?

If you are interested in making a bulk order, please contact benjamin@voltacharger.com and we will send you a quotation as soon as possible.

What is the USB Power Delivery?

One Universal Solution All devices with Power Delivery connect using a USB-C cable. Power can flow in either direction so it’s possible to share power between devices, even from your phone to a friend’s phone. USB-C connectors are small, smart, and capable of transmitting large amounts of power. You can safely use the same cable to charge your smartphone, your tablet and your laptop – no separate power brick for your laptop is required.

Is it safe?

USB-C — the connector used in USB Power Delivery is a cutting-edge technology. It has been designed hand-in-hand with Power Delivery, to handle these new high levels of power. Explore the benefits of USB-C cables at our USB-C Resource Center. Other “fast charging” products may use older connectors.

Our Terms & Conditions

By purchasing our products you are agreeing to our T&C's located here: https://voltacharger.com/pages/terms-of-service

Volta Strength

Since your devices take a lot of daily abuse; we decided to make the Volta XL extra durable. We added premium neodymium magnets to ensure instant connection, while each cable is put through the tensile test 4,000 times to make them more durable than any other cable on the market..

Universal Compatibility

As a result of the built-in intelligent recognition system, the Volta XL is able to adapt to varying voltages in different USB-C devices. Volta XL will charge your smartphone, speakers, tablets, MacBook and MacBook Pro without any compatibility issue whatsoever.

We have a prewritten article for those who wish to share something great with their viewers. Along with amazing photos, videos, and other advertising materials.You can also EMAIL US - nadim@voltacharger.comFollow UsBe sure to follow us on our various social media platforms to stay updated about all things VOLTA and take part in our various competitions and constantly thriving community (click to connect)! Join The Volta InsidersTo stay abreast of all that is happening at VOLTA Charger and also to receive some of the free prototypes of our upcoming new products, kindly join other happy customers in Volta Insider Facebook group and have all your questions answered by us or other customers.  FAQs What does your LIFETIME WARRANTY include? Simple as this, if the item(s) breaks and no longer function how they should, all you need to do is contact us at care@voltacharger.com and pay the reshipping fee of AUD$9.00 required for the product(s). The only time you won't need to pay for the reshipping fee is if you received a faulty or broken item upon delivery. Example: The item did not work as advertised or an item fell apart due to factory defect in the first few days of receiving it. Otherwise all other issues or defects and faults can be claimed via our warranty, only requiring you to pay for the reshipping fee as mention above. Please take note that this warranty is only valid for items that are still being sold by VOLTA. If an item has been discontinued we are no longer able to provide warranty on that item. How strong is the magnetic connection between The VOLTA Adapter and device? We used the world's strongest magnetism (N52 Neodymium magnets on both the tips and adapter, providing a strong pulling force). The VOLTA Adapter was designed to be the strongest magnetic adapter on the market, so strong in fact that it can even lift your iPad without disconnecting! RETURN/Cancellation Policy. Returns are accepted only when the VOLTA product you have purchased is posted back to us with all its original packaging and all products must be in perfect resellable condition and working order. Refunds will be given only when the returned product has been received and checked by our team. The refund amount will be the price of the purchased items, minus shipping the fee and also a 15% deduction fee. This is due to the Indiegogo platform fee’s we are charged as a company and is also applicable to those who request a cancellation of their order. However those who cancel their order without us shipping their item out will get a full refund of their shipping fee. What are the Shipping/Delivery time frames? When a shipping time frame is displayed, for example: 3-10 business days. This time frame does NOT include public holidays, weekends or any time spent in customs. These factors and other various factors may affect the time frame given for all orders anywhere in the world. These are factors that are out of our hands and also the courier's hands. However generally speaking majority of orders WILL arrive in the estimated time frames given. Where do you ship? We ship ABSOLUTELY EVERYWHERE! We ship from our head office in Gold Coast, Australia. How much does shipping cost? Our standard shipping cost is just US$8. How will my order be shipped? All orders will be shipped with tracking number(s) and will be delivered in most cases by your local or national postal service. Orders come in a waterproof plastic satchel. If you order a large order, generally 12-15+ cables or more it will come in a cardboard box and waterproofed. When can I make correction or change or cancel my order? We ship Indiegogo orders roughly within 24hrs after you order but it can be much sooner. If you want to make a change please contact us at care@voltacharger.com  we can't guarantee we will be able to make the changes before we ship off your order but we will do our best What is included in a Volta XL single pack? A VOLTA XL single pack consists of x1 VOLTA XL magnetic cable + x1 connector tip ( USB Type C). What is included in a VOLTA Original single pack? A VOLTA single pack consists of x1 VOLTA Original magnetic cable + x2 connector tips (Micro USB or Lightning or Type C) and a single cable can be used interchangeably with all the 3 tips, so one VOLTA cable would power an iPhone, All Android devices, and all USB C devices. Will VOLTA affect the charging speed of my device? VOLTA will not alter the charging speed of any device. It can, however, handle any charging speed of any device (adapter). Can I plug VOLTA into my computer, laptop, car charger or power bank? Absolutely YES! The VOLTA Charger is compatible with everything that your existing USB cable is. This means The VOLTA Cable will work with all your devices that are USB compatible. Is it easy to remove the connector tip from the device's charging port? The connector tip will stay perfectly steady in your device's port for any general day to day usage, even if you drop your phone. You can easily remove the connector tip by using just your fingernails. If you don't have long enough fingernails, each VOLTA Magnetic Charger pack does come with a small device that enables you to pull out the tip with ease. Does VOLTA support higher amperage and voltage charging? Yes VOLTA supports all of the higher amperage and voltage charging. Does having a VOLTA tip in my phone negate the waterproof/resistance of my mobile device? We have tested this by putting the device in water for 30min. After taking it out the device still functioned along with the tip being fully intact. Although it's possible that water under unusual circumstance can be trapped within the tip causing corrosion never the less this shouldn't affect the device's ability to be waterproof/resistant. However after taking the device out of water be sure to thoroughly dry the tip before charging otherwise you could cause damage to your VOLTA tip! Is the Volta XL compatible with Oneplus dash charge? Can the VOLTA magnetic cable damage my device in the long run? No, VOLTA magnetic Cables will never damage your phone. You have nothing to worry about! How to buy a larger quantity? If you are interested in making a bulk order, please contact benjamin@voltacharger.com and we will send you a quotation as soon as possible. What is the USB Power Delivery? One Universal Solution All devices with Power Delivery connect using a USB-C cable. Power can flow in either direction so it’s possible to share power between devices, even from your phone to a friend’s phone. USB-C connectors are small, smart, and capable of transmitting large amounts of power. You can safely use the same cable to charge your smartphone, your tablet and your laptop – no separate power brick for your laptop is required. Is it safe? USB-C — the connector used in USB Power Delivery is a cutting-edge technology. It has been designed hand-in-hand with Power Delivery, to handle these new high levels of power. Explore the benefits of USB-C cables at our USB-C Resource Center. Other “fast charging” products may use older connectors. Our Terms & Conditions By purchasing our products you are agreeing to our T&C's located here: https://voltacharger.com/pages/terms-of-service Volta Strength Since your devices take a lot of daily abuse; we decided to make the Volta XL extra durable. We added premium neodymium magnets to ensure instant connection, while each cable is put through the tensile test 4,000 times to make them more durable than any other cable on the market.. Universal Compatibility As a result of the built-in intelligent recognition system, the Volta XL is able to adapt to varying voltages in different USB-C devices. Volta XL will charge your smartphone, speakers, tablets, MacBook and MacBook Pro without any compatibility issue whatsoever.

story:
A logo is defined as a graphic representation of a company name. At Case by Case we are redefining the meaning. Our logo is an engineered representation of not only our company name, but our functionality, slogan, and company initials. 

   Through calculated and artistic ingenuity, we developed an innovative multi-award winning logo that seamlessly brands our case, while providing a multi-dimensional utility value. 

   The X serves as a ferrous metal and key lock for our magnetic accessories, while the fold out C’s serve as finger loops, kick stand, car mount, and tension locks for our most extreme action mounts. With all of this bundled in one action packed case, we are postured to provide the long awaited branding edge that the case market has been missing!

 

 

CXC is...

  • Lighter
  • Slimmer
  • Way more functional 
  • And every bit as durable!

Check out our product comparison below!

 

 

Attach yourself to Infinite Possibilities with CXC's Ultimate Attachments! Connect to rattle-free mounts, convenient daily accessories, and other attachments that make your phone case fit your lifestyle...not just your phone!


   **Most accessories and mounts are universal, therefore compatible with both iPhone and Samsung cases. 

   **Protection options and Folio Wallet will be phone specific- iPhone 6/6+, 6s/6s+, 7/7+, 8/8+, Samsung S8/S8+, Note 8**

Slim Bumper

Folio Wallet

Arm Band

Handlebar Mount

GoPro® Compatible Mount

Battery

You can choose 1 of the following: 

  • iPhone Case 
  • Samsung Case 

AND

Choose 1, 3 or 5 Attachments: 

  • Slim Bumper 
  • Folio Wallet 
  • Arm Band Mount 
  • GoPro® Compatible Mount 
  • Handlebar Mount

 

 

 

 

 

This really is the best phone case ever. We know because our specialty is not only building products but breaking them as well.  We personally take our products through the most extreme testing. We have jumped out of planes with our GoPro® Compatible Mount, broken speed limits with our Handlebar Mount, thrown our phones in the Ocean to prove we can make them float, and we will keep you guessing what's next. With our universal utility logo we are able to keep a promise to you that your accessories will stay relevant with new phone models to come.. 

Support Us: We truly will produce a quality product that will prove it's place in this extremely competitive industry. We need your pledge to bring our prototype to production.

Thank you

story:
"Safely holds all my SIM cards, 1 SD Card & an Ejector Pin. Fits in my wallet. FREE SHIPPING. All this for just 5 euros? Yes please!"

 

STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED: THE COMPLETE TRAVEL CONVENIENCE KIT

Introducing the best-in-class Memory Foam Eye Pillow for all Travellers with 5 pairs of disposable travel ear-plugs. 

  • Blackout: blocks maximum light to give you the rest you deserve, whenever you need it
  • Functional Design: specially tapered soft foam cups for each eye, including a passage for your nose
  • Smooth Fabric: gives you a calm and relaxing feeling over your eyes
  • Adjustable Band: fits all head sizes with an elastic fabric and a built-in fastening mechanism

Give your eyes some rest. Be productive when they’re open. 

Memory Foam Eye Pillow: €10

Memory Foam Eye Pillow WITH 5 pairs of disposable travel ear-plugs: €15

FREE SHIPPING AS ALWAYS

YOU SHARE, YOU EARN: The ultimate TravelPass referral program.

For every 25 euros (5 x TravelPass) pledged through your referrals, we'll give you an extra TravelPass absolutely free! It's a win-win situation! The 5 TravelPass referral can be obtained in any combination, be it 5 x 1 TravelPass referral or even 1 x 5 TravelPass referral. 

The more you share, the more you earn! Please read through the Referral Post in the "Updates" section to know more. 
 

TravelPass - the Travellers' Choice

The Ultimate Card for Cards

We travellers have all been there. 

  • 15 minutes to landing
     
  • SIM card needs to be replaced
     
  • BUT - it's nowhere to be found
     

SD and SIM cards went from the size of a credit card to being even smaller than a dime. To complicate things further, we now need a sharp pin to access the SIM tray each time we want to swap the SIM card. 
 

A Travel Essential

 
Don't get us wrong, we're loving all the innovation. Though we do end up losing those tiny nano SIMs and SD cards all the time. This problem doesn't just cost money (especially when travelling away from home), but lot's of inconvenience and miscommunication. 
 

The famous SIM card search

 
We all tuck SD and SIM cards into our wallets, cardholders and/or bags. But when we need them most, we can't ever find them. 

They can easily fall out of wallets and get in lost in big handbags. Moreover, we also forget to pack the SIM tray ejector pin and need to borrow one from someone. 

SD cards contain highly sensitive data, including personal photos, videos, and documents - losing one is not an option. Exposure to dirt can easily damage and/or corrupt your valuable personal data. 

So when travelling abroad, we end up spending an obscene amount of money on roaming until we manage to purchase a new/replacement SIM card, costing at least 10-15 euros. 

Fiddle no more. TravelPass has you covered. 
 

The Ultimate Card for Cards

TravelPass conveniently and safely stores:

  • International SIM Cards of ALL sizes (Standard, Micro, Nano)
     
  • Micro SD Card for all your media
     
  • SIM Tray Ejector Pin 
     
  • Handy Ruler ( 2 inches / 5 cm )

 

Exclusive only to backers, TravelPass comes with 3 SIM card adapters:

  • Use your Nano SIM card as a Micro SIM
     
  • Use your Nano SIM card as a Regular SIM
     
  • Use your Micro SIM card as a Regular SIM
     

Make any SIM compatible

TravelPass is a necessity we all need. 

It's a simple solution to an impending problem we all face. 

Inappropriate storage has resulted in damaged and corrupted SD cards and irrecoverable data loss. Losing SIM cards at the wrong time costs lots of money; both directly and indirectly.

 

A Travel Necessity

 
We're offering a hassle-free solution. A card that stores all your cards. Replacing a SIM card was never easier. Store all your media in multiple SD cards and never lose them.

Get TravelPass for a flat €5 including worldwide shipping. 

No additional costs. Save 75% over the expected retail price of €19.

Get your Smartphone a Passport. Get TravelPass today.

 

TravelPass fits pretty much everywhere. 

At just 1.5 mm thick, TravelPass is more than 1.6 times smaller than a credit card. 

Size: 6.25 x 4.50 x 0.15 cm / 2.46 x 1.77 x 0.06 in

Weight: 10 grams
 

Fits into any cardholder or wallet

 

FREE SHIPPING is standard with any TravelPass pledge.

STRETCH GOAL UNLOCKED: THE COMPLETE TRAVEL CONVENIENCE KIT

Introducing the best-in-class Memory Foam Eye Pillow for all Travellers with 5 pairs of disposable travel ear-plugs. 

  • Blackout: blocks maximum light to give you the rest you deserve, whenever you need it
  • Functional Design: specially tapered soft foam cups for each eye, including a passage for your nose
  • Smooth Fabric: gives you a calm and relaxing feeling over your eyes
  • Adjustable Band: fits all head sizes with an elastic fabric and a built-in fastening mechanism

Give your eyes some rest. Be productive when they’re open. 

Memory Foam Eye Pillow: €10 (free shipping)

Memory Foam Eye Pillow WITH 5 pairs of disposable travel ear-plugs: €15 (free shipping)

TravelPass is expected to hit the shelves July 2017. Our backers receive a big discount of up to 75% over the expected Retail Price of €19.

Backers are responsible for any import fees, VAT, and/or any duties their country imposes.

Once our campaign is rolling, we’ll get more certainty over potential numbers and begin the manufacturing process. We should be on track to ship TravelPass in the second week of June.

TravelPass enables seamless travel. After several months of hard effort and prototyping, we're confident TravelPass is the product for all travellers. 

TravelPass fits anywhere and holds all your cards in one place. Never lose a card again. 

With your support, we can bring TravelPass to market. We need your support to achieve our mission - to deliver an awesome product that just makes life easier.

Please help us spread the word - speak to your friends and family, share about us on Facebook, Instagram, Snapchat, Twitter, etc.

Let's collectively make this simple product a reality. TravelPass is the ultimate accessory for all travellers. 

If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email:
exudenow@gmail.com

Thank You.

All your Cards in one place

story:
A- What is Wangrin ?

Wangrin (http://www.wangrin.net) is a unique internet global fraud portal. It is a platform on which users can easily report (and share) any type of misbehavior encountered during their internet experience. In this highly connected world, where it is more and more difcult to assert the reliability, the authenticity, or the intentions of any digital identity, the portal offers to its users the possibility to do due diligence on any Phone number, Skype, Facebook, Whatsapp, Email, IP, Msn ,etc...ID/credentials.

B- Who created Wangrin ?

Wangrin is a project that was initiated by a team of experienced information technology consultants with specialties in training, technical writing, and technical support, along with ex-law enforcement officers involved in cybercrime issues.  KonanSystems is a information technology consulting company that has started its activities in 2007 in Abidjan (Côte d'Ivoire) and moved its headquarters in Praia (Cabo Verde) since January 2012. Platform development and implementation has been handled by SmartNet Technlogies, a solution provider based in Nis (Serbia). Hosting is supplied by TimInfinity of Paris (France).

C- What are our objectives?

 Provide free due diligence services to internet users

 Provide analysis about cybercrime and digital ID/credentials

 Raise awareness of cybercrime

 Promote cybersecurity

D- Why is Wangrin important?

Cybercrime continues to be a growing global concern. Both the total global direct cost of cybercrime and the average cost per victim of cybercrime are constantly on the rise. As people are now constantly connected, the lines are blurring between their personal and work lives, across multiple devices and storage solutions. Today, nearly half of the urban citizen report using their personal devices (PCs, laptops, smartphones, tablets) for work-related activities. Wangrin is an important initiative since it provides freely to any internet user the possibility to verify the digital fraud record of any credential; including to check if a Skype, Msn, Email, IP adress, or any othercredential has ever been involved in a digital crimes such as:

· Dissemination of viruses

· Denial-of-service attacks

· Dissemination of malware or malicious code

· Cyberstalking

· Fraud and identity theft

· Engagement in information warfare

· Defamation

· Phishing scams

· Spam

Learn More Here...

story:
Small, stylish wearable device that fits in your pocket. Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency.

We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.


Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.

When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. They become unusable.

Jiffy is an eco-charger that truly offers freedom and unlimited independence when it comes to charging your mobile devices and gadgets.That’s it! You are completely independent of any power supply, electric network, or wall outlet.  Jiffy is an eco-charger that has a priceless advantage both in everyday life and especially when travelling and going on new adventures even to the ends of the world.

THE IDEAL SITUATION- to maintain a last call, an emergency call when you are in a critical situation, to send a last text, or study a map with GPS in case you get lost and can’t find sources to charge your device nearby.

TOTAL ENERGY INDEPENDENCE- charge devices and gadgets at any time, any place and without taking in to consideration the weather, or temperature outside.


Imagine a scenario of being lost in the woods, in the desert, or in a jungle. Your phones battery will be assured only by Jiffy!


PRIORITY- compared to other methods of charging gadgets, Jiffy doesn’t need gas balloons with chemical reactions as other chargers. You can use it at night, in the shade, in thick forests unlike solar chargers. Jiffy also doesn’t need wind, or water currents.

IMPORTANT-No traditional electricity, no air pollution, and you don’t need to look for a power outlet. In this way you don’t need to worry about where you will charge your mobile phone, camera, Bluetooth headset, or any other devices that can be charged through USB.

Charge while on any type of transportation: train, ship, bus, or even wagon. You can rest assured and camp as much as you want, do extreme mountain sports, go hiking, or rock climbing without worrying that your camera, or smart phone will be without battery and you will remain without communication.

We all know how problematic it is to find an electrical power outlet when going on longer trips. Also we know situations when electricity shuts off at home because of powerful rain, wind, or other natural phenomena that cause damage to power grids. You will be able to access the internet, radio, or other news portals in times of danger and emergency.

Thanks to the USB attachment with LED light, Jiffy can be used as a light source. It does not need batteries and can be used at any time when there are blackouts and electricity and light are most needed. It is perfect to have a Jiffy handy in your emergency kit.

MULTI USB- the cable is perfect to charge any gadget at any time. Charge your devices and gadgets, or help a friend that needs help, but needs a different kind of cable.

How does Jiffy work? 

Jiffy represents a USB charger that mechanically produces electricity without eliminating toxic substances into the atmosphere. Electricity production is carried out by a three phase asynchronous micro generator with very high productivity, which is driven by a complex mechanical watch. With a simple movement the mechanism is charged with kinetic energy which is transmitted to the micro generators. The charging module is 5V USB that charges all the devices that support the standard USB. The intensity of electric current is up to 2200 mA and this offers a faster charge, by using the new tehnology "Quick Charge 2.0".

For the people that are less technical, Jiffy with the 2200mA can simultaneously charge 6 smart phones with 4” screens that are navigating the internet through Wi-Fi, or 4 smart phones that are navigating the internet through 3G. 

Technical info about the prototype:

Behind the micro generator is mounted a controller that has the function of continuously recovering the current and 5V voltage stabilization. Also an electrolytic capacitor which has the function of a micro accumulator is connected in the scheme to remove the current fluctuations produced by mechanical processes under the influence of kinetic energy.

Electrical scheme

We documented our work process and wanted to share with you the important steps


Thanks for making it all the way down here to meet team Jiffy!

What we intend to do after the campaign is finished?

After the Indiegogo campaign is finished we will start work on Jiffy immediately because we know that time is the biggest enemy for a start up. We know that we will encounter obstacles along the way, but we are ready to face them and if everything goes as planned we will deliver Jiffy within the timeline that we estimated. 

We hope that Jiffy is just the first of many devices that we work on. For us this is hopefully going to be a successful campaign that will turn into a small business and generate enough income to give us the possibility to work on bigger projects. It would be great to work on other projects that will bring solutions to problems like reusable energy, eco friendly energy, global warming etc. These are the problems that bother us and we hope that with your help we will be able to start attending to them.

TIMELINE


Perks

Pull it out when your other devices need saving in any emergency.We are living in the time of technology that has been developing more and faster than ever. Technology has become essential in today’s world. Our lives have become closely linked to mobile electronic devices, because they give us freedom of communication.Jiffy helps your devices when they run out of juice.When the battery runs out devices and gadgets become useless pieces of plastic and metal. story:
Email has never been this intuitive. Get through your mail quick with Dropmail, the first email client to support Chrome OS!

What is Dropmail?

Dropmail is a email client built as a chrome packaged app so it can run natively on Chrome OS, Mac, Windows, and soon both android and iOS mobile platforms.

Who are we?

My name is Marcus Ferrario and along with Ravi Jotwani and Vatsal Modgil we are Droptech LLC. We are 3 15 year old HighSchool students who want to change the world.

Why did we create Dropmail?

Email needs work. In an era where we have technology all around us we should be able to quickly and easily send a message to anyone we want with no hassle.

Why do we want to use Dropmail?

Dropmail has a very elegant and simple user interface yet at the same time it holds all the regular features and more of a standard email client. Not only that but it is also extremely fast and supports Chrome OS which has no email client available until now!

What are some of Dropmails highlight features?

Supports Major Email Providers

Upon launch we will support Yahoo, Outlook, iCloud, Gmail. We will expand the number of available services before launch.

Tasks

A tab allowing you to use your emails as to-do list items.

Downloads

All your attachments will be organized on one tab so you can download what you need without having to go through all your emails to find that one attachment!

*The downloads tab is based off the amazing DotMail concept that was sadly discontinued http://dotmailapp.com/

Advanced Customization

Throughout the Dropmail application if you do not like the order of an element simply hold down on it and drag it to wherever you want!

Tags

Tags allow you to find the emails you care about. Dropmail will automatically categorize your emails in to one of 4 categories (Personal, Services, Social, Newsletters).

Smart Search

Unlike a regular search smart search allows you to search by subject, time/date received, message body, and who your message is from.

Multiple Accounts

Add as many accounts as you want!

Notifications

As soon as you receive an email you will be notified with a notification allowing you to quick-reply without even opening Dropmail!

+ More

Is it safe?

Dropmail does not connect to any 3rd party servers! Every request is made between you and your email provider. Also if your email provider supports SSL we will use SSL to connect to your email.

Where will the money go?

We need money to launch the project, for 

- licenses & trademarks

- promotion/advertising

- hosting (main site + push notification handling + Account syncing)

- Native iOS, Android, and Linux versions created.

- Dropmail for wearable device (Google Glass, Moto 360)

Why should you contribute to this project?

With your help we can revolutionize email by making it accessible to everyone! With a simple and intuitive interface everyone will know how to use it. It also will enable people on less used operating systems such as Chrome OS to still get access to a full-fledged email client. And of course by helping us you will receive a bunch of really great 

perks :-).

The Future

In the future we plan to add features for syncing across multiple devices and support for a much wider variety of devices including wearables and mobile devices!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute thats fine! If you like our project make sure to share it with your friends using the Indiegogo share tools!

Let's make email for the 21st Century!

story:
People want to express themselves.

People need to share their feelings, ideas and opinions in many ways.

Current solutions involve text and emoji - they are not personal enough. Therefore, we developed a technology that allows us and you to personalized your messages with your selected images, which will be available to you whenever you use your smartphone with any social app or messenger that you usually use.

Our expression app allows visualization of your messages.


It allows any user to draw with colors, type text with different colors, insert hand painted emoji and above all, use additional images that you had supplied us. Thus, your messages to friends/family/fans/classmates/... will contain very personal items of your choosing as well as general emoji, text, and drawings. 

We will use our technology and knowledge to create specific, personalized graphical expression app (keyboard) for you. The app will have seamless integration with any app that uses a keyboard!

For example Facebook, WhatsApp, WeChat, Messenger, KakaoTalk, Line, Twitter – in fact for all social apps.

What’s it good for? /Who will want such a keyboard?

You and people you know: friends, family, classmates,…

Participants in events: birthdays, reunions, marriages, conventions, trade shows,…

Organizations of any size, small business owners, fund-raising for any cause, election campaigns,…

If you are a known Talent –all your fans will want your app. 

We will create the personalized keyboard with the images you sent us. 

We will submit the personalized keyboard to an online store (possibilities: Appstore/Google play/our online store) and facilitate sales of the keyboard to others. You will set the price of the keyboard in the online store. 

You will receive 70% of our net income (Zetzing income minus fees to the online store and minus costs of money transfer to your account).

Our current app is an iOS version of this app and later on we will develop an Android version as well and add it to your app offering without additional cost.

In case this campaign raises more than $30,000 we will quickly develop an Android version for the personalized keyboards apps and add it to all backers.

This app will facilitate the app owner branding and allow monetization for those that wish it.

Good luck!

There is no boundary to the uses of your personalized app (Zetzing) - it all depends on your imaginations. We would love to receive examples of your best Zetzings and present the best of them on our site. (We will create an option to add Zetzings on our site after this campaign ends.)

story:
FlipCable is the really universal cable. It supports both microUSB and Lightning connectors, with no adapter needed.

               


A whole new connector

FlipCable spots a new connector, that is different than the lightning one or the microUSB one. It's a whole new technology that allows it to be plugged into both.

How it's possible? Let's take a look at the rendering.

  • One side features the 8 pins that makes it Lightning compliant
  • The other side spots all the five pins needed to build a microUSB connection
So you can use this connector for both Lightning and microUSB devices!

This is possible because, even if Lightning and microUSB connectors are shaped differently, they have the same sizes. So we have been able to build a connector that fits on both Lightning and microUSB plugs, and that works for both!
With FlipCable you'll be able to charge iPhones, iPads, iPods, such as Android phones, Windows phones, Blackberry, but also any microUSB device such as bluetooth headsets, action camera etc.
               

High power...

FlipCable is engineered to charge devices safely and fast.

It supports up to 2.1A of charge, supporting Qualcomm Fast Charge technology.

...and high quality

While building the amazing double connector, we didn't want to deliver an unreliable product.

Our team worked hard to develop a strong and durable cable, made of copper wires alloy covered with an aluminum shield. Everything is covered with textile nylon to make it strong and flexible.

Colors

FlipCable is available in four different colors: black, white, gold and rose, to match your smartphone finish and style.

You will be able to choose your favorite color after the campaign is over!

What we need and why

We already have these cables with the new amazing connector. We are here, on Indiegogo, to get enough money to start mass production.

Our manufacturer can't make less than some hundreds cables, and that is quite expensive. That's why we need your help!

We don't expect any risk because samples are ready and perfectly working. The manufacturer has proven fast and reliable, and we can count on him. Anyway, delays might eventually happen due to issues in the supply chain - we do not expect them, but we want you to know everything about the project.

We will have FlipCable ready in two months, and delivered to your home not later than three months from the end of the campaign!

This is our manufacturing company. They proven to be reliable and very helpful in the whole prototyping and sampling process, so we know we can count on them!

Contribuite and support

In exchange for your help, we are giving away perks to have FlipCable at a very special price!

With 11$, you'll have your own FlipCable before everyone else.

At 25$, you can get three cables for your family!

At 55$, you can get seven cables for all your friends!

At 110$ you can get eleven FlipCable cables!

If you like FlipCable as we do, please don't forget to share the campaign.

Thank you.

story:
Stretch Goals

 

Loupedeck Demo Video

Watch our new demo video and find out how Loupedeck works in the hands of a true artist/photographer. The whole team is super satisfied on how smoothly our prototype runs.

 

 

Loupedeck™ is a console designed for people who edit their photographs and is targeted at hobbyists, serious amateurs and professional consumers. With digital photography, editing has become a vital part of producing a photograph. Loupedeck™ allows you to easily investigate new editing techniques and release your full potential. The console makes your editing process easier, more efficient and more rewarding.

 

 

 

 

 

The five-strong team below represent the core group behind the Loupedeck project to date. Comprising senior ex-Nokia / Microsoft smartphone specialists, a professional photographer and a CEO with a strong background in international sales, the team are all highly educated and can boast considerable expertise in their chosen professions.

Mikko Kesti, CEO of Loupedeck, is 35-years old and has been shooting photos since 1997 as a hobby. Mikko has an M.Sc, in Mechanical Engineering from the Tampere University of Technology. The past decade, Mikko’s career has seen him involved with international sales for the packaging industry in the Nordics, Baltics, Germany and Russia. Mikko says that running a company is nothing compared to running a family with two young daughters.  

Esa Alanen is a 40-year old technology enthusiast and product guy with an M.Sc. in Industrial Management from the Tampere University of Technology. Esa was the Lead Product Manager for Lumia flagship products in Tampere / San Diego, U.S, including the Nokia Lumia 920 smartphone. He loves to develop new concepts and turn them into reality with Industrial design and R&D guys. “As a classic hobbyist", says Esa, "I’ve just occasionally the time to look at my photos and there’s always a learning curve to reach back to the skill level I was at the last time I used Lightroom. And, I wish I’d have more time for my own little video projects as well.”

Markus Rauman is a 42-year old product development and productisation expert with a passion for technology. Markus has a M.Sc. in Electrical Engineering from the Tampere University of Technology. He gets things done and enjoyed creating mobile devices during his 16-year career in Nokia and Microsoft. During that time Markus lead four mobile phone products to markets (Microsoft Lumia 650, Lumia 530, Lumia 620 and Nokia E7 Communicator) and now this expertise is part of creating something exciting and beautiful in Loupedeck. Markus is a hobbyist in photography, always wanting to learn more. He is ready to try new methods and technologies to see how they improve results.

Heikki Kangasmaa is a 45-year old industrial designer. He has an M.Sc. in Industrial Design from the Lahti University of Applied Science & Design Institute. He is a hands-on designer and visionary who has been working as a designer for over 16 years at Nokia and Microsoft design before joining the Loupedeck team. Heikki is experienced in product design from conception to final CE products.  He wants to create meaningful and functional products – that are naturally beautiful as well. The Microsoft Lumia 650 and the Nokia Lumia 925 are two recent examples of his work.

Karo Holmberg is a 35-year old professional photographer specialised in demanding low light event photography. He is interested in testing and poking around with new tech stuff, keeping the human factor in mind: Optimising workflows, processes and user ergonomics is a major part of his work. In addition to his work as a photographer, Karo has been training amateur photographers on courses and via the online photographing community.

 

"When we have reached our crowdfunding goal of €75,000" explains CEO Mikko Kesti, "We will then be able to initiate the development work for mass production readiness and market entry. For this, we have a clear plan in place. In addition to collecting feedback from professional photographers, the product has been designed while keeping the mass production requirements firmly in mind.

Indiegogo crowdfunding will be used to start the next immediate actions to get final productisation work started. To get the product to mass production status requires additional funding. For additional funding, we have started negotiations on bridge-funding implementation with TEKES (the Finnish Funding Agency for Innovation) and Finnvera (a Finnish state-owned financing company).

Our team has 15+ years of experience in designing and leading development projects of Nokia and Microsoft smartphones from product concept to mass production, market entry and after sales. To mention a few examples of our teams recent projects: Lumia 920, Lumia 650, Lumia 530, Lumia 620 and Nokia E7 Communicator. Altogether, we’ve shipped more than 50 million smartphones. In addition to technology competences, we have also accumulated a comprehensive global network of personal contacts regarding potential suppliers and technology providers.

Right now, we have a working Loupedeck prototype which can be used to edit the pictures with your computer and use it to collect user feedback. After a hopefully very successful Indiegogo campaign, we will start the final design work as soon as possible. In practice, this means e.g. detailed fine-tuning of the user experience and optimisation for mass production. The detailed analysis and knowledge gained will be incorporated into the final product. To make the Loupedeck console as good as possible, we’ll reserve the right to make small changes to the final product compared to the prototype you see in the photos. We already have some ideas and excellent feedback; keep it coming!"

Here’s are a few key enhancements which will kick-off right after the Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign finishes:

  • Touch and feel of the dials and buttons
  • Fine-tune the industrial design
  • Detailed mechanics design
  • Design optimisation for manufacturing, assembly and testing
  • Finish negotiations with European suppliers
  • Device firmware development

***

Approximate schedule for the productisation and ramp-up:

  • November 2016 - Indiegogo™ Campaign
  • December 2016 - Continue negotiations with manufacturers
  • December 2016 - Initiate detailed design work
  • Feb-Mar 2017 - First round of prototypes for internal testing
  • March 2017 - Fine-tuning for mass production capability and quality
  • May 2017 - Mass production verification units
  • June 2017 - Shipping starts

 

Mikko Kesti has always been interested in photography. He remembers taking his Dad’s camera when he was between the age of 8–10 years old and shooting whole rolls of film full of useless photos. Just because it was fun. When Mikko was 16, he got his first camera. At the age of 32, Mikko finally decided to get his first DSLR camera.

While the photography remained an enjoyable passion, editing however, was a new step for him. After researching and trying out a few photo editing software tools, many friends then recommended Adobe’s Lightroom™. Mikko decided to give it a try and very soon found out that the software had a lot of potential. After using the software tool for a few months and editing more than 1000 pictures, Mikko realised that editing was time consuming, impractical, ergonomically poor and the full potential of the software was easily forgotten.

As a result of this workflow analysis, Mikko began to search for a tool that could solve these problems. His focus was on finding either a keyboard or a mechanical device where all controls could be seen at once and the use of Lightroom would consequently be easy and fun.

However, there was no device to be found, so Mikko decided to build it. Influenced by his other hobby, home DJ’ing, Mikko decided to design a product that resembled a DJ mixing desk, but did not know how and where to start in terms of bringing his concept to reality, 

In early February of 2016, Mikko Kesti contacted Esa Alanen through a mutual friend, because Mikko had heard that Esa was involved in a team that would be able to develop hardware and software based innovations into a physical product. The guys in this Tampere-based team were Esa Alanen and Markus Rauman, both of whom had recently left Nokia.

Over the course of the spring, Mikko and Esa’s team started to develop the idea for Loupedeck further, reaching their first breakthrough at the end of February when they discovered that the product worked perfectly with Adobe Lightroom and would thus be feasible to produce. They soon started cooperating with TEAM Finland™, the state-funded internationalisation network, to receive support on patent issues, and with their help, a patent application was filed in July 2016.

In May 2016, designer Heikki Kangasmaa was brought into the team in order to design a piece of hardware that would be both beautiful and functional. 

As the project kicked off, Mikko also brought in his old friend Karo Holmberg, a professional photographer, who helped formulate a plan for including end-users in the development process as early on as possible.

In the initial phase, the team conducted in-depth one-on-one interviews with a number of professional photographers to learn about their workflow and the challenges they faced with photo editing software. At this point, nothing was revealed to the test group about the product idea itself. The team found three recurring issues that came out during these interviews (which reinforced Mikko's original workflow analysis):

Based on the detailed feedback, Esa and his team started to work on Prototype #1, which was launched in early April 2016.

Prototype #1

In phase 2, this prototype was presented to the same test group along with the basic purpose of the device. The half-a-dozen professionals and a few amateurs were interviewed in-depth for over 4-8 hours at a time, and they were allowed to change the positions of the buttons, dials and sliders on the prototype. Afterwards, their preferences were mapped into a single layout and their views and feedback were recorded. These and other ideas were discussed during a workshop day in Helsinki at the end of May, which resulted in a draft of the design layout, along with finalising the essential functions, controls and dynamics.

Over the summer, the team worked on the design and different features with the help of Karo and other professional photographers, whose input was vital for the development process of the next prototype. Simultaneously, LoupeDeck Ltd. also applied for funding from Tekes (Finnish Funding Agency for Innovation).

Prototype #2 was launched in late August 2016 and it was presented to three professional photographers and four amateurs. Their feedback on the control setup, the functionalities of the different buttons and dials, as well as ergonomics resulted in some changes that needed to be taken into account with the third prototype.

Prototype #2

Prototype #3 was already meant to be as close to the end product as possible, and it was finished on 21st October, 2016.

Prototype #3

The team’s ultimate target was to listen to professional photographers in order to bring their workflow perfected over years of practice to anyone’s reach. The team believe they have created a well-thought-out product that can help anyone achieve a more professional level of photo editing.

 

When can I buy this from the shops?
Our target is to release the product globally in September 2017.

What’s the retail price when the product launches? 
Suggested retail price is €369.

Why have you chosen Lightroom™? 
It has the widest user base and we also have personal background of using it.

In the future, will Loupedeck™ be compatible with other photo editing software tools?  
Yes. But first we concentrate on Lightroom™. 

Are you planning to launch a cordless Bluetooth version? 
We believe that a USB version will work very well for most of the users but we always appreciate your feedback and suggestions.
story_txt:
Stretch Goals Loupedeck Demo VideoWatch our new demo video and find out how Loupedeck works in the hands of a true artist/photographer. The whole team is super satisfied on how smoothly our prototype runs.  Loupedeck™ is a console designed for people who edit their photographs and is targeted at hobbyists, serious amateurs and professional consumers. With digital photography, editing has become a vital part of producing a photograph. Loupedeck™ allows you to easily investigate new editing techniques and release your full potential. The console makes your editing process easier, more efficient and more rewarding.

 
    The five-strong team below represent the core group behind the Loupedeck project to date. Comprising senior ex-Nokia / Microsoft smartphone specialists, a professional photographer and a CEO with a strong background in international sales, the team are all highly educated and can boast considerable expertise in their chosen professions.Mikko Kesti, CEO of Loupedeck, is 35-years old and has been shooting photos since 1997 as a hobby. Mikko has an M.Sc, in Mechanical Engineering from the Tampere University of Technology. The past decade, Mikko’s career has seen him involved with international sales for the packaging industry in the Nordics, Baltics, Germany and Russia. Mikko says that running a company is nothing compared to running a family with two young daughters.  Esa Alanen is a 40-year old technology enthusiast and product guy with an M.Sc. in Industrial Management from the Tampere University of Technology. Esa was the Lead Product Manager for Lumia flagship products in Tampere / San Diego, U.S, including the Nokia Lumia 920 smartphone. He loves to develop new concepts and turn them into reality with Industrial design and R&D guys. “As a classic hobbyist", says Esa, "I’ve just occasionally the time to look at my photos and there’s always a learning curve to reach back to the skill level I was at the last time I used Lightroom. And, I wish I’d have more time for my own little video projects as well.”Markus Rauman is a 42-year old product development and productisation expert with a passion for technology. Markus has a M.Sc. in Electrical Engineering from the Tampere University of Technology. He gets things done and enjoyed creating mobile devices during his 16-year career in Nokia and Microsoft. During that time Markus lead four mobile phone products to markets (Microsoft Lumia 650, Lumia 530, Lumia 620 and Nokia E7 Communicator) and now this expertise is part of creating something exciting and beautiful in Loupedeck. Markus is a hobbyist in photography, always wanting to learn more. He is ready to try new methods and technologies to see how they improve results.Heikki Kangasmaa is a 45-year old industrial designer. He has an M.Sc. in Industrial Design from the Lahti University of Applied Science & Design Institute. He is a hands-on designer and visionary who has been working as a designer for over 16 years at Nokia and Microsoft design before joining the Loupedeck team. Heikki is experienced in product design from conception to final CE products.  He wants to create meaningful and functional products – that are naturally beautiful as well. The Microsoft Lumia 650 and the Nokia Lumia 925 are two recent examples of his work.Karo Holmberg is a 35-year old professional photographer specialised in demanding low light event photography. He is interested in testing and poking around with new tech stuff, keeping the human factor in mind: Optimising workflows, processes and user ergonomics is a major part of his work. In addition to his work as a photographer, Karo has been training amateur photographers on courses and via the online photographing community. "When we have reached our crowdfunding goal of €75,000" explains CEO Mikko Kesti, "We will then be able to initiate the development work for mass production readiness and market entry. For this, we have a clear plan in place. In addition to collecting feedback from professional photographers, the product has been designed while keeping the mass production requirements firmly in mind.Indiegogo crowdfunding will be used to start the next immediate actions to get final productisation work started. To get the product to mass production status requires additional funding. For additional funding, we have started negotiations on bridge-funding implementation with TEKES (the Finnish Funding Agency for Innovation) and Finnvera (a Finnish state-owned financing company).Our team has 15+ years of experience in designing and leading development projects of Nokia and Microsoft smartphones from product concept to mass production, market entry and after sales. To mention a few examples of our teams recent projects: Lumia 920, Lumia 650, Lumia 530, Lumia 620 and Nokia E7 Communicator. Altogether, we’ve shipped more than 50 million smartphones. In addition to technology competences, we have also accumulated a comprehensive global network of personal contacts regarding potential suppliers and technology providers.Right now, we have a working Loupedeck prototype which can be used to edit the pictures with your computer and use it to collect user feedback. After a hopefully very successful Indiegogo campaign, we will start the final design work as soon as possible. In practice, this means e.g. detailed fine-tuning of the user experience and optimisation for mass production. The detailed analysis and knowledge gained will be incorporated into the final product. To make the Loupedeck console as good as possible, we’ll reserve the right to make small changes to the final product compared to the prototype you see in the photos. We already have some ideas and excellent feedback; keep it coming!"Here’s are a few key enhancements which will kick-off right after the Indiegogo crowdfunding campaign finishes:
Touch and feel of the dials and buttons
Fine-tune the industrial design
Detailed mechanics design
Design optimisation for manufacturing, assembly and testing
Finish negotiations with European suppliers
Device firmware development
***Approximate schedule for the productisation and ramp-up:

November 2016 - Indiegogo™ Campaign

December 2016 - Continue negotiations with manufacturers

December 2016 - Initiate detailed design work

Feb-Mar 2017 - First round of prototypes for internal testing

March 2017 - Fine-tuning for mass production capability and quality

May 2017 - Mass production verification units

June 2017 - Shipping starts
 Mikko Kesti has always been interested in photography. He remembers taking his Dad’s camera when he was between the age of 8–10 years old and shooting whole rolls of film full of useless photos. Just because it was fun. When Mikko was 16, he got his first camera. At the age of 32, Mikko finally decided to get his first DSLR camera.While the photography remained an enjoyable passion, editing however, was a new step for him. After researching and trying out a few photo editing software tools, many friends then recommended Adobe’s Lightroom™. Mikko decided to give it a try and very soon found out that the software had a lot of potential. After using the software tool for a few months and editing more than 1000 pictures, Mikko realised that editing was time consuming, impractical, ergonomically poor and the full potential of the software was easily forgotten.As a result of this workflow analysis, Mikko began to search for a tool that could solve these problems. His focus was on finding either a keyboard or a mechanical device where all controls could be seen at once and the use of Lightroom would consequently be easy and fun.However, there was no device to be found, so Mikko decided to build it. Influenced by his other hobby, home DJ’ing, Mikko decided to design a product that resembled a DJ mixing desk, but did not know how and where to start in terms of bringing his concept to reality, In early February of 2016, Mikko Kesti contacted Esa Alanen through a mutual friend, because Mikko had heard that Esa was involved in a team that would be able to develop hardware and software based innovations into a physical product. The guys in this Tampere-based team were Esa Alanen and Markus Rauman, both of whom had recently left Nokia.Over the course of the spring, Mikko and Esa’s team started to develop the idea for Loupedeck further, reaching their first breakthrough at the end of February when they discovered that the product worked perfectly with Adobe Lightroom and would thus be feasible to produce. At this point, nothing was revealed to the test group about the product idea itself. The half-a-dozen professionals and a few amateurs were interviewed in-depth for over 4-8 hours at a time, and they were allowed to change the positions of the buttons, dials and sliders on the prototype. Afterwards, their preferences were mapped into a single layout and their views and feedback were recorded. These and other ideas were discussed during a workshop day in Helsinki at the end of May, which resulted in a draft of the design layout, along with finalising the essential functions, controls and dynamics.Over the summer, the team worked on the design and different features with the help of Karo and other professional photographers, whose input was vital for the development process of the next prototype. Simultaneously, LoupeDeck Ltd. also applied for funding from Tekes (Finnish Funding Agency for Innovation).Prototype #2 was launched in late August 2016 and it was presented to three professional photographers and four amateurs. Their feedback on the control setup, the functionalities of the different buttons and dials, as well as ergonomics resulted in some changes that needed to be taken into account with the third prototype.Prototype #2Prototype #3 was already meant to be as close to the end product as possible, and it was finished on 21st October, 2016.Prototype #3The team’s ultimate target was to listen to professional photographers in order to bring their workflow perfected over years of practice to anyone’s reach. story:
About project

Have you ever thought what we don‘t have in our community‘s technologies yet? We are able to hear each others through the phones,  to see by using web cameras, but have you ever had an idea how it would be perfect to feel other person wireless touch? To see, to hear and to feel are the most important senses when we are communicating with other people. How many of us see our children going to the school or other family members preparing to work, journey or business trip? It would be great to have a possibilty to touch all these people despite the fact that they are very far.


TouchWi is a tecnology based on modern clothes. They look like normal, other people wouldn‘t see any differences but these clothes allow you to feel a wireless touch. It has a microcontroller, bluetooth module, on/off button, li-ion batery and touch zones. All these components are inside it and clothes look like normal garment, but other person which can be on the other earth side using internet can send a wireless touch to you dressed TouchWi and you feel it.


How it works

There are two people – you and your lover. You – sending wireless touches. Your lover is dressed TouchWi and feeling your touches.

In order to use a TouchWi your lover must have a smartphone (Android or iOS) with internet access. She/he instaling the TouchWi app and using it registering to TouchWi. When registration is successful you will get a login and password. Using it you can login to webpage which allows to you send wireless touches. Or if you are also using a smartphone with internet you can install TouchWi app which allows you to send wireless touches. To send wireless touch is very simple. If you are using app, you open it and you will see a touch zones which can be activated. Touch zones – the zones where your lover can feel your touch. How long you push on it, it will be wireless touch feel time. If you can‘t or don‘t want to use a smartphone you can send touch via TouchWi webpage. There are the same like using an app, but before sending the touch you must login using your login and password.

Your lover is dressed TouchWi clothes. TouchWi‘s clothes have a microcontroller, bluetooth module, on/off button, li-ion batery and touch zones‘s coin motors. Li-ion battery can be charged by USB using USB cable. On/off button allows your lover to turn off or turn on the TouchWi clothes. Bluetooth module is connected with your lover‘s smartphone (Android or iOS). The app installed in the smartphone is connected with TouchWi server using internet. From there are recievied data about your touches. This data are seding to TouchWi clothes via bluetooth, TouchWi‘s microcontroller activating touch zones and your lover is feeling your touch. Touch zones – the zones where your lover can feel your touch. The schemes is showed below.


The TouchWi Story

If someone would ask, how many senses does have the touch, we would say hundred meanings of it. The touch can heal someone. Or to express what do we feel. It has power to calm and to protect. To become reason to fall in love with someone. To show attention. It can be real challenge for sometimes. Or the new start.

I dreamed about this idea one day, when my girlfriend was not at home. It was on cold and rainy September. I just wanted very much that she would feel how strong I miss her. I knew that callings are so ordinary, that they can‘t surprise anyone. So that‘s why I thought about wireless way to touch someone you want. After two months was born the first prototipe. It was a brassiere. Why I chose a bra? Because it can touch very sensitive zones of woman.

The first prototipe had six points of touch zones and a very small battery which life was very short. But rapidly it bacame a favorite of my girlfriend, because she could feel the touch of me when she was at work. When she told about it to her friends, they asked me to make more bras for them. After that I decided that this is a good idea and I should present it to other people. So here I am.


TouchWi clothes

       For women


For man



Reward Overview


Why We Need Your Support

We have many ideas related with TouchWi improvement and amazing possibilities of it. In order all our ideas would become true we need your support. Now there are just  several  acting models of TouchWi, which have some unresolved problems. There are several of them:

·  Wash – made TouchWi full washable

·  More battery life

·  App for iOS

We expect your help in finding more people who would help us to resolve these problems rapidly and qualitatively. Then we will be able to offer you  high quality and professionally accomplished product.  Thank you very much in advance.


THANK YOU

We are grateful for all who have read this article, even if you will not accept to support our product. Anyway, we expect that you like our idea and you will tell for others about this new product, maybe you will discuss about it on Facebook or Twitter. Without doubt we honestly say „thanks a lot“ for those, who decided to support our amazing TouchWi idea.


Risks and challenges

Producing a hardware product is not easy and unforeseen risks can occur. Here also need a special software for smartphones. However we are confident that we will deliver a high quality product to all our backers on time. All products maybe will be shipped faster than we are forecasting, but you will inform about it with our newsletters. We will ship our product by Post. It will be 100% free for our Contributions.

We know a long distance relationship is very hard, so you can help us to make it a little bit easier by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page. And please help us spread the word by sharing our page!

Thank you.
