story:
NATURAL TALKING EXPERIENCE WITH ZIBEAR!

This video update shows how ZiBear talks to us automatically using her knowledge from our cloud server / parents pre-programmed questions and quizzes.

A LITTLE BABY (2 YEARS OLD) PLAYS WITH ZIBEAR


How does it work?

ZiBear connects to your iPhone or Android smartphone via bluetooth. ZiBear will say, do and sing anything you'd like, using content you've created yourself, or that you've downloaded from our store.

ZiBear can even connect to the internet and answer questions intelligently if you let it. You're completely in control of everything ZiBear can say and do so you can turn this feature on and off as you like.

Why did we make ZiBear?

We wanted to bring some magic back to traditional children's toys. We all remember imagining that our toys came to life when we weren't looking. Now they really do!

What can ZiBear do?

ZiBear can listen to what you say and talk back. You can make ZiBear say anything you'd like, and even better, you can customise what ZiBear says when you ask it a particular question! Endless fun, but great if you want to practise words with your children or even help them study!

Let's get quizzical!

You can create your own quizzes with ZiBear. You just add your questions and answers and ZiBear will know if it's the correct answer. Simple, brilliant fun and games.

Sing and Dance

ZiBear can play any song or piece of music you have in your phone, just like a bluetooth speaker so you can sing and dance along to all your favourite tunes!


Storytime!

Download stories, or add your own and ZiBear will read the whole thing for you.

ZiBear takes advantage of Cloud Computing and Internet of Things, giving you Endless Content. 

Powering the magic with our apps

We are a passionate team of developers, designers and engineers. We've created custom Android and iPhone apps from scratch to power ZiBear. If you're a developer, we'll be producing an SDK so you can create custom apps yourself!

Type quick messages for ZiBear to say, or choose from a bank of messages you've saved

Build up your own ZiBear's brain! Store as many question and answer combinations as you'd like

Your ZiBear can quiz your kids using your own questions - just tell ZiBear you'd like to play a quiz

Your ZiBear can sing along to any music on your phone

Your ZiBear can read stories stored on your phone


You can set default commands for your ZiBear

Moreover, you can get rich contents from ZiBear content store

What's inside ZiBear?

A quality motor that acts as ZiBear's skeleton, mouth and ears.

Inside the unit, there's an embedded chip which has a microcontroller, Bluetooth 3.0 transmitter and receiver, and our sound detection and analysis algorithm which works out when to move ZiBear for more natural motion. There's also a really great speaker and a rechargeable lithium ion battery so no more fishing around for spare batteries!

How did we get here?

Please see our gallery for the full ZiBear development route. 

Unique ZiBear Accessories

What languages can ZiBear speak?

Arabic,Chinese (China, HK, Taiwan), Czech,Danish, Dutch, English (Australia, Ireland, South Africa, UK, US), Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian,  Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean (South Korea), Norwegian, Polish,  Portuguese (Brazil, Portugal), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Spanish (Mexico, Spain, Sweden), Thai and Turkish. 

PLEASE NOTE that the voice you hear in the video is only available in English. Voices in other languages will vary, but don't worry! ZiBear is highly adaptive, so if you don't like the voice, you can simply change it for another. We'll provide information on how to do this. 

ZiBear loves developers

We offer a full SDK (Software Development Kit) as a starting point to give you a chance to be more creative than us. You have complete freedom to integrate ZiBear into your software app or hardware system, and make your customised version of ZiBear to surprise your children and friends. There's absolutely no limitation.

Who are we?

We're Zetta Sense, a new startup based in London. We take an innovative approach to developing products and applications that push the limits of what's possible, and change the way we think about technology.

Development status

We have ZiBear almost completely ready to deliver. There are some minor improvements  we need to make to ZiBear (better microphone, up to 0.5 meters) and the mobile apps (testing on more android versions and phones), but other than that we have a working bear!

The app will be published in both Google Play and iTunes App Store for download once the campaign is successful.

We'd love to hear your feedback and suggestions for ZiBear and the apps. We'll do our best to add any outstanding features.

How will the funds be used?

We need to manufacture a relatively large amount of ZiBears in order to deliver the right quality, at the right price. We've developed a great relationship with one of the best manufacturers in China, who have more than 20 years experience in this area, and we're very happy that they can meet our requirements.

All funds raised will go towards this initial order. If we don't meet the campaign goal then all funds will be returned.

Timeline

In the media

Many thanks to IPHONENESS - ZiBear: Smart Toy with iPhone & Android Support

Many thanks to ALL ISTUFF - ZIBEAR SMART TOY FOR IOS

Many thanks to Julia Herrick - Talking smart stuffed toy brings our your Cyrano DeBeargerac

Many thanks to Gadgetify - ZiBear: Smart Toy for iPhone & Android

Many thanks to AskMen - ZiBear: Finally a Children's Toy Guaranteed To Give Your Nightmares and Your Child May Become An Einstein. With This Creepy Bear He'll Definitely Become A Dahmer (DailyMotion). 

Many thanks to Yahoo Finance - Robotic Friend for Children ZiBear Takes Robotics Craze to the Next Level

Many thanks to Technabob - Robotic ZiBear Wants to Sing, Play, and Possibly Eat Your Soul

We love talking about ZiBear! Please contact us to request press information.

Have any questions for us?

We'd love to hear from you! You can email us at info@zibear.com and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
story_txt:
NATURAL TALKING EXPERIENCE WITH ZIBEAR!This video update shows how ZiBear talks to us automatically using her knowledge from our cloud server / parents pre-programmed questions and quizzes.A LITTLE BABY (2 YEARS OLD) PLAYS WITH ZIBEAR

How does it work?
ZiBear connects to your iPhone or Android smartphone via bluetooth. ZiBear will say, do and sing anything you'd like, using content you've created yourself, or that you've downloaded from our store. 

ZiBear can even connect to the internet and answer questions intelligently if you let it. You're completely in control of everything ZiBear can say and do so you can turn this feature on and off as you like.
Why did we make ZiBear?
We wanted to bring some magic back to traditional children's toys. We all remember imagining that our toys came to life when we weren't looking. Now they really do!
What can ZiBear do?
ZiBear can listen to what you say and talk back. You can make ZiBear say anything you'd like, and even better, you can customise what ZiBear says when you ask it a particular question! Endless fun, but great if you want to practise words with your children or even help them study!

Let's get quizzical!
You can create your own quizzes with ZiBear. You just add your questions and answers and ZiBear will know if it's the correct answer. Simple, brilliant fun and games.
Sing and Dance
ZiBear can play any song or piece of music you have in your phone, just like a bluetooth speaker so you can sing and dance along to all your favourite tunes!
Storytime!
Download stories, or add your own and ZiBear will read the whole thing for you.
ZiBear takes advantage of Cloud Computing and Internet of Things, giving you Endless Content. 

Powering the magic with our apps


We are a passionate team of developers, designers and engineers. We've created custom Android and iPhone apps from scratch to power ZiBear. If you're a developer, we'll be producing an SDK so you can create custom apps yourself!Type quick messages for ZiBear to say, or choose from a bank of messages you've saved
Build up your own ZiBear's brain! Store as many question and answer combinations as you'd like
Your ZiBear can quiz your kids using your own questions - just tell ZiBear you'd like to play a quiz

Your ZiBear can sing along to any music on your phoneYour ZiBear can read stories stored on your phoneYou can set default commands for your ZiBear
Moreover, you can get rich contents from ZiBear content storeWhat's inside ZiBear?
A quality motor that acts as ZiBear's skeleton, mouth and ears.

Inside the unit, there's an embedded chip which has a microcontroller, Bluetooth 3.0 transmitter and receiver, and our sound detection and analysis algorithm which works out when to move ZiBear for more natural motion. There's also a really great speaker and a rechargeable lithium ion battery so no more fishing around for spare batteries! 

How did we get here?Please see our gallery for the full ZiBear development route. Unique ZiBear AccessoriesWhat languages can ZiBear speak?
Arabic,Chinese (China, HK, Taiwan), Czech,Danish, Dutch, English (Australia, Ireland, South Africa, UK, US), Finnish, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Hungarian,  Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Korean (South Korea), Norwegian, Polish,  Portuguese (Brazil, Portugal), Romanian, Russian, Slovak, Spanish (Mexico, Spain, Sweden), Thai and Turkish. 
PLEASE NOTE that the voice you hear in the video is only available in English. Voices in other languages will vary, but don't worry! ZiBear is highly adaptive, so if you don't like the voice, you can simply change it for another. We'll provide information on how to do this. ZiBear loves developers
We offer a full SDK (Software Development Kit) as a starting point to give you a chance to be more creative than us. You have complete freedom to integrate ZiBear into your software app or hardware system, and make your customised version of ZiBear to surprise your children and friends. There's absolutely no limitation.
Who are we?
We're Zetta Sense, a new startup based in London. We take an innovative approach to developing products and applications that push the limits of what's possible, and change the way we think about technology.
Development status
We have ZiBear almost completely ready to deliver. There are some minor improvements  we need to make to ZiBear (better microphone, up to 0.5 meters) and the mobile apps (testing on more android versions and phones), but other than that we have a working bear!
The app will be published in both Google Play and iTunes App Store for download once the campaign is successful. We'd love to hear your feedback and suggestions for ZiBear and the apps. We'll do our best to add any outstanding features.
How will the funds be used?
We need to manufacture a relatively large amount of ZiBears in order to deliver the right quality, at the right price. We've developed a great relationship with one of the best manufacturers in China, who have more than 20 years experience in this area, and we're very happy that they can meet our requirements. All funds raised will go towards this initial order. If we don't meet the campaign goal then all funds will be returned. Timeline

story:
What is the 80’s Brick Phone?

It is a totally rad Bluetooth headset that connects to any Bluetooth capable device and makes it appear that you are talking on an old school 80’s “Brick” phone just like Gordon Gekko or Zach Morris. Guaranteed to make your friends crack up, and then wish they were anywhere near as cool as you are.

www.80sBrickphone.com

How does it work?

You just pair the 80’s Brick Phone with your Bluetooth capable cell phone and when you get a call on your phone, you answer it on your Brick Phone. You don’t even have to take your “modern day” cell phone out of your pocket. When you’re done with the call, you just hang up. That’s it. The 80’s Brick Phone charges via a mini usb cable that you can simply plug in to your computer.

Instruction pdf can be seen here - http://www.80sbrickphone.com/instructions.pdf

Will it work with my phone? 

The 80’s Brick Phone will work with any Bluetooth capable phone including the iPhone, Android, Windows and other phones. If your phone has Bluetooth capability, you can use the 80’s Brick Phone. 

Where will the money be spent? 

The majority of the funds raised will go towards the fabrication of the molds for the phone parts. Injection Molds cost anywhere from $15,000 to upwards of $100k and I need your help to get mine made. This particular design consists of 4 pieces so we'll need 4 molds, each costing about $8,000. Other things that the IndieGoGo campaign will cover are things like electronics engineering fees, mechanical engineering fees, packaging design, fulfillment costs, etc. I have assembled a top notch team to help with all aspects of the project and I'm confident that you will see that in the final product.

Why a Brick Phone? 

Because it’s TOTALLY AWESOME! 

Who am I? 

My name is Brad and I’m a designer, artist, writer, filmmaker, dad, and husband. I have a degree in Industrial Design and also have a feature film floating around out there. I love coming up with new gadgets and ideas, and thought the 80's Brick Phone would be super fun to make a reality. I really appreciate your support and hope you love this phone as much as I do. 

Thank you, Thank you, Thank you! 

This has been a really fun project to get going and I can’t keep going without your help. Anything you can pledge helps and I truly appreciate every single dollar. Pre-buy your phone now with the $35 pledge level (add $10 for shipping in the US) and help me make this phone a reality. And of course, thank you for your support.

story:
Doing the Two-Smartphone Shuffle?

There are many reasons why one would be compelled to carry two or even three smartphones.

Maybe you were in the middle of your personal smartphone 2-year contract when your employer gave you a second smartphone. Other people choose to carry two phones as a way to separate their personal and professional lives. Then there are those of us that must carry two smartphones because the work IT security policy makes it a little too difficult to completely get by with just one phone and use it at both work and at home.

Regardless of the reason, an increasing number of tech and business professionals are stuck carrying two smartphones: A business one and a personal one. Tired of the hassle?

Meet SimPoser. A smart dual sim-card companion-device that connects to your iOS or Android mobile or tablet via encrypted Bluetooth thus allowing you to use up to three SIM cards at the same time. SimPoser is a total solution for iPhone and Android smart phones.

Credit card size (85x53x7mm or 3.35X2.1x0.3")

Have up to 3 SIM cards on one mobile phone for calls, data and SMS.

  • Your iPhone or Android device becomes a Triple-SIM smartphone!
  • Make and receive calls from up to three numbers active on your single phone at all times. 
  • Provides control for each sim card for calls, data and text messages.
  • Create a WIFI Hotspot on your smart mobile device using data from the sim card of your choice.

Features

  • 2 or 3 SIM cards simultaneously active on a single smartphone
  • High speed Internet access everywhere
  • Calls and SMS notifications via Cloud service
  • Wi-Fi Hotspot to share with up to 10 people
  • Separation Alert so you never leave your phone or SimPoser behind
  • Camera Remote Control for photos and videos
  • Bluetooth multipoint-access for headphones and hands-free
  • Call forwarding feature to redirect your incoming calls
  • Pin Code for each Sim Card
  • VoIP functionality
  • Full compatibility with iOS & Android
  • Super long-lasting rechargeable battery
  • Contacts, Favourite Numbers, Recent Calls, SMS & Voicemail

Now you can go about with a single phone but with up to 3 lines. And with the SimPoser App you can control all the settings, make calls from the sim of your choice, manage contacts, send text messages, and create a WIFI hotspot and all from one device! So basically you use your phone like you normally do.

The App shown is a development app used in the development stages with our manufacturing partner. Refer to the App final look and feel below.

SimPoser is credit card size that fits into your wallet or pocket or attaches to your keyring.

A real and affordable solution that extends a single mobile device by up to two additional and simultaneous sim cards that you can use for voice, texting or data.

A connectivity/status LED light

SimPoser App Architectural Interface

SimPoser App for iOS & Android Final Look

 

The App shown is a development app used in the development stages with our manufacturing partner. Refer to the App final look and feel above. 

 

How it works and how to setup SimPoser

 

 Specifications

Now that you know there is a much simpler solution than lugging two or three phones around, we need you to choose one of our amazing perks and make a pledge with just a few clicks then share with all of your friends and join our mission to create a real and affordable solution that extends a single mobile device by up to two additional and simultaneous sim cards that you can use for voice, texting or data. 

"When life requires 2 or 3 mobile phones to manage, manage life with SimPoser."

Risks and challenges

We have been operating as consultants in planning, designing, building, configuring and commissioning telecommunications devices, networks and systems, such as voice, radio, two-way, data, microwave, satellite and digital data systems, and ensuring telecommunications systems interconnect with equipment from different manufacturers, service providers and users for 11 years.

We’ve worked hard over the last year to get the SimPoser to this point and we've successfully built a fully functional prototype. We are telecommunication engineers and App developers with a proven track record with a tenacity for excellence. We have a vast experience getting hardware right, tested & certified and we have developed over 150 Apps and counting.

We have partnered with a reputable manufacturer that we have worked with in the past 4 years and we see the risk here to be at the lower end of any scale.

As we proceed with this project, you will receive periodic updates from us and we will answer any queries promptly and transparently.

Thank you for reading thus far. Let's make this happen.

Thank you.

story:
Get Ready to Welcome Your Smart Assistant!

OWON Smart Bluetooth Digital Multimeter is a smart assistant which frees you from your boring working zone. It's not just a simple Multimeter. More surprises are waiting for you after you connect it to the cell phone.



Why do we need your help?

We need your comment on our new released product and test if the function is attracted.It will help us to improve the quality of our product.


How Smart Bluetooth Multimeter Works

Smarter than you can imagine. 

-It's a Multimeter which is available to connect to your cell phone via application( support both Android and iOS now* ). Data will show on the screen of your cell phone. Support remote control as well. Also, you can just put it aside, the data will be automatically recorded.

-Smart Voice Assistant can read your data value ( available in English and Chinese now), which help a lot when you are busy. 

-Warning system will remind you by buzz when the data you measure is out of the measurement range.

-Smart power-off option saves the lifetime of battery.It will automatically be off as the time you set.

*Android system Bluetooth Multimeter cannot connect to iPhone. And vice versa.


Let's see how it works:


*All the UI above is in BETA version. You may get different updated UI in your cell phone app when you get the real equipment.


Application Example

Measure and observe the relation between current and the brightness of LED light.


Disassembly Video


App control application



Project Timeline

What We Obtain

this is how we keep good quality and reliable cooperation for global value customers!


Challenges We Face

We have 2 challenges to face now:

-1 Improve the Accuracy of the Multimeter, this is the most important issue we and our customer concern about. We are going to make it more accurate.

-2 Improve the user's experience.  The UI and application will update continuously. New functions and appearance will come out. What functions you care most? We will add it as you require.  One of our develop plan is to insert a Web Server function into App, which is available to output the Monitoring Data and manage the mathematical operation. More new functions in developing.

The Update Information can be seen on public once we release.



Where will the funds go?

Deduct the necessary cost, the funds we get will put into researching. New functions and original idea will come out with the support of your funds.

Specifications



 

About The Shipping Cost

The Shipping cost vary from countries or regions,pls check the fee below and add it by using Additional Gift on the Contribute Tag.


 


About Owon

Lilliput steps into electronics industry since 1990. Owned by Lilliput, OWON was born in 2006 to “Meet your best need” in test and measurement equipment field.

Timely effective communication acts as the engine to power the enterprise growth, and innovation is the soul of engineering design, upon with mutual communication, and continual product innovation. We are ready to, and are investing more to make our common test and measurement equipment world more rich, and colorful.

Product Family:


You can also help by

It doesn't matter if you don't contribute. We are also appreciate if you make some comments for us. It helps us to make progress.

story:
Try a MLB Mock Draft at www.sodraft.com

 

Sodraft - The Social Evolution of Fantasy Sports

Do you love your fantasy sports but sometimes feel limited by your traditional leagues? Maybe you have tried a salary cap or daily league to be more socially engaged, but it still just doesn't seem like enough. With everything else becoming social, why is your favorite fantasy sports game still limited to small leagues?
 
As fantasy sport fanatics ourselves, we realized the only thing holding us back was the draft. With virtually limitless technology at our finger tips, why had someone not yet developed a social fantasy game which incorporated the strategic elements of a traditional snake draft into some kind of draft simulator where you are not competing against a computer? Although everyone we talked to said, "someone must have done that already", we couldn't find. So, we decided we'd give it a try.
 
What we then developed is the first fantasy sports platform which provides a true social fantasy experience, all without compromising the integrity or core strategy of a traditional fantasy draft. Combined with all the key functionality of a social networking platform, users can play, share, and engage with as many or as few others as they like. One platform... limitless competition.
 

The Basics of How our Draft Works

Sodraft’s proprietary draft simulator combines a traditional snake draft (serpentine) format with a 3 tier set-path picking system, generating up to 7 trillion unique team combinations.

For American Football, the players are split into 8 positional squads containing 33 players each:

  1. Quarterback
  2. Running Back
  3. Wide Receiver 1
  4. Wide Receiver 2
  5. Tight End
  6. Line Backer
  7. Defensive Back
  8. Kicker

Players are then situated in serpentine format according to their projected ranking. The user must then use their sports’ knowledge to pick their squad from the 45 different 3 player combinations.

 


To assist the user with comparing their options, the draft interface has a "Scouting Sheet" which allows the user to drag any 3 player combination into an area where they can see total past and projected stats. The potential squads can be manually moved around and ranked as many times as the user likes until they have finalized their decision.

 


Once the user has completed picking their players for each of the 8 squads, they can then manage their team the same as in their traditional fantasy leagues. Activate, bench, drop and pick-up players to further test your skills and flex your sports knowledge.

Complete details on the format and rules of the game can be found here.

 

Help Us Run a Beta Test for the 2013 NFL Season.

We first conceived our draft in September 2011. With the help of friends and family, we were able to secure our intellectual property and develop a basic platform. Shortly after, we launched an Alpha test for the 2012 MLB Season. Unfortunately, things did not go as planned and we forced to unexpectedly shut down the site.

With the help of some amazing team members, original and new, we were able to evaluate our mistakes and revise our strategies. Now, we are ready to move forward with the platform once again, but before we put it out to investors to finance a complete launch, we thought it best to test our draft with the public and see if our potential users think it’s as great as we do. And, what better place to do this then on Indiegogo.

Today, our goal is to raise enough funds to cover fees for hosting and licensing of the real-time stats for a full beta test of our new platform for the 2013 NFL season. If we can reach our goal, we will make the complete beta platform available to the public by Thursday, August 29th.

We have opted for a "Fixed Funding" campaign as we can not move forward with the Beta unless we meet our goal. Therefore, you can feel assured that you will receive a refund on your contribution if we are unable to collectively raise enough through this campaign to meet the needs of launching for this years' NFL season.

If we are successful in reaching our funding goal and completing a beta test, we hope to then raise enough capital to start rolling out additional sports starting with MLB in 2014. After that, the platform could be expanded into NBA, NHL, NCAAF, PGA, NASCAR, F1 and IPL, with potential for a number of additional leagues world-wide in the future.

Every Fantasy Sports Fan who has tried our draft loves it, so with your help we are confident we can all make this a success together. There is no doubt that the next step in the evolution of fantasy sports will be a social draft, so why not become one of the founding members and help us make this a reality!

*Please note: A "Fixed Funding" campaign requires payment via PayPal. To contribute without setting up a PayPal account, simply follow contribution prompts, then when PayPal login screen appears, click on "Pay with a Credit or Debit Card" tab below login area*

Our Unique Perks

As we are not a manufacturing or production company, and we will never charge our users to play on our site, we cannot pre-sell products or memberships. We were determined though to find a way to offer our contributors value. Finally, we came up with the concept of partnering with like-minded companies who offer fantastic products that will appeal to the core of our future user base. As a Result, we were able to partner with LavaTickets.com, StarStreet.com and Cardboard Memories Autographed Collectibles to make some fantastic rewards available to our generous contributors.


$10 - Sodraft Founder Status

(Please register Username at www.sodraft.com with same first and last name as on your Indiegogo account so we can confirm you are a contributor and secure your Username. If your first choice is already taken, please register with your second choice and email us your Username preference. If it is registered to a non-contributor, we will switch that username to your account)

 

$15 - Get Out to a Game!

 

$20 - Guaranteed Double-Up

 

$25 - Founders' Value Pack (FVP)

 

$750 - Signed Shaq Shoe - Size 22

 

$15,000 - 1936 New York Yankees World Series Championship Team Signed Baseball

 

Swag Perks

Although we hesitant to to offer these at first, we were able to source some high quality products at affordable rates. Therefore, we are thrilled to be able to offer some cool swag that will freshen up your look and wardrobe.

 

$50 - Sodraft Logo Tee + Founder's Value Package

 

$65 - Sodraft Pro Fit Cap + Founder's Value Package

 

$75 - Sodraft Zip-Up Hoodie + Founder's Value Package

 

$100 - Both Sodraft Pro Fit Caps + Founder's Value Package

 

$150 - Be a Partner With Swag (BPS)

 

Pre-Purchased Ad Inventory Perks

Not sure if anyone else has attempted to offer this as a perk before, but we figured we'd give it a shot as this will be our primary revenue stream. All packages include the "Be a Partner With Swag" Perk and range in CPM depending on the amount of inventory purchased. Ads will start running with the commencement of the Beta Test. Please contact us if you have specific questions on deployment of your ad.

 

The Core Team

Krishna Jolliffe - (Founder & CEO) holds as Bachelor of Commerce in Entrepreneurial Management from Royal Roads University. Krishna has been passionate about fantasy sports for almost a decade, so conceptualized the X-Draft after acknowledging the need for a social platform for drafted-team fantasy football leagues. Krishna brings with him 16 years of sales, marketing and management experience, an old-school work ethic, a relentless entrepreneurial drive, and a scholarship-winning education from a premier business school

Roy D. Trivett (Chief Technology Officer) holds a Master's degree in Systems Engineering from Carleton University, and has enjoyed major successes in building and commercializing companies in both the computer software and hardware product spaces. Most notably, He co-founded Architel Systems Corporation and served as its President, CTO and member of the board of directors. Under Roy’s direction, Architel completed an IPO in 1996, became part of the TSE 100 Index, gained a NASDAQ listing in 1998 and was subsequently sold to Nortel Network in 2000 for in-excess of $500 million USD.

Jesse Goldman (Co-Founder & VP Product Development) has been involved in sports his entire life and is an avid fan and participant.  Jesse’s passion for sports and knowledge of the fantasy sports industry will ensure Sodraft games are always designed with usability as the key objective.

Aaron Marcano (Director of Engineering) mentored under Roy Trivett while earning a degree in Systems Engineering from Simon Fraser University. He has since built a strong foundation in computer architecture, electronics and software engineering. Most recently he has developed e-commerce software for Silver Icing Inc., a clothing retail and wholesale company.

Dallas Araneda (Sales and Marketing Consultant) has worked as an awarding winning sales professional for the past 8 years and is currently the North American Manager for an international Minining Industry software company. He has worked on various marketing and sales campaigns in multiple B2B sales environments. His attention to detail and ability to communicate with a vast array of personalities gives him the upper hand in leading and implementing strategic goals in any organization.

Thiago Teles (Creative Director) has devote the last 10 years of his life to creating visual aesthetics. His vast resume stretches from running his own digital art studio to film production.

 

Referral Program

Unable to contribute but love what we're doing and would still like to be rewarded for spreading the word. Well, you can!
 
If we are able to reach our goal, whomever has the most shares of this campaign will receive a $250 electronic gift certificate to Nike.com
 
Please note: Must have a valid US address to purchase items on Nike.com, so Canadian residents can opt for a $250 electronic gift certificate for SportCheck.com. Sorry, international members are not eligible.
 
 

FAQ

Please send us any questions you have and we will do our best to respond as soon as possible. You can either comment via the comments tab, or email me directly at krishna@sodraft.com.

We will then update this section daily to post any questions we receive and the appropriate responses.

  

                                   Thank You for your Support!

    We Look Forward to Seeing you High in The Rankings this Fall!
story_txt:
Try a MLB Mock Draft at www.sodraft.com

 
Sodraft - The Social Evolution of Fantasy Sports
Do you love your fantasy sports but sometimes feel limited by your traditional leagues? Maybe you have tried a salary cap or daily league to be more socially engaged, but it still just doesn't seem like enough. With everything else becoming social, why is your favorite fantasy sports game still limited to small leagues?
 
As fantasy sport fanatics ourselves, we realized the only thing holding us back was the draft. With virtually limitless technology at our finger tips, why had someone not yet developed a social fantasy game which incorporated the strategic elements of a traditional snake draft into some kind of draft simulator where you are not competing against a computer? Although everyone we talked to said, "someone must have done that already", we couldn't find. So, we decided we'd give it a try.
 
What we then developed is the first fantasy sports platform which provides a true social fantasy experience, all without compromising the integrity or core strategy of a traditional fantasy draft. Combined with all the key functionality of a social networking platform, users can play, share, and engage with as many or as few others as they like. One platform... limitless competition.
 
The Basics of How our Draft Works
Sodraft’s proprietary draft simulator combines a traditional snake draft (serpentine) format with a 3 tier set-path picking system, generating up to 7 trillion unique team combinations.
For American Football, the players are split into 8 positional squads containing 33 players each:

Quarterback
Running Back
Wide Receiver 1
Wide Receiver 2
Tight End
Line Backer
Defensive Back
Kicker
Players are then situated in serpentine format according to their projected ranking. The user must then use their sports’ knowledge to pick their squad from the 45 different 3 player combinations.
 
 
To assist the user with comparing their options, the draft interface has a "Scouting Sheet" which allows the user to drag any 3 player combination into an area where they can see total past and projected stats. The potential squads can be manually moved around and ranked as many times as the user likes until they have finalized their decision.
 

Once the user has completed picking their players for each of the 8 squads, they can then manage their team the same as in their traditional fantasy leagues. Activate, bench, drop and pick-up players to further test your skills and flex your sports knowledge.
Complete details on the format and rules of the game can be found here.
 

Help Us Run a Beta Test for the 2013 NFL Season.
We first conceived our draft in September 2011. With the help of friends and family, we were able to secure our intellectual property and develop a basic platform. Shortly after, we launched an Alpha test for the 2012 MLB Season. Unfortunately, things did not go as planned and we forced to unexpectedly shut down the site.
With the help of some amazing team members, original and new, we were able to evaluate our mistakes and revise our strategies. Now, we are ready to move forward with the platform once again, but before we put it out to investors to finance a complete launch, we thought it best to test our draft with the public and see if our potential users think it’s as great as we do. And, what better place to do this then on Indiegogo.
Today, our goal is to raise enough funds to cover fees for hosting and licensing of the real-time stats for a full beta test of our new platform for the 2013 NFL season. If we can reach our goal, we will make the complete beta platform available to the public by Thursday, August 29th.
We have opted for a "Fixed Funding" campaign as we can not move forward with the Beta unless we meet our goal. Therefore, you can feel assured that you will receive a refund on your contribution if we are unable to collectively raise enough through this campaign to meet the needs of launching for this years' NFL season.
If we are successful in reaching our funding goal and completing a beta test, we hope to then raise enough capital to start rolling out additional sports starting with MLB in 2014. After that, the platform could be expanded into NBA, NHL, NCAAF, PGA, NASCAR, F1 and IPL, with potential for a number of additional leagues world-wide in the future.
Every Fantasy Sports Fan who has tried our draft loves it, so with your help we are confident we can all make this a success together. There is no doubt that the next step in the evolution of fantasy sports will be a social draft, so why not become one of the founding members and help us make this a reality!
*Please note: A "Fixed Funding" campaign requires payment via PayPal. To contribute without setting up a PayPal account, simply follow contribution prompts, then when PayPal login screen appears, click on "Pay with a Credit or Debit Card" tab below login area*
Our Unique Perks
As we are not a manufacturing or production company, and we will never charge our users to play on our site, we cannot pre-sell products or memberships. We were determined though to find a way to offer our contributors value. Finally, we came up with the concept of partnering with like-minded companies who offer fantastic products that will appeal to the core of our future user base. As a Result, we were able to partner with LavaTickets.com, StarStreet.com and Cardboard Memories Autographed Collectibles to make some fantastic rewards available to our generous contributors.

If it is registered to a non-contributor, we will switch that username to your account)

His attention to detail and ability to communicate with a vast array of personalities gives him the upper hand in leading and implementing strategic goals in any organization.
Thiago Teles (Creative Director) has devote the last 10 years of his life to creating visual aesthetics. His vast resume stretches from running his own digital art studio to film production.

story:
Why Indiegogo

A friend told me about Indiegogo after I launched my campaign on KS. I went through a month back and forth with KS editing my campaign, reshooting video footage and with each edit more and more of my content was disappearing, like my CAD drawings which they stated were not allowed. Frustrated, the campaign finally was approved and I decided to launch despite the fact most of my content was gone. I felt like there is a double standard on KS so I decided to try indiegogo. I’m looking forward to a successful campaign on Indiegogo. Thank you.

What Is Neo-Plug

Neo-Plug is a new and convenient adapter that consists of 2 parts. The first part, the “adapter” slips over your existing data cable or charger and has very strong rare earth magnets on the end, neodymium magnets. These magnets allow the data cable or charger to effortlessly snap into place with the second part, the “plug”, which resides inside your iPhone, iPad or Micro USB device.

 

Additional Videos

Click here to watch the extended video footage

Click here to watch Neo-Plug installed in iDevice

Click here to watch a video with our CAD designs

Click here to watch a prototype proof of concept video

 

The Story Behind the Idea:

I came up with the idea while driving my car and trying to plug the charger into the phone. I said to myself wouldn’t it be great if the charger could just snap into place by itself when it comes close to the port. When I returned home that night I couldn't sleep, because I immediately started thinking of how to design something like this, which parts to use, and how to build a working prototype.

1st working Neo-Plug prototype

 

I knew the working prototype wouldn’t be pretty, but at least it will help people visualize the concept. I knew I needed to show a better representation of the project, so I hired a 3D CAD designer and we closely worked together in order to make Neo-Plug come to life and produce a first rapid prototype.

Rapid prototype 3' Neo-Plug

 

Apple 30 pin connector Neo-Plug CAD design

 

Apple Lightning connector Neo-Plug CAD design

 

Micro USB connector Neo-Plug CAD design

 

Neo-Plug is intended to be used with your existing data cable or charger, yes it passes data as well so it can be used to SYNC your device or transfer data. Neo-Plug simply transforms your existing cable to a magnetic connector. Neo-Plug comes in 3 versions:

  • A flush adapter that goes over your existing cable just like in the above CAD drawings.
  • A 3’ foot extension, this version will extend you existing cable another 3’
  • A 6’ foot extension, this version will extend you existing cable another 6’

 Neo-Plug  makes connecting your device a “snap”, literally.

 

Examples of Neo-Plug in Your Device

Neo-Plug in Micro USB Port (side view)

 

Neo-Plug in Micro USB Port (bottom view)

 

Neo-Plug in iPad 30 Pin (side view)

 

Neo-Plug in iPad 30 Pin (bottom view)

 

Neo-Plug in iDevice 30 Pin (side view)

 

Neo-Plug in iDevice 30 Pin (bottom view)

 

Neo-Plug, a Fun Play on Words.

I’m sure many of you are wondering, Neo-Plug, the plug part makes sense, but neo? Well, it’s a fun play on words. What makes Neo-Plug work are tiny rare earth magnets which are extremely strong and are made of a material called neodymium. Unfortunately, neodymium itself is a poor conductor and therefore doesn’t pass electric current very well, which doesn’t make it a great candidate for electrical connectors. After doing research I found some great news! Neodymium can be plated with gold, since gold is an excellent electrical conductor; I incorporated gold plated neodymium magnets into the design to serve as contacts for not only charging the device, but also passing data to or from the device.

No More Poking Around.

Have you ever been frustrated by the process of plugging in your devices charger or data cable? You first twist it, look under it, aligned it properly, and finally plug it in. Neo-Plug will eliminate the frustration and tedious steps, since each Neo-Plug has uniquely placed magnets to make it impossible to plug the charger or data cable in the wrong way. It’s natural. The magnet won’t allow it.

Say Good-Bye to Smashed Cords, Broken Contacts, and Terminals.

Broken terminals inside a device are a thing of the past. So many devices need to be sent in for repair, because the charging port was damaged from too much pressure being applied to the charging connector. In some cases the terminal is beyond repair and a new phone must be purchased. Connectors themselves can become damaged from too many reinserts, but Neo-Plug eliminates the likelihood of damaged hardware by simply inserting the “plug” carefully into the devices port and it remains inside the terminal. That’s it!

Moving forward.

I know the idea is great. Also, I absolutely love the concept and application of the design. I have the technical knowledge and experience to make my idea a reality, which will ultimately, bring Neo-Plug to your device. Even though I love the idea and so does everyone else here at Lola Wireless, I don’t know if everyone else in the world will love it as well, which is why I’m glad Kickstarter is here to help me. Not only does Kickstarter allow me to share the idea with you, but also allows me to identify if people are interested in Neo-Plug. All the funds will be used to bring Neo-Plug to you. We are ready for a production run, only challenge at the moment is funding. Your support will allow this final step to be completed and bring Neo-Plug to your device and into the market for others to enjoy.

Why we need your help

Mass production and manufacturing is expensive and requires minimum commit levels. The $167,000.00 we are asking from the community is a carefully calculated number that will allow us to have the molds, parts, assembly, packaging and shipping accomplished. We even calculated the percentages that get taken out by the funding platform and worked it into the number. I have funded this project and idea up to this point with my company Lola Wireless Inc, and the next step unfortunately is way out of budget for me. This is the absolute minimum we need to bring Neo-Plug to you and to the market. We love the idea and so does everyone we show this too, but we can’t make this project a product without your help.

Meet the Team

The Neo-Plug Team


From left:

Brittney Harmon - Customer Service Representative

Briana Harmon - Sales Representative

Logan Nichols - Project Manager

Jacob Brozek - CEO / Developer

 

Project Timeline

We have spent countless hours and drank many pots of coffee in effort to produce the most accurate timeline for the project. We contacted all of our manufacturers and received commit dates from them, we asked for help with logistics from friends and family once the project is ready to ship. We have everything in place and are ready for a production run, all we need is funding. Please visit www.neo-plug.com for up to date progress.

February 2013

  • Make technical drawings for Neo-Plugs
  • Make a rough working prototype for proof of concept

March 2013

  • Rapid prototyping
  • Shooting final video footage and editing

April 2013

  • Launch a campaign for the project

June 2013

  • Receive campaign funding
  • Contact pledgers and collect contact details
  • Update website with pledgers information
  • Order customized pens for pledgers
  • Legal and licensing
  • Sign contract with the manufacturer and have them produce samples

July 2013

  • Start the manufacturing process
  • Check quality and test samples

August 2013

  • Provide feedback to factory and make adjustments if needed
  • Check quality of second samples

September 2013

  • Start mass production of Neo-Plug

October 2013

  • Receive manufactured product.
  • Pick random Neo-Plugs and have our staff test them to assure quality

November 2013

  • Start shipping Neo-Plugs to pledgers

 

Rewards Explained

Individual pieces explained

 

$2 - Your name, part of your name or nickname will be listed on www.neo-plug.com under the "Pledgers" section. We will gather the information from you once the project is funded.

$10 - You will receive one of a kind pen that will be custom made upon the project funding acknowledging that with your support Neo-Plug came to life. You will also be acknowledged on our website.

$10 - ***ADDITIONAL PLUGS ONLY*** If you need additional plugs for your device pledge here. The plug is the part that goes inside your device. Please note you need an adapter in order to use the plug, each pledge is for one additional plug for your device.

$10 - ***ADDITIONAL STANDARD Neo-Plug Adapters ONLY*** If you need additional adapters for your device pledge here. The adapter is the part that goes over your existing cable and connects to the device plug. Please note you need a device plug in order to use the adapter, each pledge is for one additional adapter for your device. The Standard Neo-Plug does not have an extension, it will look just like our CAD design.

$15 - ***ADDITIONAL 3’ or 6’ Neo-Plug Adapters ONLY*** If you need additional adapters for your device pledge here. The adapter is the part that goes on your existing cable and connects to the plug. Please note you need a plug in order to use the adapter, each pledge is for one additional adapter for your device. Choices are;

  • Micro USB 3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY
  • Apple Lightning 3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY - white color
  • Apple Lightning 3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY - black color
  • Apple 30 pin 3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY - white color
  • Apple 30 pin  3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY - black color

 

$15 -  ***Early Bird Special*** ONLY 100 Available! You will have an option upon successful funding of the project to select a Standard Neo-Plug of your choice for your device. We will also acknowledge your support on our website and send you the one of a kind pen with your Neo-Plug. The Standard Neo-Plug does not have an extension, it will look just like our CAD design.

$20 -  You will have an option upon successful funding of the project to select a Standard Neo-Plug of your choice for your device. We will also acknowledge your support on our website. The Standard Neo-Plug does not have an extension, it will look just like our CAD design.

$30 - You will have an option upon successful funding of the project to select a 3' Neo-Plug of your choice for your device. The 3' Neo-Plug will extend your existing cable another 3', how cool is that? We will also acknowledge your support on our website.

The 3' Neo-Plug choices are:

  • Micro USB - Black color only
  • Apple Lightning - white color
  • Apple Lightning - black color
  • Apple 30 pin - white color
  • Apple 30 pin  - black color

$35 - You will have an option upon successful funding of the project to select a 6' Neo-Plug of your choice for your device. The 6' Neo-Plug will extend your existing cable another 6', how cool is that? We will also acknowledge your support on our website.

The 6' Neo-Plug choices are:

  • Micro USB - Black color only
  • Apple Lightning - white color
  • Apple Lightning - black color
  • Apple 30 pin - white color
  • Apple 30 pin  - black color

Apple is a registered trademark of Apple Inc.

 

 Risks and Challenges

Every project is expected to face obstacles at one point or another during the project completion journey. With my extensive knowledge in electronics, business, and time management I will be able to keep risks to a minimum and conquer any obstacles I face along the way. The biggest obstacle I will face is making sure the product will start shipping when promised. I will personally be involved in every step of the project; from mold development to the manufacturing process in order to ensure each backer receives a top quality neo-plug by the expected deadline. Project updates will be posted on our website www.neo-plug.com and we welcome backers’ involvement and comments as the project progresses.

Why we need your help
Mass production and manufacturing is expensive and requires minimum commit levels. The $167,000.00 we are asking from the community is a carefully calculated number that will allow us to have the molds, parts, assembly, packaging and shipping accomplished. We even calculated the percentages that get taken out by the funding platform and worked it into the number. I have funded this project and idea up to this point with my company Lola Wireless Inc, and the next step unfortunately is way out of budget for me. This is the absolute minimum we need to bring Neo-Plug to you and to the market. We love the idea and so does everyone we show this too, but we can’t make this project a product without your help.
Meet the Team

The Neo-Plug Team
From left:
Brittney Harmon - Customer Service Representative
Briana Harmon - Sales Representative
Logan Nichols - Project Manager
Jacob Brozek - CEO / Developer
 
Project Timeline
We have spent countless hours and drank many pots of coffee in effort to produce the most accurate timeline for the project. We contacted all of our manufacturers and received commit dates from them, we asked for help with logistics from friends and family once the project is ready to ship. We have everything in place and are ready for a production run, all we need is funding. Please visit www.neo-plug.com for up to date progress.
February 2013

Make technical drawings for Neo-Plugs
Make a rough working prototype for proof of concept
March 2013

Rapid prototyping
Shooting final video footage and editing
April 2013

Launch a campaign for the project
June 2013

Receive campaign funding
Contact pledgers and collect contact details
Update website with pledgers information
Order customized pens for pledgers
Legal and licensing
Sign contract with the manufacturer and have them produce samples
July 2013

Start the manufacturing process
Check quality and test samples
August 2013

Provide feedback to factory and make adjustments if needed
Check quality of second samples
September 2013

Start mass production of Neo-Plug
October 2013

Receive manufactured product.
Pick random Neo-Plugs and have our staff test them to assure quality
November 2013

Start shipping Neo-Plugs to pledgers
 
Rewards Explained

Individual pieces explained
 
$2 - Your name, part of your name or nickname will be listed on www.neo-plug.com under the "Pledgers" section. We will gather the information from you once the project is funded.
$10 - You will receive one of a kind pen that will be custom made upon the project funding acknowledging that with your support Neo-Plug came to life. You will also be acknowledged on our website.
$10 - ***ADDITIONAL PLUGS ONLY*** If you need additional plugs for your device pledge here. The plug is the part that goes inside your device. Please note you need an adapter in order to use the plug, each pledge is for one additional plug for your device.
$10 - ***ADDITIONAL STANDARD Neo-Plug Adapters ONLY*** If you need additional adapters for your device pledge here. The adapter is the part that goes over your existing cable and connects to the device plug. Please note you need a device plug in order to use the adapter, each pledge is for one additional adapter for your device. The Standard Neo-Plug does not have an extension, it will look just like our CAD design.
$15 - ***ADDITIONAL 3’ or 6’ Neo-Plug Adapters ONLY*** If you need additional adapters for your device pledge here. The adapter is the part that goes on your existing cable and connects to the plug. Please note you need a plug in order to use the adapter, each pledge is for one additional adapter for your device. Choices are;

Micro USB 3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY
Apple Lightning 3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY - white color
Apple Lightning 3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY - black color
Apple 30 pin 3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY - white color
Apple 30 pin  3’ or 6’ extension cable ONLY - black color
 
$15 -  ***Early Bird Special*** ONLY 100 Available! You will have an option upon successful funding of the project to select a Standard Neo-Plug of your choice for your device. We will also acknowledge your support on our website and send you the one of a kind pen with your Neo-Plug. The Standard Neo-Plug does not have an extension, it will look just like our CAD design.
$20 -  You will have an option upon successful funding of the project to select a Standard Neo-Plug of your choice for your device. We will also acknowledge your support on our website. The Standard Neo-Plug does not have an extension, it will look just like our CAD design.
$30 - You will have an option upon successful funding of the project to select a 3' Neo-Plug of your choice for your device. The 3' Neo-Plug will extend your existing cable another 3', how cool is that? We will also acknowledge your support on our website.
The 3' Neo-Plug choices are:

Micro USB - Black color only
Apple Lightning - white color
Apple Lightning - black color
Apple 30 pin - white color
Apple 30 pin  - black color
$35 - You will have an option upon successful funding of the project to select a 6' Neo-Plug of your choice for your device. The 6' Neo-Plug will extend your existing cable another 6', how cool is that? We will also acknowledge your support on our website.
The 6' Neo-Plug choices are:

Micro USB - Black color only
Apple Lightning - white color
Apple Lightning - black color
Apple 30 pin - white color
Apple 30 pin  - black color
Apple is a registered trademark of Apple Inc.
 
 Risks and Challenges
Every project is expected to face obstacles at one point or another during the project completion journey. With my extensive knowledge in electronics, business, and time management I will be able to keep risks to a minimum and conquer any obstacles I face along the way. The biggest obstacle I will face is making sure the product will start shipping when promised. I will personally be involved in every step of the project; from mold development to the manufacturing process in order to ensure each backer receives a top quality neo-plug by the expected deadline. Project updates will be posted on our website www.neo-plug.com and we welcome backers’ involvement and comments as the project progresses.

story:
Why Roller Printer?

Manufacturing complicated models or custom parts have never been easier than now. 3D printers are the perfect tool not only for industry, advertising companies, design and architectural offices but also for you! Roller Printer designed by CORO Technology brings huge possibilities and surpasses the limits that once were unreachable.

Every part of Roller Printer was made with the highest level of precision and aesthetics. In the motion system of our printer you will not find a single plastic element, each and every one of them was made out of aluminum and processed on high-end machines. We also used brass, stainless steel, carbon fiber and polyamide because we realize that in order to reach highest standards we needed to implement both, best possible materials and innovative ways of tooling. Those things combined, are what makes Roller Printer simply outstanding!

Fast printing

One of many advantages of Roller Printer, is its printing speed. Practical whistle was made in around 14 minutes, beautiful statuette of an owl in less than 2,5 hours. All of that while simultaneously maintaining high quality. It really makes an impression!


Primarily order!

In Roller Printer everything has its own, strictly determined place. Every piece of free space has been utilized. Filament is located in the upper part of the machine. This feature allowed us to not to increase the size of Roller Printer. In addition, the container is closable, which protects our spool from dust and other external factors.

All parts combine into entirety, which presents astonishingly. When talking about filament, it is an important fact to mention, that Roller Printer is able to use all currently available materials:

  • ABS,
  • PLA,
  • Wooden filament,
  • Rubber filament,
  • Nylon,
  • Other.

Self-sufficient work

Roller Printer does not require constant connection with computer to work! All that is needed to start is a power cable and file on a microSD card. Our machine was designed both with practical and minimalistic approach. In the front, only LCD screen with rotary controller and a microSD slot are located. Those are the only things you need to control your printer. In the back, you can find power switch, power socket, RESET button, USB port and special socket for auto-leveling.


Brigthen your project

Roller Printer has the workspace illumination installed, which can be freely moderated. Delicate light during printing process and intense one after? No problem! Done!

Case made out of stainless steel looks incredible. You can decide on your own, whether your Roller will have its case brushed or polished.

 

Detaching printouts? Never again!

Roller Printer has the hotbed with power of 150W and to each machine we provide special pad from BuildTAK company, which will make you forget about detaching corners and make your printouts always look awesome.


Let's create together!

Roller Printer is based on open-source software, which gives us huge opportunities to regulate practically every parameter of work. When supporting our project, together with the printer you will receive special setup configuration for the Slic3r program, which we use to design our printouts. Included software contains 4 setups for the most popular materials: ABS, PLA, Wooden filament and Rubber filament.

With the growth of our company you can count on receiving updates to our settings. In the near future we will launch a forum for the owners of our printers, where you will be able to share your experience!


Don't forget to choose your t-shirt size!

We have prepared special, great-looking t-shirt, both for woman and men.
You can find size chart in FAQ!


What will you get?


Why us?

We believe, that together we can accomplish even more. Our product and experience combined with your knowledge and eagerness to work will allow us to create great things. Together!


FAQ

  1. Is the machine ready to use immediately after unboxing?
    Yes. Every printer was carefully manufactured and calibrated (does not include DIY sets). We also do test runs with every machine before sending it.

  2. How much filament is on 1 spool?
    0,5kg for ABS, PLA
    0,4kg for Wooden filament

  3. Where can I buy filament?
    Filament will be available in our on-line store. We recommend using our filament, so we can guarantee correct work and printouts quality. However, there is a possibility of using other filaments, with diameter of 1,75mm.

  4. What are the shipping costs?
    Shipping prices vary by location and country. For polish customers we offer free shipping. Estimated costs are: $49 for EU countries, $99 for USA/Canada and $199 for other countries.

  5. T-shirt size chart

story:
wiPot in the Press


http://gadzetomania.pl/56676,wipot-woda-na-kawe-gotowa-bez-wstawania-z-lozka-czajnik-sterowany-smartfonem

http://tabliczni.pl/2014/12/wipot-inteligentny-czajnik-z-aplikacja-mobilna/

http://thecrowdfundingcentre.com/?page=project&id=C1AYBG

http://www.frequency.com/video/wipot/209874639?cid=5-88301

Look This Project  - 
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1557236816...

It is present-day revolutionary teapot, which can be operated apart with the help of wi-fi. 

Now you don't need to get up from your favourite sofa, to abstract from your work or domestic chores - just forget about such things! 

You have wiPot now! You can easily operate it with the help of your smartphone! 

With the help of wiPot you can boil water in a pot from any place, where ever you are. Using the wiPot and its system of pre-boiling you save up to 5 minutes at one time and up to 48 hours during the year! 

wiPot is a clever pot - with the help of the app it can inform you when the temperature of water will be exactly you need and how much water is in a pot. You will be able to choose out of five introduced temperatures, because different water temperature is suitable for different kinds of tea. Otherwise you can spoil its refined taste. 

Forget all you know about teapots before. wiPot is the revolution in the world of teapots. It can take care of you and your family. Now you can spend more time with your family and there is no need to abstract from your daily chores - wiPot will do everything for you. 

wiPot knows how difficult can be to get up early in the morning. While you are getting ready for a new day it can boil the water to the desired temperature. It can also memorize the mode of selected time and days of the week and you don't need to remind all these modes to the teapot - It can do everything! 

As soon as you are in a zone of your domestic wi-fi your smartphone will connect to wiPot and will be ready to serve you. By the time you will get to your kitchen it will boil water with needed temperature for you. 

It is impossible to get burned when you use an wiPot. 

The final prototype will be produced with a special led lighting - the water temperature indicator. It is so easy: red means "too hot", orange means "hot", yellow means "warm" and white means "you can touch it". 

Also, wiPot will become the decoration of your kitchen and cool present for your family and friends.  Limpid and glass case doesn't produce harmful impurities into the water and doesn’t affect the taste of the water. If you won't have your smartphone within easy reach, but you'll need to know how much water do you have in your pot - it won't be a problem for you! You'll easily get such information. There is no need to pull the cover or to stare at the water level scale every time. 

You can operate the wiPot by pressing buttons on a practical heat-resistant base glass. 

Be the first to pre-order White wiPot for $75 plus $25 for tax and shipping. Get the coolest wiPot before all your friends and set the trend! 

This is a limited edition Indiegogo discount price!

Be the first to pre-order Classic Black wiPot for $75 plus $25 for tax and shipping. Get the coolest wiPot before all your friends and set the trend! 

This is a limited edition Indiegogo discount price!

Be the first to pre-order Amazing GOLD wiPot for $75 plus $25 for tax and shipping. Get the coolest wiPot before all your friends and set the trend! 

This is a limited edition Indiegogo discount price!


Get all three colors in one easy pre-order and save $25!


What We Need & What You Get

We need at least $100,000 to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce these wiPot. The donations you give us will be used to fund the molding, casting, production, packaging and shipping of the product. Every penny will be used to pay for making this wiPot into a reality.

In return, you will get the coolest and most unique wiPot. Each wiPot will come with fully functional  free Apps and LED indication! With your generous help, we'll be able to make this wiPot as high quality as possible. 

The Impact

We are a small and brand new company and without you, we cannot make it. Every donation matters to us, as this campaign determines whether or not we can continue working on this wiPot or not. Without your contributions, we cannot afford to pay for manufacturing on our own, so please donate! With your help, we can bring wiPot into the world and make the universe a happier place. 

We hope wiPot is another way for technology to make one part of everyday life just a little easier.  


Risks & Challenges

We are committed to bringing you a great product, and won't settle for anything less. Thus, during our manufacturing stage, we will actively work with our factory to make sure that everything is up to our standards. We recognize that this might result in a delay in our manufacturing process if complications arise, and we find it very important to make sure that these are shipped in a timely matter, but we will prioritize quality. Rest assured we will notify everyone of what's going on so there will be no surprises.

We know that every project has it's challenges.  We're confident that our experience helps us know what to expect and how to handle the unexpected! 

About wiPot:

 - Easy operation. Сonnect your wiPot to the electric main, switch on the app, choose the desired mode and within minutes you'll get a notice on your smartphone that your water is boiled! 

- Interactive led backlight 

- Auto power off when boiling water 

- Overheating protection 

- Power 110 and 220 w

- The capacity of 1.7 liters 

- Glass touch control panel 

- Water filter 

- Function of temperature maintenance 

- The water level scale 

You will get your wiPot with the built-in smart chip, which contains modern Wi-Fi module.


About wiPot APP: 

- Interactive water indicator in the app 

- Temperature Slider

- Programmable boiling. Choose the date, time, temperature and enjoy the result 

- Installing 5 different modes or you can choose your own temperature mode by using the slider. 

- Function of temperature maintenance 

- Сontrol from your house or office or anywhere in the world 

- You can open access to your wiPot to your family and friends. They can also enjoy the ease of management of this device. 

- Home mode will save your precious time in the morning, afternoon or evening. You can set the morning alarm and it will easily wake you up and boil the water for your morning tea or coffee. 

Allow this device to help you every time you come back home from the hard working day. Getting within range of your home network wi-fi wiPot will do its work. 

- Simplicity in every detail Try it and see for yourself. Even your kids can operate the wiPot.  

wiPot App runs on:

— Android running 4.1 or above.
— iPod touch, iPhone 4s, iPhone 5, iPhone 5c, iPhone 5s, iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, running iOS 7 or above.


Package: 

- wiPot  

- Exclusive wiPot app 

- A stand  wiPot

- User manual


F.A.Q.

Will it work for my home?

wiPot is designed to replace your current teapot.  wiPot needs three things to be able to work for your home: power, water and WiFi connection.

1) Direct Power - wiPot requires direct power.

2) wiPot need water=)

3) WiFi Connection - wiPot requires full time internet access via a B/G/N wireless network with 2.4GHz network, 20 MHz bandwidth and WPA security.

Will wiPot work on my Android and iOS?

Yes, We are developing both Android and iOS versions.

Can my wiPot be controlled by someone else's phone?

If you give them permission to! But no, someone can't steal control of your wiPot without your consent.

What power standards wiPot work with?

wiPot works with your current voltage. The Primary power in is 120/130 VAC or 220/230/240 VAC. 

Does the $25 tax and shipping include international shipping?

Yes! Rate to cover taxes and shipping for everyone all over the world! This includes customs as well. 

I accidentally ordered the wrong color/ put in the wrong address/ want to upgrade my perk. What do I do?

Please e-mail our customer service at wipot.team@gmail.com with your full name, address, Indiegogo account name, and the details of your issue. We will put you in a special list to make sure you get what you intended to order. 

The app will be free?

Yes!

Is it difficult to set up?

Super easy! 

Do you offer a warranty?

Yes, wiPot  is has a one-year manufacturer warranty!

If you Have More Questions ? Please send email for wipot.team@gmail.com

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn this wiPot into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons let the world know about our awesome wiPot!

Thanks for you Support!

Does the $25 tax and shipping include international shipping?
Yes! Rate to cover taxes and shipping for everyone all over the world! This includes customs as well. 
I accidentally ordered the wrong color/ put in the wrong address/ want to upgrade my perk. What do I do?
Please e-mail our customer service at wipot.team@gmail.com with your full name, address, Indiegogo account name, and the details of your issue. We will put you in a special list to make sure you get what you intended to order. 
The app will be free?
Yes!

Is it difficult to set up?
Super easy! 

Do you offer a warranty?
Yes, wiPot  is has a one-year manufacturer warranty!If you Have More Questions ? Please send email for wipot.team@gmail.com

Other Ways You Can Help
There are many ways to contribute! Even if you don't have the money right now, you can help us turn this wiPot into a reality by sharing this Indiegogo campaign with your friends. Just click on any of the Facebook, Twitter, and other sharing buttons let the world know about our awesome wiPot!


Thanks for you Support!

story:
We are at SXSW!
Come and visit us at our booth #1126 in the trade show!



Highlights

  • Koala is a small-sized, habit creating device which can be attached to any toothbrush.
  • Koala guides you to brush your teeth properly with sound notifications.
  • Koala has a buzzer inside therefore you don't need to get the sound notifications.
  • Koala records your brushing habits and helps you to improve your technique.
  • With mobile and web applications, you can manage and monitor your and your loved-ones brushing habits. 
  • Up to 6 months of battery life, water resistance and 4 colour options.

                                  

                                                  Don't lie, we know your secret. 

Most of you brush your teeth less then 60 seconds and act like you've brushed more than 2 minutes... Not cool... We want to change this dirty habit.


                                                 

Koala

Koala is the first aware-able product that is working as your personal tooth brushing manager. It attaches to your toothbrush and it helps you to measure, monitor and control your tooth-brushing habits. It will give you sound notifications while you are brushing your teeth until you complete 2 minutes of brushing. With the mobile and web applications, you can check your and your loved-ones brushing habits easily!

                               


Do you love your current toothbrush? We love it too, that's why we designed Koala in a way that it can fit most of the toothbrushes in the market. We are working with professional materials engineers to design the elastic case of the device so it can hold 30mm to 55mm circumference.

                          


                                            

Features

  • Sound Notifications, Koala guides you to brush your teeth properly with sound notifications and helps you to reach 2 minutes. It beeps every 30 seconds, first minute, second minute and third minute.
  • Brush Processing Algorithm, The trick of correct toothbrushing is in correct circular movements. With its unique Brush Processing Algorithm, Koala can estimate the quality of your brushing technique and helps you to improve it.
  • Mobile Application & Cloud,  You can always monitor your brushing data from our mobile applications or any web browser via cloud our cloud application.
  • Kid-Friendly, Your little ones will love it! Koala has games for them to play while brushing their teeth and tools for you to monitor their brushing habits.
  • Data Export & API, Your doctor needs it? Or you just want to brag about it? No worries, we got your back. You can easily export your data or use it in other applications which are compatible with our API.
  • iBeacon, Koala is also an iBeacon. Other developers are welcome to use it. What can be better than having one in your bathroom?


                              

Family Pack

Your little ones will love Koala! You can make this "boring" daily activity fun for them. They can play games while brushing their teeth, level-up in the family! Who doesn't love playing games right?


                                          

Colors

Koala also comes in colours. Customize your device by selecting from 4 available colors. We call them Snow, Pineapple, Turquoise and Lime green.



        




What we had done

We already built a working prototype and started testing Koala ourselves. PCB and external design are almost finalized and we are in close contact with respected manufacturers of Taiwan.



                                             

Timeline

March 2015 
  • Launch IndieGoGo Campaign
  • Finalize Materials Engineering
April 2015
  • End IndieGoGo Campaign
  • Finalize Production Engineering
  • Tooling & Certification Kick-off
May 2015
  • Finalize Firmware
  • Finalize Mobile Applications & Backend
June 2015
  • Production trials
July 2015
  • Tooling Finished
  • Scaling Production
August 2015 
  • Fulfillment   
  • Shipping

                                                          

Nerd Specs

Thickness: 4.9mm
Battery Life: Up to 6 months
Battery Type: Replaceable CR1225
Connectivity: Bluetooth 4.1 (Bluetooth Low Energy)
Material: Hidrophobic plastic
Compatibility: iPhone 4S & Later, iPad 3rd Generation & Later, Android 4.4 & Later with BLE

                             


                     

About Us

We are a group of engineers, designers and academicians that are trying to improve the human and machine relations, ease-of-use and simplicity. We are heavy believers in the quantified self movement where measuring your actions could improve your life style and increase your awareness.


Also we want to fill the gap between wearable devices and static sensor devices which might call aware-able devices. In other words, we would like to make our standard static everyday life products intelligent.

                                                                   Thank you!

Material: Hidrophobic plastic
Compatibility: iPhone 4S & Later, iPad 3rd Generation & Later, Android 4.4 & Later with BLE

                             

                     

About Us
We are a group of engineers, designers and academicians that are trying to improve the human and machine relations, ease-of-use and simplicity. We are heavy believers in the quantified self movement where measuring your actions could improve your life style and increase your awareness.

Also we want to fill the gap between wearable devices and static sensor devices which might call aware-able devices. In other words, we would like to make our standard static everyday life products intelligent.
