Share your ideas and be more effective on your meetings with
your business partners or collegues.


Scan in a SECOND
Scan in 5 seconds!
Scancase design and construction was made in accordance with
japanes techniques SMED which are used by TOYOTA. It made scancase really
simple and easy to built up or fold. Estimated time for builting up from 0 to
Scan is 5 seconds. This is making Scancase fastest scanner in the world.
 
Scancase with your TABLET
To make scancase properly working with your tablet you need to use TABLET PORT.
This really flat equipment holds with super strong magnets and it is attached and assembled really easily. Tablet port fits your scancase when is folded down. 




Scancase has ACTIVE
LIGHT
Scancase is using LED lights to increase quality of photos
and scans you´re taking.
12 super white colour LED lights are making Scancase
suitable for every enviroment.
Active light makes your photos without any shadows that may appear depending on the natural light direction and you can
use it in complete dark enviroment as well.
Active Light make inside Scancase enviroment with 120 lux which is pretty cool.
LED used in automotive industry is powered by BYO 9V battery.


Scancase is thin,
light and durable
Scancase is made from the most durable materials which are
making him still flat, thin and easy to carry.


Materials and
production
To bring our ideas to life we need to produce at least 1000
pcs of these amazing SCANCASEs. Our product is using special durable cardboard
which is 3 times laminated, powerful magnetic tapes, LED lights which are used
in automotive industry.
Scancase is using technologies such as offset printing and
die cutting, which are expensive but needed to get best quality products.

All the production is
made in European union.
.
Thank´s for your support!


Anything else?
There are numerous smartphone applications that will significantly increase the functionality of your Scancase. They allow you to do OCR scans, scan directly to PDF, create multi-pages documents and upload directly to Google Docs. Check the Appstore or Google Play Store.

FAQ
What is the difference between Scancase BASIC, L, XL or XXL?
Scancase BASIC - scancase for your smartphone 
Scancase L - scancase for your smartphone with Active Light for better scans & photos
Scancase XL - Scancase BASIC with Tablet PORT for scanning with your tablet
Scancase XXL - Scancase XL with Active Light for your smartphone or tablet
How big is Scancase?
Scancase is big as A4/US letter envelope. Fits pretty much to all cases. Is just 0.6 cm / 0.3 inches thin and 500g light.


How about postage?
In the price for scancase is worldwide postage included.
Contact us for postages for 10 or more products, we will give you better shipping price.

What device does the Scancase work with? 
Scancase is optimized to work with smartphones & tablets especially the iPhone 5S/5C/5, Galaxy S4/S3. But it works just as well with any device that has a camera.
How do i use my Scancase as a live projector for presentations or web meetings?
If you have an iPhone and Apple TV your already set up via "Airplay" which lets you mirror exactly what’s on your mobile display to the big screen. If you have a Samsung Galaxy phone you can use "AllShare Play" to do the same thing. For more information check out http://www.apple.com/ and http://www.samsung.com/
There are many other free apps on Appstore or Google play store which you can use with your smartphone or tablet such as SKYPE or WEBCAM.

How do i use Scancase as a photocopier?
Apple devices have a great function called "AirPrint", which allows you to wirelessly print to any AirPrint-enabled printer. There are many available from HP, Epson, and Canon. Just visit the Apple Online Store or view a list of AirPrint-enabled printers and find one that’s right for you.
There is also an application for the Mac called Printopia which turns most printers connected to a Mac into an AirPrint enabled printer.
http://www.ecamm.com/mac/printopia/
Legal Stuff
iPad, iPhone and Samsung, Apple logo and Apple are registered trademarks of Apple Inc. and are not affiliated with our product in any way.
For any kind of information please contact us on scancase@outlook.com

story:
ABOUT THIS PROJECT

The PadTop holds your iPad® and an Apple® Wireless Keyboard in a laptop-like case.

If you're like us, you:

  • Get frustrated when typing on the iPad's screen
  • Think the Apple wireless keyboard is the best option for the iPad
  • Want protection for both your keyboard and iPad while on the go

The PadTop solves all these problems with one easy-to-use case

The profile of the PadTop is sleek and thin. It will fit in your bag with ease. The PadTop opens nearly 180 degrees, allowing you to type in almost any position.
   
The profile of the case will redirect sound from the back of the iPad towards you. A simple notch in the top of the case makes for easy removal of the iPad.
   
You will feel right at home typing on a PadTop, just like a laptop. Rubber bumpers help to eliminate movement on hard smooth surfaces.

 

What Colors Will be Offered & What's it Made Of?

The PadTop will be offered in black or white for the initial campaign.  If successful, other colors can be made available.

The PadTop is made of high-quality reinforced plastic for durability and stiffness.  We like high quality products too so don't worry, it'll be strong, it will have a great feel, and it will look great!

Why the Apple Wireless Keyboard?

Third party keyboards usually don't work well in the long run.  They are usually too small to use for long periods of time and don't have a comfortable typing "feel".  

Apple's wireless keyboard has a fantastic typing feel, is constructed well, and is FULL SIZED!  We've tried many of the third party keyboards and none of them stack up to the quality, style and reliability of Apple's wireless keyboard.  

Additional PadTop Benefits

  • The iPad and keyboard are well secured in the PadTop, which protects them from damage during use, transport or light drops.  
  • The keyboard is easily installed or removed for use on your Mac or other PC.
  • The PadTop gives you access to all of the ports on the top and bottom of the iPad for charging and inserting headphones.
  • Opening and closing the PadTop automatically turns the iPad on and off

We could not believe that there wasn't a case out there that held the iPad together with Apple's wireless keyboard.  Out of sheer need, we took matters into our own hands and designed our own!  

Current Status

We have gone through countless design iterations and printed our near final prototype (seen in our video). Through this latest prototype, we have learned a few things about our design that needed slight modification.   We have made these minor changes and are working with our tooling suppliers to complete the design of our injection molds. 

We are ready to start production as soon as we can obtain funding for the tooling and the initial orders of parts.  This is where you come in...

We Need Your Help

Injection mold tools are incredibly expensive, especially for larger, more complicated parts such as the PadTop.  Raw materials, piece parts, assembly labor and other costs add up to a significant up-front investment.  In order to make the PadTop a reality, your pledges are greatly needed.

Based on minimum order quantities for parts, we've come up with a necessary funding goal of $65k, including a little buffer to account for unforseen challenges.  The largest expense by far is attribted to fabrication of the mold tooling, followed by raw materials and part costs, licensing and other misc. fees.  If any funds are left over, we'll we re-invest the money in the project.

Want More Information?

Head over to our website and ask any questions you might have.  Thank you for your interest in the PadTop, and please spread the word! 

www.PadTopCase.com

 

About Us

We are a small team based in Northern California.  

Don is our lead engineer and manufacturing guru.  He started his career as a rocket motor manufacturing engineer, and currently leads manufacturing teams to deliver on critical program milestones for a Northern California Aerospace company.  

Brett is our program manager.  He started at the same company eight years ago, and currently leads several multi-million dollar R&D programs.  Brett is an experienced manager who focuses on style & quality, driving the execution of his programs within schedule and on-budget.  

We love our mobile electronics and want them to be both functional and fun.  We pride ourselves in making quality, well-engineered products that are durable, practical and stylish!

Help us to make the PadTop a reality.  Thank you for your time, and we hope to place your name on our site as a valued supporter.

 

NOTE: We are not affiliated with Apple Corporation, and the Keyboard is not included in any of our perks...Just sayin!

story:
-  English follows spanish description  -


Te ha pasado que es tarde, estás en una fiesta y quieres irte a tu casa, pero no hay nadie que te acompañe? Cuántas veces has tenido que volver sólo a casa en micro o a pie? Todos sabemos que andar solo por la calle de noche es muy peligroso. La mayor parte de los delitos se cometen a estas horas.

Muchos se organizan a la salida de la fiesta, con la gente que hay en el lugar pero difícilmente logran armar un grupo aunque en el lugar siempre hay gente con destinos en común.

Con Yoin! no necesitas esperar que los demás salgan o estén listos, ni tampoco organizar un grupo por tu cuenta preguntandoles a todos hacia donde van. Yoin! Te arma la vuelta permitiendo que te agrupes con personas que van a tu mismo destino.


Quiénes somos?

Somos estudiantes de diseño de la Universidad Católica de Chile. Nuestro proyecto surgió en un taller de quinto año y tras ver el éxito y nivel de desarrollo que logramos, decidimos seguir adelante con el trabajo para avanzar y perfeccionar tanto el funcionamiento, como la interfaz de nuestra aplicación. Desde entonces hemos llevado a cabo estudios etnográficos, testeos y validaciones buscando obtener feedback que nos permita iterar y mejorar Yoin!




¿Por qué Yoin? - Beneficios

Los jóvenes en general tienen un máximo de 2 mil pesos (CL) para moverse de vuelta en la noche. Si quisieran volver en taxi, por ejemplo, con este monto podrían recorrer unos 3 kms. Distancia muy por debajo del promedio que deben recorrer para llegar a sus casas. Al agruparte con Yoin!, puedes armar viajes en conjunto con las personas que van hacia tu mismo destino y dividir la tarifa, logrando llegar a sus casas y compartir un recorrido cómodo y seguro.


¿Cómo funciona? - Primer Prototipo

Cuando llegas a la fiesta o un poco antes de irte, ingresas a la aplicación para ver la lista de viajes que se realizarán desde tu misma ubicación y unirte a ellos, o para crear un nuevo viaje y encontrar con quienes compartir este trayecto. Siempre podrás ver detalles de los viajes activos, como el lugar de encuentro, hora de partida e integrantes del grupo.

Los grupos de viajes se ordenan por hitos o lugar de destino. Estos son puntos predeterminados dentro de la ciudad que son de interés común y congregan a varias personas que viven cerca.

Luego, cuando se reúnan pueden decidir cómo partir desde el lugar. Ya sea a pie, en micro o en taxi, compartiendo la tarifa.

Para reconocer a los mejores compañeros para hacer un Yoin!, la aplicación te permite evaluar a los integrantes del viaje según puntualidad y compromiso.






Si llegamos a la meta

  • Programar la aplicación compatible tanto para Android como iOS
  • Incorporar hitos en las 45 comunas de Chile
  • Lanzar la aplicación antes de 6 meses de cumplida la meta

Nuestro plan de financiamiento es fijo; si es que no conseguimos llegar a la meta las colaboraciones serán devueltas a quienes hicieron sus aportes. Es por esto que  necesitamos que compartan nuestro proyecto para así llegar al mayor número de personas que conozcan la app!


Riesgos y Desafíos

Confiamos en que Yoin! será de gran ayuda para todos los jóvenes y para la seguridad ciudadana, sin embargo, hay asuntos que escapan de nuestro control como podría ser un inicio menos explosivo del que proyectamos, razón que postergaría el lanzamiento de la aplicación por un breve tiempo hasta que consigamos una base de usuarios que garantice una experiencia satisfactoria para el usuario.

Esperamos contar con su apoyo en la difusión del proyecto y con nuevas ideas que podríamos integrar a nuestro proyecto.

Nos importa mucho la opinión de nuestros usuarios y colaboradores, es por esto que estaremos todo el tiempo atentos a consultas y recomendaciones por los medios de contacto disponibles.

Además, nos comprometemos a mantenerlos informados durante todo el proceso y ante cualquier cambio que se pueda presentar.


Comparte!

Se parte de Yoin! Lo más importante es que compartas nuestro proyecto ya sea a través de las herramientas de la página web o en las redes sociales, invita a tus amigos a conocer la app y comparte con nosotros tus ideas.
Hagamos de la vuelta un viaje más seguro y barato!

Gracias,
Equipo Yoin






Has it happened to you that you are partying until late at night and you want to go home but there is no one that will join you in your way back home? How many times did you have to return alone to you home on bus or walking?

We all know that walking alone on the streets at night is dangerous. Most crimes are committed at those hours and lonely people are an easy target for criminals.

Many try to organize with other people when leaving a party, but they hardly get to assemble a group although there are people heading to the same direction.

With Yoin! you don't need to wait others to leave or to be ready, neither assemble a group by your own asking everyone their destination.  Yoin! is a app that arranges your way back home allowing you to join up with people who have to go in your same direction.

Who are we?

We are Design students from Universidad Católica de Chile. Our project started in our 4th year laboratory. From the first moment every one liked our idea and since we had advanced a lot in the project, we decided to keep developing both the operation and the look of our app. Since then we have conducted ethnographic studies, testings and validations, seeking feedback that allows us to roam and improve.

Why to group?

Young people in general have a maximum of CL$2.000 (US$3 on actual change) to move around at night. If they wanted to take a cab with that money they could only pay a 3km trip. Distance that is way below the average distance to their home. Grouping with Yoin!, you can assemble trips with people that goes to you same destination and split the fare reaching your home sharing a comfortable and safe trip.

How it works?

Open Yoin! Once you have arrived to the party or a little before leaving, and you will be able to see the list of active trips. You can explore them and see their details before you Yoin! them or you can create a new trip if you don't find one that suits you.

Trips are organized by milestones. These are predetermined sites in the city , which are of common interest or that congregate many people that live around. After Yoining you will be able to access the detailed information of the meeting and when little time is left for the exit you will get a warning notification. Later when you have already joined you can decide the best way to leave the place: either walking, taking the bus or sharing a cab fare. Don't forget to evaluate your travel partners according to punctuality and commitment with the trip at the moment of leaving or finishing the journey.


Risks and Challenges

We trust that Yoin! will be of great help to all young people and public in general, however, there are issues beyond our control that could lead to have a less explosive start than we plan.  In this case, the launching of the app could be delayed for a short time until we put together a large enough user base that guarantees a satisfactory user experience. We look forward to your support in spreading the project and to your attendance at events on that soon we will be reporting. We care about our user’s and partner’s opinion, which is why we are all paying attention to inquiries and recommendations by the means of contact that we have available for you. In addition, we promise to keep you informed throughout the process and on any changes that may occur.


If we reach the goal we will be able to:

  • Develop the application for both Android and iOS
  • Incorporate 45 landmarks in districts of Chile
  • Launch the application within 6 months of the goal accomplished



Thanks,
Yoin team

story:
What is Tox?

Do you ever worry that the messages that you send using Facebook, Skype, google hangouts, or Facetime aren't private? There is evidence out there that you are right. There is an ARS technica article proving that Microsoft has read Skype messages that the senders and receivers intended to be private. Google scans messages in order to show you the best ads, and apple's iCloud is notorious for mistakenly leaking information. Finally, Facebook's security and privacy record is like Alabama-the lowest in everything. Every week you hear about a new informational leakage/security breach or how some agency is spying on more people. Toxcore has already solved all of these problems-toxcore has always been encrypted end to end from day one using a tested, respected and proven crypto-library NaCl for private communications. Unlike other messengers which require a phone number, an email address, or access to all to your friends and acquaintances, Toxcore fights to protect your privacy as well as your information. If you haven't heard of us, Toxcore is a networking library originally created to facilitate and enable secure communication through video voice and text in a decentralized manner-no servers to go down, no third party company to sell your secrets/ or pictures, and no data to be stolen,

Multi-Device is Missing

All of this encryption, privacy, and security sound great, right? What are we waiting for? Sign me up right now! Well, there's one small problem, you can't yet use one identity to start a conversation from your laptop, switch to your desktop to make a video call, and finish from your phone because you're running a little late. And may God have mercy on your soul if you forget to add your friend's iPhone to each separate contact list (he really should upgrade to Android, but that's a discussion for later...)  Getting multi-device up and running will solve that issue by connecting and syncing each of the devices you own without needing to use somebody else's servers, keeping the privacy and security Toxcore was created to provide, while allowing seamless transitions from device to device, matching the simplicity of the other, insecure services that shall not be named. 

The Coder

My name is Greg Mullen (better known as grayhatter), developer of uTox-the fastest light weight client that runs everywhere (and the only client working on Windows, OS X, Linux and Android). I have put countless hours over the last two years into Tox and uTox. I have spent the better part of my time over the last three months creating proof of concept for multi-device. Currently multi-device is incomplete, but working. Given the progress I've made so far, I believe that a feature-complete and usable version can be ready within 45 days if I am able to work on it full-time.

The Reason

I believe very strongly in the future of Toxcore and this project. I am tired of using a fractured, insecure, or frustrating messaging system that guarantees no right to privacy. I want to be able to send my credit card number to someone and video call with my girlfriend without having to worry about the next anonymous leak. If you do too, you can help by making a donation to enable me to be able to put full-time work hours into this project in order to have it operational as soon as possible.

The History

The last funding campaign for any part of Tox was created and funded by irungentoo on September 3rd, 2015. That campaign was 111% funded at $6,056, resulting in complete file transfer support for Toxcore, a full-spec currently being used to duplicate and prove the validity and completeness of the protocol being re-implemented in Haskell and Rust. With a little luck, Multi-device will be next!

The Proof

You can follow the commits on my Github Profile or, if you think your life is way too interesting, you can watch me code through my livestream to add some boredom to your life-might be a good sleep aid.
story_txt: What is Tox?Do you ever worry that the messages that you send using Facebook, Skype, google hangouts, or Facetime aren't private? There is evidence out there that you are right. There is an ARS technica article proving that Microsoft has read Skype messages that the senders and receivers intended to be private. Google scans messages in order to show you the best ads, and apple's iCloud is notorious for mistakenly leaking information. Finally, Facebook's security and privacy record is like Alabama-the lowest in everything. Every week you hear about a new informational leakage/security breach or how some agency is spying on more people. Toxcore has already solved all of these problems-toxcore has always been encrypted end to end from day one using a tested, respected and proven crypto-library NaCl for private communications. Unlike other messengers which require a phone number, an email address, or access to all to your friends and acquaintances, Toxcore fights to protect your privacy as well as your information. If you haven't heard of us, Toxcore is a networking library originally created to facilitate and enable secure communication through video voice and text in a decentralized manner-no servers to go down, no third party company to sell your secrets/ or pictures, and no data to be stolen,Multi-Device is MissingAll of this encryption, privacy, and security sound great, right? What are we waiting for? Sign me up right now! Well, there's one small problem, you can't yet use one identity to start a conversation from your laptop, switch to your desktop to make a video call, and finish from your phone because you're running a little late. And may God have mercy on your soul if you forget to add your friend's iPhone to each separate contact list (he really should upgrade to Android, but that's a discussion for later...)  Getting multi-device up and running will solve that issue by connecting and syncing each of the devices you own without needing to use somebody else's servers, keeping the privacy and security Toxcore was created to provide, while allowing seamless transitions from device to device, matching the simplicity of the other, insecure services that shall not be named. The CoderMy name is Greg Mullen (better known as grayhatter), developer of uTox-the fastest light weight client that runs everywhere (and the only client working on Windows, OS X, Linux and Android). I have put countless hours over the last two years into Tox and uTox. I have spent the better part of my time over the last three months creating proof of concept for multi-device. Currently multi-device is incomplete, but working. Given the progress I've made so far, I believe that a feature-complete and usable version can be ready within 45 days if I am able to work on it full-time.The ReasonI believe very strongly in the future of Toxcore and this project. I am tired of using a fractured, insecure, or frustrating messaging system that guarantees no right to privacy. I want to be able to send my credit card number to someone and video call with my girlfriend without having to worry about the next anonymous leak. If you do too, you can help by making a donation to enable me to be able to put full-time work hours into this project in order to have it operational as soon as possible.The HistoryThe last funding campaign for any part of Tox was created and funded by irungentoo on September 3rd, 2015. That campaign was 111% funded at $6,056, resulting in complete file transfer support for Toxcore, a full-spec currently being used to duplicate and prove the validity and completeness of the protocol being re-implemented in Haskell and Rust. With a little luck, Multi-device will be next!The ProofYou can follow the commits on my Github Profile or, if you think your life is way too interesting, you can watch me code through my livestream to add some boredom to your life-might be a good sleep aid.

story:
HEXA cable cube – Solution to messy cords.

We have always struggled with keeping laptop and phone chargers and other cables under control at our desks. We are glad to present you HEXA.


HEXA can be your office/home decor. Most importantly our laser gravering can bring personality to HEXA for personal use, as a gift or company souvenir.

At 6.35mm x 6.35mm, the wire passageway is the perfect size for ANY modern day charging cables, headphones, or any other wires that need to be organized.


Each HEXA will be 2.5cm x 2.5cm x 2.5cm with a 6.35mm x 6.35mm x 2.5cm cable passageway.

Available in Gold and Silver

We want HEXA to have MORE personality for our supporters and their companies. That is why laser gravering is now AVAILABLE for all the supporters!






Help us share the project with people who love design and art!




Your funding will go towards the best metals we can find, premium quality packaging, logistics, and an accelerated production run for HEXA. Your funding will help to create the world's beautiful and functional cord management system.


Thank you for taking the time to check out our project. We truly appreciate it!


Risks and challenges

If HEXA is successfully funded, we will have to make sure everything goes according to plan to meet the promised deadline. We have manufacturing, operations, and logistics set up and ready to go. The funding raised on Indiegogo will be used for production and manufacturing. Although we do not see any direct risks and challenges, there are always indirect or unseen tasks that may present itself during the process of productions. We hope to run everything as streamlined as possible and also ahead of schedule to get the most functional desk art into your hands.

Legal Disclaimer

Legal disclaimer is required in order for us to launch this project.

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
Ends are the days of consumers and frustrated users fiddling with bundles of annoying cables and having to replace them every time. We at Futurizta Tech have broken through with a new design of an extremely versatile and highly durable Chimera Cable. The Chimera cable features Lightning, USB-C and Micro USB on one end as well as a never seen before USB C-A on the other end.

What if you could just bring 1 cable that is capable of charging all your gadgets?  

Capable of Charging 99% Gadgets on the market

 

 

 

Learn more about our Chimera Cable: 

With 21st century being the Information Age, we are surrounded by different tech and often with different interfaces. The ability to switch between interfaces with Chimera cable in a matter of seconds to fast charge or transfer between devices just makes life easier no matter what you own or where you are. 

 Whether you own an Apple or Android device, tablets, cameras, wireless headphones and no matter if you are travelling, on a business trip or just chilling with some friends, Chimera have got you covered in every situation.

Why kill two birds with one stone when you can kill five with our cable? ?

What else?

Bet you've never seen this before!

USB-C is dubbed as "USB standard of the Future" meaning that it will become a commonly used interface in the future. It is currently implemented in the latest gadgets such as Apple's Mac book, Samsung's Galaxy Smartphone, Google's Chromebook, Sony's Headphone, GoPro and more.

At Futurizta, our mission is to create futuristic gadgets to "Futurize your life" which we promise will make your life easier - Just like our Chimera Cable.  It is future-proof by having USB-C and USB C-A Adaptor on the other end, which unlocks unlimited possibilities and functions.

 

 

Phone to Phone Charging

Phone to Mouse Operation

What's more? 

FAST CHARGING!

Besides being multi-functional, our Chimera Cable is also capable of Fast Charge and Stable Data Transfer!  

It is capable of QC2.0, QC3.0 and data transfer up to 480mb/s. With Quick Charge 3.0, you could hit up to 80% in as little as 35 minutes!

The high-quality Internal Copper Core is capable of carrying more current to provide accelerated fast charging which can go up to 140% faster than conventional charging cable!

Chimera Cable is capable of carrying 5V/2.4A - Large enough to Fast-Charge most devices. 

Our Chimera Cable is certified FCC, CE and RoHS compliant! It was certified by a reputable, qualified and accredited testing laboratory. Certifying our product assures our customers that we meet strict guidelines for compatibility and standards compliance for product safety and environment safety. 

 

SMART CHARGING + Stable Data transfer

 

Chimera Cable's built-in smart chip provides a safe and stable charging by automatically monitoring and regulating the output power, providing you with a peace of mind while charging your gadgets so you don't have to worry about overcharging and damaging your gadgets. 

Wait? There's more? 

EXTREME DURABILITY!

A cable that doesn't last and withstand everyday wear and tear is useless no matter how many functions it has. 

We understand the frustration of constantly having to replace broken cables and we've engineered our cable to be 

  • Extremely Durable
  • Break-resistant 
  • Tangle-free

This is done by combining Military Grade Nylon and Aluminium Reinforced Connector with up to 5000+ bending lifespan! 

Military Grade Nylon Reinforced Cable

Unlike the thick and stiff "Durable" cable currently on the market, we've engineered and conducted countless experiments to find the perfect balance between softness and durability. Our cable is light and flexible for easy bending and storing yet still strong enough to endure everyday wear and tear! 

In case of any defects, we got you covered with our hassle-free 12 months warranty!

The World's Most Versatile Cable

Check out this review written by Hazel (Australia Brisbane Student Ambassador)

story:
Greetings potential Investors! Welcome to my idea. Its my hope that if you're reading this, you are as curious about the Google Glass product as I am. What can it really do? How would it impact life? Would it be a tool that would enhance my life enough to be worth all the pitfalls that might come with it (funny looks, privacy concerns, etc)? I have been blessed with an opportunity to purchase the glass in the explorer program and I need your help! My ultimate desire is to populate a blog site with experiences in day to day life with the product, take questions and suggestions for trials, and provide the readership with all the information they might need when considering the product for themselves. Considering that this particular product has very little publically known about it AND that google is heavily rumored to be releasing a commercial version sometime later this year, I believe especially early adopters would be interested in learning more about it - especially from the perspective of a non-journalist, family person that I believe you could easily identify with. The funding I am requesting is to cover the product itself, incidentals to cover the reward process(more on that in a moment), and fees. I have chosen the all or none option related to funding here - so I really need your help in getting the word out to make this a reality.

So what would you, as an investor, get out of this project? Well, aside from what I am sure will be at minimum an entertaining and informative blog revolving around this exciting tech, I am offering a 3 tiered benefit, all focused around your opportunity to interact with the product via google hangouts. There will be a half hour oragami instruction session, a full hour baking instructional, or a 1 to 1 table top activity instruction, of your choosing(for instance - want to learn how to play cribbage?). I am a Certified Therapeutic Recreation Specialist by degree so I am fully capable to instruct you in a new leisure activity that we could decide on together if you like. I believe this will be a unique opportunity to provide you, as an investor, return value and give you a first hand experience with this product.

In short, thank you for reading this proposal and, if you believe in it, for contributing! I sincerely hope you consider sharing this with any folks you feel also might be interested in investing and with any luck, I will be seeing you soon!

http://www.google.com/glass/start/

story:
There is a shield for everything.

Powering your Arduino in the wild? There's a shield for that.
High resolution measurements? There's a shield for that.
Wireless connectivity? There's a shield for that.

What could you achieve with a wireless measurement shield which makes project setups simpler?

What if you could use it anywhere and power it with anything?

For this we built BLEcision, a wireless sensing shield for Arduino micro, and a compatible data logging app for iOS and Android.


Precision + BLE = BLEcision

The shield is Arduino Micro compatible, only one of the two serial ports (serial1) and two pins for I2C are used, all other pins are available.

The flexible power management supports a wide input range between 0.85 up to 5V, so any power source can be used, such as USB, batteries, solar cells, etc. The shield also powers the Arduino board and provides a precise 5V reference voltage. 

The stable reference voltage and the integrated 16 bit analog to digital converters provide 16 highly accurate input channels (or 8 differential ones). The nominal resolution is 64 times higher than the standard Arduino ADCs. Our ADCs all contain built in preamplifiers to adapt the input range in order not to lose any resolution. A standard connector enables secure electrical contact between board and sensors.

Bluetooth 4.0 LE provides wireless connectivity to other devices (for data logging and control).


Compatible Data Logger App

On the receiver side we have built an iOS app to plot and record the data. This app further provides a back channel to switch digital I/Os of the Arduino on and off. The data are displayed in realtime, each channel is selectable and resizable. CSV data export, pinch-to-zoom, adjustable visual feedback and many more features are integrated. We will also provide an Android version of the app for BLE-compatible devices.


Example Applications

A linear potentiometer on a violin fingerboard measures precisely the finger position. The data is streamed wirelessly to our Logger App:

Thanks to the large input range you can detect all the notes played across the finger board, but if you zoom in, the high resolution allows you to see the most subtle movements while performing a vibrato.

Force measurement with a load cell with an output voltage range of 300mV:

With BLEcision you can program the gain of the analog to digital converter to fit the input range of different analog sensors to maximize the resolution. Doing so, a load cell with a range of 1.5 kg can still detect the slightest forces.

FSR sensor fixed on the forearm:

With BLEcision you can even detect the movement of single fingers.


Current State:

A Working Prototype

Next Steps

We have a working prototype, but we still need to:

  • refine the PCB layout
    - integration of custom BLE circuitry
    - full pin compatibility with Arduino micro
  • finalize firmware and iOS/Android programming
  • create documentation and example code

With your support we will be able to complete the final steps and go into production.


Team

We are a team of three currently founding a technology startup:  Alberto Calatroni holds a PhD in information technology and electrical engineering from ETH Zurich. David Bannach has a diploma in computer science from ETH Zurich and submitted his PhD thesis recently. Both worked together in projects on opportunistic human activity recognition. Tobias Grosshauser is senior researcher at the Wearable Computing Lab at ETH Zurich and has more than 10 years experience in R&D in industry and academia.

story:
SleeKeys: A physical keyboard for iPhone and  Samsung Galaxy phones using NO electricity or Bluetooth – at 1/8” thickness. Makes typing on a touchscreen smartphone a truly amazing experience.

Our team at SleekTec owns a collection of smartphones, including iPhones and the Samsung Galaxy series. We tend to type a lot – often and long. And we hate doing it on these all-touch devices.

Smartphones are incredible machines, but typing by way of tapping on a glass window is just a little unnatural, and highly inaccurate. We have been searching high and low for a better replacement technology, but have always hit a brick (er... glass?) wall. So, like every red-blooded American team of innovators would do, we set out to create our own.  

What is it?

Today, we present to you SleeKeys, a precision innovation that promises to change your smartphone typing experience for the better. SleeKeys is a sleek, simple and clever iPhone case that sports an integrated full-size QWERTY keyboard, providing a faster, better typing experience less prone to mistakes. A wicked-cool flip mechanism allows you to deploy and hide the keyboard with a one-handed flip motion – flip it open, flip it closed. To reiterate, you flip it out when you need a keyboard, and it disappears when you’re done typing. Intrigued? Read on!

How’s it special?

It is NOT a Bluetooth keyboard. It uses NO electricity. It NEVER needs charging of any sort. So yes, we believe it’s pretty special. We have developed a patent-pending technology that helps SleeKeys interact with your phone seamlessly. When flipping the keyboard onto the front on your smartphone it aligns perfectly with the phone’s on-screen keyboard, and you are ready to begin typing immediately with no wait or connectivity hiccups. The SleeKeys typing experience is one akin to that of the best tactile BlackBerry keyboards. Input is precise, button feedback is noticeable and satisfying, and the overall fit and finish of the keys is perfectly engineered and machined. We are modern-day consumers ourselves. So we understand that a good smartphone accessory can be no less impressive than the phone itself. In every stage of development of our SleeKeys project, we have assessed and reassessed every conceivable fault and flaw. We have obsessed over a design simultaneously stylish and functional to build a finished product that we would love to go out and buy ourselves. The result of all this research and development and our patent-pending typing technology is also a thinness wow factor. The SleeKeys keyboard is just 1/8” thick – the heights of two pennies – and it weighs next to nothing!

What did it take?

Getting here wasn’t easy. We never even expected it to be so hard… But our dedication to excellence from dream to design to development to delivery continuously pushed us forward. We started out working on our little idea more than a year ago. Working with top design firms in North America, our team considered multiple directions and design options. We made more than a few prototypes to test and prove our technology, and only then began the case design process. A lot of money went into the final design, getting it done right here in the US. Truth be told, we could’ve designed it in China for 5 percent of what we spent here… but we don’t believe in skimping on anything or in applying shortcuts. Every small detail of this product has been hammered out to perfection, making this a smartphone case that can compete with the best of them. To share a little secret, we’ve spentmore than $15,000 just on prototypes to make sure that the keys have the right feel and function.

Are we there yet?

Nearly. It’s very well known that many startup innovation projects get delayed and run into glitches and complications of every variety. We made a big decision in not addressing the Indiegogo audience with a raw or struggling prospect. We have waited until now, until the concept has been finalized to our utterly demanding standards. The manufacturing process has already begun, with the next step being the bringing of a ready product to the masses.

How can you help?

You can help in more ways than one! You can refer your friends to our Indiegogo page and thus help us become more popular. You can write to us with suggestions for upcoming products or product features. But, most importantly, you can help us along in the manufacturing process with funds that will ensure we bring our product to fruition as quickly as possible. As we stand now, every dollar matters. For your partnership, you are of course privy to the first batch of our ready products, before anyone else! Manufacturing is very expensive, involving the overcoming of logistic, linguistic and operational barriers. It is in this stage of our journey that you play the largest part. To produce the very best product possible, we hired a leading sourcing company in Boston. They put us in touch with a Hong Kong manufacturing firm known for its experience and exquisite manufacturing techniques, particularly with molded smartphone accessories. Here too we shied away from cheaper, less proven companies, even as that could’ve lowered our costs by 50%.

Production of SleeKeys for iPhone 5 and for the Samsung Galaxy S3 is already underway. We hope to receive the first sample parts mid-May. Allowing a full month for quality inspection and second rounds of functionally testing, we estimate a full-scale release date in mid-July. You may note that this is a rather prolonged timeline, but we are allotting ourselves a margin of error, not to disappoint the Indiegogo public with delayed delivery on promises.

As soon as we get our hands on the Galaxy S4, we will begin a brand new SleeKeys design for it. We estimate our S4 model to arrive end of August. Initial color offers are black and white; complementing the highly popular colors of the smartphones they are indented to cleave to. We hope that, with your strong support, we will be able to develop SleeKeys in more colors and for additional phone models.

We have designed a belt clips/holster companion to SleeKeys for both iPhone 5 and the S3. You can choose to pre-order SleeKeys on its own or as a combo offer with our custom holster.

SleeKeys for iPhone and S3 will retail for $50 (estimate), and the holster will retail for $20 (estimate). Indiegog funders get SleeKeys for just $40, and\ the combo offer for a bargain at $50.

We hope that you find Sleekeys as innovative and as exciting as we do. You are cordially invited to support our project, and we thank you so much for your interest in SleeKeys.

And always remember: If typing on your smartphone drives you mad, don’t flip out – just flip out SleeKeys!
story_txt:
SleeKeys: A physical keyboard for iPhone and  Samsung Galaxy phones using NO electricity or Bluetooth – at 1/8” thickness. Makes typing on a touchscreen smartphone a truly amazing experience.
Our team at SleekTec owns a collection of smartphones, including iPhones and the Samsung Galaxy series. We tend to type a lot – often and long. And we hate doing it on these all-touch devices.
Smartphones are incredible machines, but typing by way of tapping on a glass window is just a little unnatural, and highly inaccurate. We have been searching high and low for a better replacement technology, but have always hit a brick (er... glass?) wall. So, like every red-blooded American team of innovators would do, we set out to create our own.  
What is it?
Today, we present to you SleeKeys, a precision innovation that promises to change your smartphone typing experience for the better. SleeKeys is a sleek, simple and clever iPhone case that sports an integrated full-size QWERTY keyboard, providing a faster, better typing experience less prone to mistakes. A wicked-cool flip mechanism allows you to deploy and hide the keyboard with a one-handed flip motion – flip it open, flip it closed. To reiterate, you flip it out when you need a keyboard, and it disappears when you’re done typing. Intrigued? Read on!
How’s it special?
It is NOT a Bluetooth keyboard. It uses NO electricity. It NEVER needs charging of any sort. So yes, we believe it’s pretty special. We have developed a patent-pending technology that helps SleeKeys interact with your phone seamlessly. When flipping the keyboard onto the front on your smartphone it aligns perfectly with the phone’s on-screen keyboard, and you are ready to begin typing immediately with no wait or connectivity hiccups. The SleeKeys typing experience is one akin to that of the best tactile BlackBerry keyboards. Input is precise, button feedback is noticeable and satisfying, and the overall fit and finish of the keys is perfectly engineered and machined. We are modern-day consumers ourselves. So we understand that a good smartphone accessory can be no less impressive than the phone itself. In every stage of development of our SleeKeys project, we have assessed and reassessed every conceivable fault and flaw. We have obsessed over a design simultaneously stylish and functional to build a finished product that we would love to go out and buy ourselves. The result of all this research and development and our patent-pending typing technology is also a thinness wow factor. The SleeKeys keyboard is just 1/8” thick – the heights of two pennies – and it weighs next to nothing!
What did it take?
Getting here wasn’t easy. We never even expected it to be so hard… But our dedication to excellence from dream to design to development to delivery continuously pushed us forward. We started out working on our little idea more than a year ago. Working with top design firms in North America, our team considered multiple directions and design options. We made more than a few prototypes to test and prove our technology, and only then began the case design process. A lot of money went into the final design, getting it done right here in the US. Truth be told, we could’ve designed it in China for 5 percent of what we spent here… but we don’t believe in skimping on anything or in applying shortcuts. Every small detail of this product has been hammered out to perfection, making this a smartphone case that can compete with the best of them. To share a little secret, we’ve spentmore than $15,000 just on prototypes to make sure that the keys have the right feel and function.
Are we there yet?
Nearly. It’s very well known that many startup innovation projects get delayed and run into glitches and complications of every variety. We made a big decision in not addressing the Indiegogo audience with a raw or struggling prospect. We have waited until now, until the concept has been finalized to our utterly demanding standards. The manufacturing process has already begun, with the next step being the bringing of a ready product to the masses.
How can you help?
You can help in more ways than one! You can refer your friends to our Indiegogo page and thus help us become more popular. You can write to us with suggestions for upcoming products or product features. But, most importantly, you can help us along in the manufacturing process with funds that will ensure we bring our product to fruition as quickly as possible. As we stand now, every dollar matters. For your partnership, you are of course privy to the first batch of our ready products, before anyone else! Manufacturing is very expensive, involving the overcoming of logistic, linguistic and operational barriers. It is in this stage of our journey that you play the largest part. To produce the very best product possible, we hired a leading sourcing company in Boston. They put us in touch with a Hong Kong manufacturing firm known for its experience and exquisite manufacturing techniques, particularly with molded smartphone accessories. Here too we shied away from cheaper, less proven companies, even as that could’ve lowered our costs by 50%.
Production of SleeKeys for iPhone 5 and for the Samsung Galaxy S3 is already underway. We hope to receive the first sample parts mid-May. Allowing a full month for quality inspection and second rounds of functionally testing, we estimate a full-scale release date in mid-July. You may note that this is a rather prolonged timeline, but we are allotting ourselves a margin of error, not to disappoint the Indiegogo public with delayed delivery on promises.
As soon as we get our hands on the Galaxy S4, we will begin a brand new SleeKeys design for it. We estimate our S4 model to arrive end of August. Initial color offers are black and white; complementing the highly popular colors of the smartphones they are indented to cleave to. We hope that, with your strong support, we will be able to develop SleeKeys in more colors and for additional phone models.
We have designed a belt clips/holster companion to SleeKeys for both iPhone 5 and the S3. You can choose to pre-order SleeKeys on its own or as a combo offer with our custom holster.
SleeKeys for iPhone and S3 will retail for $50 (estimate), and the holster will retail for $20 (estimate). Indiegog funders get SleeKeys for just $40, and\ the combo offer for a bargain at $50.
We hope that you find Sleekeys as innovative and as exciting as we do. You are cordially invited to support our project, and we thank you so much for your interest in SleeKeys.
And always remember: If typing on your smartphone drives you mad, don’t flip out – just flip out SleeKeys!

story:
The Story

Most portable chargers on the market are underpowered with either low power output, charge only 1-2 devices, or you would have to place the device on a specific spot in a specific way.

As a result, charging these clucky devices will take longer than you expect! What's worse? You misplaced your phone on a wireless charger and consequently woken up with a phone that has an almost empty battery!

Now it is time for a change to bring the new style of wireless charging with complete liberty and power!

Arbipowers' smart alignment technology allows you to place and charge the devices anywhere on the pad for complete freedom of placement.

When your device is placed on the pad - the algorithm will automatically activate the best-positioned coils that "align" with the device to achieve the highest charging speed.

 

Arbipowers can charge your Android phone or iPhones at 15W full speed wirelessly at your fingertips.

 

Arbipowers is designed to charge your phones, earbuds, smartwatches - all seamlessly at a maximum 33W charging output!

Just so perfect for the Apple family!

 

By applying the latest SoC wireless charging solution - Arbipowers can manage and deploy the charging process of multiple devices with intelligence and dynamically allocate the best coils to different devices in achieving the greatest performance.

 

Arbipowers incorporates a magnetic wireless charger for your Apple Watch! Place it on the Arbipowers, and your Watch is set to charge!

You can also use it as a portable power bank for the Apple Watch - even better!

 

Ordinary wireless chargers are not very power efficient and generate a lot of heat, causing your devices to reduce or stop charging wirelessly. Our smart temperature control and cooling technology effectively extend the Arbipowers's service life and keeps you and your devices safe at all times!

 

Full metal aluminum-alloy appearance with tempered glass material in craftmanship.

The aluminum-alloy base design is also an important component for the heat dissipation system, which can ensure Arbipowers will work as efficiently as possible.

 

 

Arbipowers offers the same quality and speed in wireless charging even if your phone is worn with a phone case.

Overheat Protection
The Overheat Protection (OHP) is designed for identifying an overheating of the internal PCB board and deactivate the charging to prevent damage to the devices.

Over Voltage Protection
The power supply feature within the Arbipowers that cutoffs the supply whenever the input voltage exceeds the present value.

Over Current Protection
A safety measure against excessive currents or current beyond the acceptable current rating of the devices.

Foreign Object Detection (FOD)
Our FOD system can detect foreign object bodies, like coils, keys, and other metal materials, and will alert you when such indications occur with our LED lid flashing.

 

Apple:
iPhone SE (2nd generation) / 8 / 8 Plus / X / XR / XS / XS Max / 11 / 11 Pro / 11 Pro Max

Huawei:
Huawei Mate 20 Pro / RS Porsche Design / 30 / 30 Pro, Huawei P30 Pro / P40 Pro

Google:
Google Nexus 4 / 5 / 6, Pixel 3 / 3 XL / 4 / 4 XL

Samsung:
Samsung Galaxy S6 / S6 Active / S6 Edge / S6 Edge Plus / S7 / S7 Active / S7 Edge / S8 / S8 Active / S8 Plus / S9 / S9 Plus / S10 / S20 / Buds / Fold / Alpha, Note 8 / 9 / 10, Leader 8, W2016

HTC:
HTC Droid DNA, HTC Windows Phone 8X

...and many more Qi-ceritfied devices - if you are not sure if your device would work with Arbipowerss, contact us HERE!

 

We believe Arbipowers will drastically outperform other wireless chargers on the market and will be the best wireless charging solution and style for your phones, your earbuds, and your smartwatches!

We are excited to share with you that our trial production has already begun; all we need now is your support and funding to get it to mass production.

 

We provide up to 12 months of premium warranty, responsive customer service, and technical support so to offer you the best quality in shopping experience and service.

We are a team of creative designers and technical engineers committed to providing high-quality and innovative products in the charger industry.

With the best-in-class designers and engineers at our product's helm, Arbipowerss combines interactive design, leading technology, and our industry experience - it is the newest, and one of the greatest products we are presenting to you today!

 

Any Questions?

 

The current design for Arbipowers has been finalized and the initial prototype has been built. We've already laid out the production plan and started organizing with our suppliers and logistics. During designing the initial prototype, we have already discussed with the partners we have been working with for years.

We have a well-prepared logistics structure for mass production to fully deliver on our promises; however, there is always a chance to run into challenges when it comes to handling international orders.

To avoid this potential setback, we've built strong relationships in logistics in all parts of the world: North America, Europe, and Asia. We are confident that we can resolve any issues at any time.

In all matters, we will always keep open and transparent communication with you and update frequently with our progress.

story:
About the project

Got lost in numerous consoles while relaxing at home? Got confused with operations? Tired of searching the necessary one? Or maybe you don`t like listening to loud music when you`re in a café with your girlfriend and you want to choose more romantic melody? We have a solution to solve your problems! We are pleased to present you small and convenient gadget which will be easily connected to your mobile phone and can be useful everywhere! Too many problems will be solved by so simple solution! Now you can easily choose the right channel, switch on the light and also start up the air conditioner. So, our development is for you and for your comfort!


  Gadget is plugged in 3.5 Jack connector of mobile phone or tablet and allows to control household appliances by infra-red signal. It works not only as transmitter but also as a receiver. Thus, if you haven`t found your appliance in database you can teach the application to control your own device.


  Nowadays every televiewer has a mobile phone at hand every time. But the quantity of panels and their complexity is constantly growing that has a direct effect on prices. Our device is cheaper than any console. If there is one universal remote that controls everything, why do we need the others?


Why iRemote?

iRemote supports 2371 devices from 558 manufacturers of household appliances. The database is constantly growing because the device has such functions as learning, recognition (the device auto-detection) and of course multi-button.

All the panels in our database are divided into 12 types. They are:

  •  Air conditioning;
  •  Boiler;
  •  Sound System;
  •  Vacuum cleaner;
  •  DVD-player;
  •  Fan;
  •  Lighting;
  •  Weather Station;
  •  Camera;
  •  Projector;
  •  Satellite;
  •  TV.
                   

The device variation

You know, many people, including me, watch satellite TV. So, we have to use 2 consoles: one of them is for a TV set and another one is for a set-top box. And it`s extremely inconvenient! External sound system will only add problems with control. Our innovative device can easily solve this problem.  But why don`t we use the gadget for an air conditioner control too, for instance? Just compose the most useful buttons of all the consoles on the hold screen. It allows you to control household appliances with the greatest comfort. Moreover, you can create desktop widgets for a maximum speed control.

It is often necessary to make a sequence of actions. For example, to turn on TV, receiver or audio- system and to set air conditioner to the desired temperature. So do it with only one click. All you need is to press a special multi-button!

             

The console customization

With the help of our innovative device you can change the button`s location on the screen by a simple motion and create the most convenient option for you. It can be a variant with the most important buttons, if you have a small screen, or may be a version with all the buttons at once, if your screen size is large.


Furthermore, there is a possibility to distribute the panels in rooms that makes control easier and allows to avoid console`s disorder. This way you can divide TV remotes, located in a living room, in a kitchen and in a bedroom, from each other.


The innovative application design

Our application is made in a new style by Google, called Material Design, which combines smoothness, spatial volume and brightness of colours. This application design operates on Android devices from 2.1 version.


The device auto-detection

You don`t know the name of the device? Now it`s not a problem at all. iRemote will automatically detect it! Often you just can`t know the name of the device, but you crave for an influence on it. For instance, the music in a café is so loud, that frequently you can`t even hear your interlocutor. In this and also in other situations iRemote will surely help you out.


Why it is so important for us

  Initially, the project was intended for a personal use. For example, I have 5 RCUs in my flat. Suddenly one of them broke down and I couldn`t buy a new one because of the high prices. At that moment I finally came up with a new idea – to make a console by myself, which can combine all the panels at once in it. My friends appreciated this decision and asked me to make them the same device. Over the time, this versatile device has gained a popularity, and it was decided to assemble a team and to start its mass production.

  When creating a team, the main requirement was the applicant`s knowledge of this problem and besides, the most important was not a desire to earn money, but the eagerness to help people get rid of problems with RCUs. This approach allowed us to gather those people, who know from their own experience, what you need.


  A part of the collected funds will be used to create the ergonomic gadget design, to develop the application, using iOS platform, and also to support the relevance of the RCU signals database. The remaining funds will be spent on the production and the delivery of the first line of devices. During the implementation of the project, we will provide a detailed report on the use of all the raised money.

Risks

 Our project, like any other, has its own internal risks. These are:

  • The risk of increasing the terms of the project realization due to a financial delay. To minimize this risk, there will be a thorough control of the project.
  • The risk of increasing the cost of the project is virtually absent because nowadays there is a gradual decrease of the production value in Russia associated with a depreciation of the ruble.

  In case of a failure to implement the project, all the collected funds will be definitely returned.

  So, if you like our project, but you don`t have a possibility to help it financially, you can share the link with your friends. To do this, use Indiegogo share tools. Your support and assistance will greatly help us.

  Thank you for your time!

story:
I usually wear a Bluetooth headset while I am driving. It is very useful!

If someone calls me when I am driving, I can talk with him and focus on the road with Bluetooth headset easily. However, I cannot write down the messages at the same time because it will be dangerous to remove my hand from the steering wheel.

In the market, I have not found any Bluetooth headset device with voice recording function. But now, we can simply press a button to record our messages easily by using Taker.

Taker is a newly developed functional Bluetooth headset which does not only allow users to make and receive calls, but also to record voice and allow mobile control of the camera function.

This is so great!


A Bluetooth headset helps for voice recording while you are driving

While driving on the road, you will use a Bluetooth headset to make and receive calls. Sometimes, you want to record some messages but you cannot write them down immediately. At the moment, Taker can help you to record messages. When you are talking with someone, press the side button of Taker headset, your conversations will be recorded in your smartphone APP- Taker Voice. If you want to play back your last voice record, you can double press the button of Taker headset.

Voice is voice recording App. Users can use this voice recording App to record messages anytime. You can also share your voice format file to email. 

Trial Edition available on Google Play

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=apptask.android.ptt


Playback your last voice record

You can double press the side button of Taker Bluetooth headset, it can control your smartphone remotely and plays back your last voice message on your smartphone.


How to use Taker Headset



Taker headset is not only for voice recording. We are also developing more useful APP to pair with Taker headset like Snapshot Taker which is a camera APP for smartphones. Users can use Taker headset as a remote shutter to take self-snapshots.

Firmware support

You can pair Taker headset with all mobile phones which have internal Bluetooth technology. This is the same function as traditional Bluetooth headset. If you are using smartphone and pairing with this, you can remotely control the APP in your smartphone.

Taker Voice APP is a voice recording app. It works on Android system but not on iOS system because Apple does not open the source code for recording.

Taker Snapshot APP is a self-shot camera and works both on Android and iOS system.



We have come a long way to create and develop, but we still need help. You can see that we has already developed a working prototype from a concept. You will be interested in it! 




Risks & Challenges

Taker Bluetooth headset is different from the traditional Bluetooth headset. Taker headset can remotely control your smartphone APP to be more functional. If you go through the Bluetooth market, you cannot find a headset with more functions pairing with your smartphone.


About Us

Roy Law is leading Apptask Ltd and has a wide range of experience in mobile app development. He is passionate about the latest software technologies and solving tough challenges.

Edward Fung  is a consumer electronics product manager with 18 years of experience, Edward has created and developed many popular products. He also has a background in Electronic Engineering with five years’ experience in hardware and software design.

Gordon Kwok is a Product Designer. He enjoys driving so he understands the needs of most drivers. He believes that Taker headset can help drivers to drive safely and easily. He is instrumental in the overall development of the Group, primarily in terms of customers’ acquisitions, product development and management of contract manufacturers.

down immediately. At the moment, Taker can help you to record messages. When
you are talking with someone, press the side button of Taker headset, your
conversations will be recorded in your smartphone APP- Taker Voice. If you want
to play back your last voice record, you can double press the button of Taker
headset.





Voice
is voice recording App. Users can use this voice recording App to record
messages anytime. You can also share your voice format file to email. 
Trial Edition available on Google Play
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=apptask.android.ptt

Playback your last voice record



You can double press the side button of Taker Bluetooth headset, it can control your smartphone remotely and plays back your last voice message on your smartphone.




How to use Taker Headset








Taker headset is not only for voice
recording. We are also developing more useful APP to pair with Taker headset
like Snapshot Taker which is a camera APP for smartphones. Users can use Taker
headset as a remote shutter to take self-snapshots.
Firmware supportYou can pair Taker
headset with all mobile phones which have internal Bluetooth technology. This is the same function as
traditional Bluetooth headset. If you are using smartphone and pairing
with this, you can remotely control the APP in your
smartphone.
Taker Voice APP is a
voice recording app. It works on Android system but not on iOS system because Apple
does not open the source code for recording.
Taker Snapshot APP is a
self-shot camera and works both on Android and iOS system.


















We
have come a long way to create and develop, but we still need
help. You can see that we has already developed a working prototype from a
concept. You will be interested in it! 















Risks & Challenges

Taker
Bluetooth headset is different from the traditional Bluetooth headset. Taker
headset can remotely control your smartphone APP to be more functional. If you
go through the Bluetooth market, you cannot find a headset with more functions
pairing with your smartphone.

About Us
Roy Law is
leading Apptask Ltd and has a wide range of experience in mobile app
development. He is passionate about the latest software technologies and
solving tough challenges.
Edward Fung  is
a consumer electronics product manager with 18 years of experience, Edward has
created and developed many popular products. He also has a background in
Electronic Engineering with five years’ experience in hardware and software
design.

Gordon Kwok is
a Product Designer. He enjoys driving so he
understands the needs of most drivers. He believes that Taker headset can help
drivers to drive safely and easily. He is instrumental in the overall
development of the Group, primarily in terms of customers’ acquisitions,
product development and management of contract manufacturers.

story:
TriCase is an ultra-thin protective case for iPhone (4, 4S and 5) that features a dual (simple and magnetic) built-in earbud holder, an integrated kickstand and a magnetic mount. 

TriCase is manufactured from durable lightweight plastic. During the design phase of our product, we wanted to combine all the useful features that an iPhone case can have, without the case becoming unpractical for everyday use. Unlike other kickstand cases, TriCase (with its 3mm) is the thinnest. Thanks to the rapid prototyping (3Dprinting) technology we could come up with the best version of TriCase. 

The TriCase achieves high level of functionality, while it combines the most useful features that a protective case can have. Thanks to the materials used the TriCase seamlessly fits into the modern curves of the iPhone.

TriCase will be available in black and white colors.

 

One - Kickstand

The built-in kickstand lets you view your favorite apps hands-free in landscape and also in portrait orientation - ideal for watching a short video with friends, playing games, making video calls or typing.

 
 

Two - Mount

If the kickstand function is not enough or you want to mount your phone in a unique way, the embedded magnet function of TriCase comes into play. With the help of the built-in (cellphone safe) magnets you can attach your iPhone to any magnetic surface. You can easily pop it onto your fridge, dry-erase board or the display of your MacBook.

 

Tri - Earbud holder

The integrated earphone holder can hold your earbud on the go safely and efficiently. Just wrap the cable around your phone and pop the end of the earbud into the holder

 

+1 - Magnetic earbud holder

As a faster way to secure you headphones, you can also easily attach them to one of the four (hidden) magnets on the back of TriCase.

 

FAQ

Magnets and the iPhone

Please note that the built in magnets of TriCase won’t have any effect on your phones performance or memory (iPhone uses flash memory). However, if you ever want to use the compass of your phone while TriCase is attached, you should pop it off, as magnets can slightly disturb it.

 

Apple & iPhone are registered trademarks of Apple, Inc and are not affiliated in any way with TriCase.

story:
Visit the website at xpleo.dk

WHO ARE WE?

Xpleo consists of a group of professional programmers, designers, statisticians, communicators and jounalists. The Xpleo headquaters is situated in Copenhagen, Denmark, however, we also have a small team working out of Dehli, India.

Everyone in Xpleo is currently working as volounteers because we believe in this project. We work full time, part time or free time – as much as we possibly can. We aim to get funded, so we can dedicate all our time to develop Xpleo.

WHAT DO YOU GET AND WHAT DO WE NEED?

By supporting us, you will become a part of Xpleo and you will be able to give your vote and decide what functions we should develop first. We cannot offer you merchandise or other goodies. However, we can offer you a chance to become part of the development of a democratic and transparent platform, for sharing knowledge in a new and advanced way.

If we reach our goal of 5,500 dollars the money will be spent on expanding the functionality of the platform. At the moment the user can only vote on individual politicians and parties. We want to hire more programmers to help develop the ability to evaluate the politicians in connection with the specific social issues they vote on. We also want to expand the users ability to see the statistics over time and from where in the world votes are coming. For this purpose, we will develop a Timeline that shows the distribution of votes over time in conjunction with important events. We will also provide a Geographical map so the user can see where in the world the votes are coming from. And this is where you come in.

We want to start the democratic process right now. By contributing you can either vote for us to first develop the Timeline or Geographical function. Help decide what we should focus on.

HOW WAS THE IDEA OF XPLEO BORN?

We have been working on the project for almost a year but the idea is more than a decade old. It was born out of a frustration with the way we evaluate the world around us, the leaders we elect and even the products we purchase. We witnessed the evolution of technology and saw how people started using the internet to share their lives, thoughts and opinions, but the websites they used did not seem efficient for this purpose. Today, evaluation is done by either giving “likes”, stars, or with long descriptive text. But “likes” and stars don't provide any information about what particular aspect was voted on, and reading long paragraphs of text takes a long time and can't be quantified. What was missing was a system that allowed the user to vote on specified aspects and on a scale. Such information could provide reliable statistical data which could be easily read by anyone.

We believe that the free flow of information and social networks has an important role to play in the development of democracy and social participation. Social appropriation of the Internet is becoming a significant part of the democratic process. Social media is being widely used by both activists and citizens to relay information which is not always accessible through traditional media, and also to bypass censorship. It`s apparent that the emergence of new technology and communication options has formed a new arena for public debate. The phenomenon also presents a new and innovative way to ensure the vitality of democracy. Xpleo is a product of this new reality.

The platform is currently in beta stage and we have decided to focus on politicians, political parties and social issues to begin with. This, however, is only the beginning. In the future we plan to expand. One of our long term goals is to get photo recognition into your smartphone, so you can take a picture of anything and instantly see what others have voted and easily vote yourself.

If you can't back us up financially, you can still help us! Sign up as a beta-user at xpleo.dk and share your opinions on politicians and social topics. Xpleo is 100 % dependent on your opinions to make the database as complete as possible. Together, we will develop the democratic platform step by step.

Sharing our idea on Facebook, Reddit, Twitter, etc will also help us tremendously! Thank you for your support!

Please visit www.xpleo.dk and share your vote.

story:
The Slip wallet by STOW

Everything you need, nothing you don’t.

Black Texture, Blue Texture, Red Texture, Gray Texture,

Olive Green, Strikers White,  Sea Water Teal, Sea Foam, Light Tan/White
 

The Slip is an aluminum minimalist wallet engineered from the ground up with an aerospace engineer’s stamp of approval.

  • CNC machined from a single piece of 6061 aerospace aluminum 
  • Engineered and manufactured 100% in the United States
  • Credit cards are securely stowed and easily accessed
  • Plenty of space for cash, business cards, and loyalty cards 
  • Secure universal phone attachment system
  • Lightweight—only weighs one ounce    

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

After years of searching for a suitable wallet to no avail, I began developing a wallet for myself in October 2017. Then ensued a 10-month effort of designing, engineering, prototyping, and refining my ideal minimalist wallet. The result was the Slip, a wallet worth creating. 

Before I was able to launch the Slip wallet, my entire manufacturing facility, as well as my home, prototypes, machines, tools, and everything else I owned, was burned in the July 2018 Northern California Carr Wildfire. The disaster was devastating, but it wasn’t enough to destroy my vision. In the the aftermath of the fire, work on the wallet continued. Failure just wasn't an option.

15 months of hard work, revisions, and dedication later, the Slip is ready to be introduced to the world. This project is a big step toward helping my company rise from the ashes—literally. When you choose to back my business, you will receive the finished Slip wallet, and be a key player in helping to rebuild STOW. 

I am extremely excited to present this innovative new wallet, and hopefully many future STOW products, to the world. Thanks for your support!   

 

 

 

Ready to Ship

 

Staged for a fantastic color

 

Your Slip's in the mail

story:
The GorillaStand is a durable and stylish dual stand for an iPhone and an iPad (and most tablets). The stand's primary function is for viewing movies on your iPhone while in bed (it sits on your lap).  You can lay down in your bed and relax while watching a favorite movie.  It can also be used for Skyping or FaceTime calls.  The iPhone bracket is adjustable to allow a perfect viewing angle in all situations to avoid eye strain.

It also functions well in the kitchen with your iPad to watch a movie or display recipes while cooking. Place your iPad or tablet on the two small fingers near the bottom of the uprights, then lean it against the uprights.

The GorillaStand folds up for traveling. Works great on a plane to watch a movie. One key feature of the stand is a speaker sound reflector for the iPhone so you don’t have to cup your hand to hear the audio.

Available in Stark White, Supernova Red, Glorious Blue, and Deep Black.  It was designed in America, and will be manufactured and assembled in the good old USA.

Features:

  • iPhone stand for lay down viewing
  • iPad stand
  • Folds for traveling and storage
  • Sound reflector for iPhone Speaker
  • Adjustable viewing angle
  • Durable and strong

Applications:

  • Bed
  • Kitchen
  • Car when traveling with kids
  • Hotel
  • Plane

Why Indiegogo: We want to bring our GorillaStand to the market. We think it’s a great product, but costs are too high if we use 3D printing to manufacture them. We need you to help us raise the funds to buy the injection molding dies so we can provide a reasonably priced product.

The Plan: When we reach our funding goal we’ll order the four dies to be machined and begin working with Protomold to prepare to make a 10 sample piece run. We’ll then examine these for fit, finish and functionality. If no modifications are necessary Protomold will do a production run to satisfy the requirements of our backers and additional pieces to have product to ship post-Indiegogo.

What are the funds for: The funds will be used to get the injection molding dies machined, and order the production run to fulfill the perks.

Project status: We have designed six versions in CAD. We’ve built three prototypes. When we were satisfied with Design #6 we ordered the components to be 3D printed from Shapeways.com. This prototype was used to test the actual functionality and for the submission video. We expect to make some slight design changes to accommodate the differences in manufacturing from 3D printing to injection molding.
