story:
TrackBoard is Made in Australia

If you own an Apple Wireless Keyboard and an Apple Trackpad then the TrackBoard is for you. The TrackBoard allows you to comfortably control you Apple Mac computer from your lap. This is a must have accessory for all who have setup with a TV connected to a MacMini computer.

The funds raised through this crowd funding project will allow me to build a durable mould and source materials in bulk reducing the end price of the TrackBoard. The TrackBoard source material will be laser cut with a laser etched logo. Initially, I am planning to produce the prototype TrackBoard with a hand pressed mould. However if enough funding is collected then I will source a plastics manufacturer and pressure press the end product.

I design my products to be simple, practical and provide value for money. I believe that the Track Board meets all three of my principles. Take a look at the great features of the Track Board bellow.

Ultimate Accessory for the Apple Track pad and Wireless Keyboard. This is one accessory your home computer setup should not be without.

Simple Design - this product is designed to be simple and cost effective. The TrackBoard is moulded out of a single sheet of Acrylic. There are no joints or movable parts ensuring it will last.

Flexible Configurations - the TrackBoard's design allows you to arrange the keyboard and track pad in various ways. Its symmetrical design ensures that the Apple Track pad feet always have good contact with a surface allowing them to function flawlessly.

Laser Cut from high quality acrylic - I only use the highest quality Acrylic that's 10x impact strength of glass. It has a chemical resistance to common acids, alkali, salt spray, petroleum oils and greases.

Laser Cut Logo the Track Board logo is elegantly laser etched into the top of the Track Board.

Light Weight - the Track Board is light weight, weighing less than 350 grams, yet its design ensures it’s rigid even if being picked up by one corner.

Time Line for the Campaing is as follows:

Note: Apple Keyboard and Apple Track pad shown with the product description are not part of the sale. These devices are only used to show the usage of the Track Board.

story:
Here is the app free trial:  FREE TRIAL CLICK HERE

 

Or Buy the Full Version:  FULL VERSION CLICK HERE

 

Remote Text Message, Notification and Location Phone Spy

This is a product for Android Devices that remotely tracks information from a Target Device.

APP RECEIVES:
- TEXTS
- MESSAGES
- NOTIFICATIONS
- LOCATION
- APP INFORMATION

Tracks Spied Messages in Real-Time
Runs Invisibly
Negligable battery drain

For use of parents keeping an eye on their children, or employers tracking their employees, as just two use cases.

NOTE: You must have legal and physical access to the target device!

#textspy Text Spy #messagespy Message Spy #locationspy Location Spy

Are we living in a day and age where device monitoring is necessary? Millions of people interact on social media each day, and a growing majority of these people are kids. Nobody has ever taught online etiquette, and it's now showing in an increase in bullying, trolling and internet suicides. Do we need to reproach this new virtual social landscape? Many developers, and parents, think that the answer to this question is a strong "Yes".

Queue the Text Message Notification and Location Spy App: One of the best spy apps available, marketed as a Family Monitoring and Employee Tracking app, remotely captures texts, messages, notifications and location, in real time, and relays it to a provided email address. There is no trace of the app on the device, and it takes up very little resources.
You can check out the app here: Google Play Store

Another question arises, however, on the topic of monitoring your child's messages: will people use this technology to spy on others illegally? Like a spouse who wants to spy on their significant other, and see if they are cheating, for instance. Or even more nefarious, agents trying to spy on executives or government officials devices for malicious purposes. Where is the line drawn with these spy apps? Is there a line?

Family / Employee Monitor (Enterprise Tracking) notes that it is illegal to use said app as a Spy App or Surveillance App, without consent, and separate from parental or employee use-cases. Is this notice enough to stop a criminal from acting and using this 'spying app' as a 'Spy App'? Obviously not. But the same question arises with any kitchen knife or any digital camera - just because the former can be used as a weapon; the latter as an illegal spying device, doesn't mean that is their intended use. And a criminal with intent will act like a criminal with intent does: criminally.

So Family / Employee Monitor (Enterprise Tracking) is a perfectly legal Spy App, and can and should be used if it is going to prevent a child from being bullied or getting mixed up in the wrong crowd. Furthermore, Family / Employee Monitor (Enterprise Tracking) is a very useful remote surveillance tool for employers to use on employees who might otherwise be wasting company time and resources. Text Message Spy App, or Family Monitoring App, this is an app that needs to be explored, and a topic that should be talked about.

Check out Family / Employee Monitor (Enterprise Tracking) for yourself on Google Play and give it a try. There is even a free trial to get things started.

Text Spy, Message Spy, Notification Spy, Location Spy, Texts Spy, Messages Spy, Notifications Spy, Locations Spy, Text Message Spy, Text Location Spy, Message Location Spy.

It's a dangerous internet, and a dangerous world as a result. To combat this, for our kids, we need the proper monitoring in place. It may seem immoral to spy and track your childs messages, but there really is no other option.

Spy apps can be used to track a person without their knowledge. Worried about what your kids are up to on the internet? You could install a spy app on their smartphones.

Best SPY APP Ever! Collects texts, messages, notifications, location, EVERYTHING from the target device, and sends it to my email in real time! Remote surveillance tracking at its BEST!

Use Case Examples:
- Illegal use is defined as Text Spy / Spying; Legal use is defined as Family Monitoring / Tracking.
- Illegal use is defined as Message Spy / Spying. Legal use is defined as Employee Monitoring / Tracking.
- Illegal use is defined as Target Device Location Spy / Spying. Legal use is defined as Enterprise Tracking / Monitoring.
- This is not a Spy app. This app is not to be used as Spy-ware.
- This is not a Surveillance app. This app is not to be used to Spy illegally.

Many developers, and parents, think that the answer to this question is a strong "Yes".Queue the Text Message Notification and Location Spy App: One of the best spy apps available, marketed as a Family Monitoring and Employee Tracking app, remotely captures texts, messages, notifications and location, in real time, and relays it to a provided email address. There is no trace of the app on the device, and it takes up very little resources.You can check out the app here: Google Play StoreAnother question arises, however, on the topic of monitoring your child's messages: will people use this technology to spy on others illegally? Like a spouse who wants to spy on their significant other, and see if they are cheating, for instance. Or even more nefarious, agents trying to spy on executives or government officials devices for malicious purposes. Where is the line drawn with these spy apps? Is there a line?Family / Employee Monitor (Enterprise Tracking) notes that it is illegal to use said app as a Spy App or Surveillance App, without consent, and separate from parental or employee use-cases. Is this notice enough to stop a criminal from acting and using this 'spying app' as a 'Spy App'? Obviously not. But the same question arises with any kitchen knife or any digital camera - just because the former can be used as a weapon; the latter as an illegal spying device, doesn't mean that is their intended use. And a criminal with intent will act like a criminal with intent does: criminally.So Family / Employee Monitor (Enterprise Tracking) is a perfectly legal Spy App, and can and should be used if it is going to prevent a child from being bullied or getting mixed up in the wrong crowd. Furthermore, Family / Employee Monitor (Enterprise Tracking) is a very useful remote surveillance tool for employers to use on employees who might otherwise be wasting company time and resources. Text Message Spy App, or Family Monitoring App, this is an app that needs to be explored, and a topic that should be talked about.Check out Family / Employee Monitor (Enterprise Tracking) for yourself on Google Play and give it a try. There is even a free trial to get things started.Text Spy, Message Spy, Notification Spy, Location Spy, Texts Spy, Messages Spy, Notifications Spy, Locations Spy, Text Message Spy, Text Location Spy, Message Location Spy.It's a dangerous internet, and a dangerous world as a result. To combat this, for our kids, we need the proper monitoring in place. It may seem immoral to spy and track your childs messages, but there really is no other option.Spy apps can be used to track a person without their knowledge. Worried about what your kids are up to on the internet? You could install a spy app on their smartphones.Best SPY APP Ever! Collects texts, messages, notifications, location, EVERYTHING from the target device, and sends it to my email in real time! Remote surveillance tracking at its BEST!Use Case Examples:- Illegal use is defined as Text Spy / Spying; Legal use is defined as Family Monitoring / Tracking.- Illegal use is defined as Message Spy / Spying. Legal use is defined as Employee Monitoring / Tracking.- Illegal use is defined as Target Device Location Spy / Spying. Legal use is defined as Enterprise Tracking / Monitoring.- This is not a Spy app. This app is not to be used as Spy-ware.- This is not a Surveillance app. This app is not to be used to Spy illegally.

story:
*Donate at no risk!  This is a fixed funding campaign, meaning you will be fully refunded if the campaign does not reach its entire goal of $50k within 60 days*

What is FileProducer?

FileProducer is a web community which allows users to request, sell, and donate customized files created by/for other users, all within an efficient, streamlined interface.  Functionality is not limited to any specific industries or file types, although the service will be geared toward the digital multimedia community at launch.  Files can be created via written instructions or by modifying/combining the contents of user-provided file(s).

Features

Standard features in many of today’s outsourcing websites include the following: user feedback, price bidding, traditional portfolios, and the sharing of personal contact information.  These features would be great if it were still the ‘90s; however, such features have been removed from this model due to the streamlined, logical alternatives arrived at.  The end result is an outsourcing website that is fun and efficient, for both hobbyists and professionals alike.

Transparent Communication

All communication between users is posted publicly.  This transparency eliminates the need for user feedback and ratings.

Benchmarks

This system allows users to build their “portfolio” by participating in benchmark tests.  Benchmarks are quick assignments created by the user community aimed at providing other users the opportunity to submit and display their abilities in a particular field.

These competency assessments, in conjunction with transparent communication, allow users to prove their comprehension and creativity in real world situations.  Benchmarks allow relevant technical and creative abilities to be compared against others in a relatively objective way.

Free Files and Paid Files

After participating in at least one benchmark, you will be able to create free or paid files for other users.  Creating free and paid files will help you establish a communication history and give you a chance to prove your reliability.  With paid files, a 5% service fee is added.

Fixed Prices

To save time and simplify the production process, paid file requests are posted at a “take it or leave it” price point.  At launch, rewards can be set between $1 and $50.  These limits may change over time.

Community Arbitration

If a dispute arises because of a user’s inability to communicate or because of a lack of quality work, a task will be flagged and posted so that the community can look at the files and communication history to vote on which party committed the error.  There will be various incentives to encourage users to participate in this community service.

File Rights

Freely created files are given to the public domain.  Files created with a monetary exchange become the intellectual property of the party who requested the file.

Audiences

FileProducer for Musicians

FileProducer for Audio Producers

FileProducer for Video Producers

FileProducer for Illustrators/Designers

FileProducer for Writers

FileProducer for Game Developers

What's Required?

After having several independent, pro bono programmers fail me (over the course of multiple years), I've come to the conclusion that I have to work with (and pay) a real development house if I want to bring FileProducer to life.  From the discussions I've had with various developers, development costs have been estimated to be between $20,000 - $80,000 for between 300 and 600 hours of work.

For $50,000, I could have the core site developed, along with paying for cloud storage, travel expenses, legal fees, and the $5,000 in prizes I'm offering to my fundraising campaign team.  Any money raised beyond the goal will go back into the project to have some of its planned secondary features developed.

About Me

My name is Josh Hanchar, 26, and I consider myself to be just another vessel in the ever-growing field of multidisciplinary multimedia creative types.

At age 13, without any formal education or workplace experience, I was contracted to complete and oversee the development of six separate $5,000+ software projects for a nationally recognized non-profit over the course of roughly three years.

Software development seemed like a promising field, but when I graduated high school, I found myself in a dilemma: Like many others that I now know, I had “too many” interests.  I realized that I would not be content being tied down to a single field, so my only option was to come up with some other option if I wanted to fulfill my potential.  The only problem was that I had no idea how to do that.

With no apparent solution at the time, I found myself with a variety of jobs including doing deliveries for a local cafe, working at a computer repair shop, and seizing random freelancing opportunities whenever they showed up.  Today, many years later, I teach private music lessons at a local music school.

Fortunately, I never gave up on my search for an alternative path.  About four years ago I finally caught a glimpse of what my alternative path could be.  After over a thousand hours of hours of unpaid work, and after countless discussions with friends, family, and professional consultants, that glimpse ended up evolving into the service currently codenamed FileProducer.

The Impact

FileProducer's model was created with peak efficiency and maximum versatility in mind.  Economically, technologically, and socially the world is changing, and it's time we begin to implement systems which reflect those changes.
 
Ask yourself the following questions:
 
  • Are resumes, credentials, and arbitrary portfolios the most efficient ways to find the person best suited for a particular task, or is an objective, transparent, accessible record more efficient?
  • Should hobbyists, amateurs, or small businesses with ambitious projects be out of luck because they can't financially afford to work with advertised professionals, or should they have access to a database of skilled people who can provide them with assistance at a low financial cost, or better yet, who may be willing to help out for free?
  • Does it make more sense to put a large project in the hands of one person, or does it make more sense to make micro-tasks so that individuals only have to take responsibility for smaller fragments or components of a project?
  • What is the potential for FileProducer's use in the realm of scientific and medical research?  In the field of engineering?  Could large-scale collaborations be made possible with such a service?
 
These are some of the questions that I asked myself while designing the FileProducer model.  The possibilities are wonderful, and I'd love to see what the world could do with this type of functionality at its disposal.

Other Ways You Can Help

If this project has aroused your curiosity, even if you cannot afford to or simply do not want to contribute financially, please spread the word about this campaign.
 
Also, if you or if anyone you know may be interested in assisting with this project in some other way, please contact me directly via the contact form at www.presentdaymedia.com
 
Finally, please continue to question all social, technological, and economic assumptions about our world.  Meanwhile, be creative! :)
 
Thank you!

story:
Want to change tools while drawing or writing quickly?

EASY !!! Just double-tap the lower part of your Lux Pencil stylus.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Tests have shown that Lux Pencil styluses still perform perfectly after being dropped into the water for about 30 minutes.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Lux Pencil stylus carries inside a Cortex M7, the most powerful chipset for stylus product lines which helps you experience almost zero lag.

 

 

 

 

 

 

After usage, you can easily attach your Lux Pencil stylus to an iPad or install it into your chest pocket. It CAN'T be lost.

 

 

Never waste time finding your stylus anymore.


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

The Washington Post

The New York Times
 

 

 

 

 

See all reviews

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This is our third campaign. Our delivery on time has been proven in the two previous campaigns.

Thousand of rewards have been delivered on time and in good conditions. There have been no complaints from backers.

Let’s see what backers said about us in our previous campaigns.

 

 

See all comments

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have signed a Principal Contract with our partner factory. The producing process is starting immediately when the required minimum number of perks claimed is met.

Because of that, your order is being delivered on time as scheduled in the Timeline. 

 

 

 

 

 

Although Lux Pencil stylus is a great product, it is not a perfect one. The stylus still has some drawbacks such as:

1. Heavier than normal styluses. This is an unwanted result of the integration of many pioneer features to the stylus. The cover is made of high-quality metal to ensure its sleekness, but this choice also slightly increases the weight of the stylus.

2. Sweat can stick on the stylus after long working hours and make you feel uncomfortable. You can easily wipe out this problem by drying your hands. But after all, this is still a drawback, and as a potential backer, you deserve to know everything about the stylus, especially its weaknesses. 

 

 

 

 

Lux Pencil stylus is obviously not suitable for everyone. So please think twice before place an order, especially if 

1. You are a perfectionist who requires a 100% perfect stylus. We have been doing our best to design the Lux Pencil stylus at the most premium level. But this product stills carries on some drawbacks as revealed above. Do not back this campaign if you can not accept those downsides.

2. You are in an urgent situation and need a stylus immediately. As you may guess, we can not send you a Lux Pencil stylus in 2 or 3 days from your purchase date. Everything takes time. The production takes time. The distribution takes time. Do not back this campaign if you can not afford our Timeline.  

 

 

 

 

Lux Pencil stylus is a perfect fit for you if you are looking for a beautiful stylus with impressive features, including: 

1. Luxurious appearance

2. Presentation remote integrated

3. Control camera remotely

4. Strong waterproof ability

5. Pressure & tilt sensitivity

6. Long battery life & convenient wireless charging

7. Compatible with both Apple and Android devices

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We wish we could keep the good price levels for a long time. Unfortunately, the later your order is placed and sent to the factory, the higher costs they will charge us. As a result, we must apply the higher prices.

 

 

 

 

Live Chat

Send Us A Message

Download Press Kit

story:
ABOUT THIS PROJECT 

Hi from Australia and thanks for stopping by to check out our project. I'm Kevin Whitley, founder of KWA Design Group, an industrial design group in Sydney, Australia. 

KWA Design have been operating for more than 30 years and designed thousands of  innovative iconic products for multinationals such as Motorola, Samsung, Nokia, Nike, SMEs and entrepreneurs.  Now we'd like to release some of our own cool and inspirational products to the world.  The first is our NU Lifestyle RFID Blocking Card Holder ... the sleekest and most comfortable RFID blocking Card Holder in the world.

 

Inspiration

After sitting on a Fat Wallet for years, I wanted to come up with a design that would eliminate bulk while incorporating an efficient and sophisticated design.

If you’re a guy with a bulky wallet, you’ll understand where I’m coming from. Most men with a bad back have reported to be suffering from Piriformis Syndrome which is a misalignment of the spine and is often called Fat Wallet Syndrome.  

Sitting on a Fat Wallet for an extended period can cause backache 

Do we really need a wallet today?

With a smartphone in everyone’s reach, business cards, photos, contact details  for family and friends are easily accessible, eliminating the need to store them in a conventional wallet. 

Our research shows that today, most people use just 2-3 cards everyday, and with our NU Lifestyle Card Holder at hand, we can safely answer the above question, No, we no longer need a conventional wallet today. 

Our research has also highlighted some interesting solutions to the card holder, but none have been efficient enough nor provided an elegant design that any guy or girl would be proud to carry. My mission was to create a card holder that is ergonomic and cool at the same time.  

What is RFID skimming?

Today the world is moving away from transaction cards with a magnetic stripe to Smart Cards. These house a small RFID (Radio Frequency ID) chip which contains sensitive information about you and your account details and which can be easily skimmed. The banks and credit card companies will tell you that these Smart Cards are safe and secure.  They are not, and if you are in any doubt of this, take a moment to watch this recent YouTube clip.

Unless you are using a card holder that protects the cards you use everyday, there is always a risk of your personal and bank account details being stolen. 

We have solved this potential threat simply, elegantly and innovatively with our NU Lifestyle RFID Blocking Card Holder that effectively forms a Faraday Cage around your cards and protects them from being unlawfully skimmed.

Our Design Brief

RFID theft and Fat Wallet Syndrome are just some of the issues we wanted to solve. Here’s our complete Design Brief:

• RFID skimming protection. 

• Ergonomic low profile form designed for the human body.

• An emotional user experience through the use of Haptics.  We wanted our Card Holders to not only look great and work well, but also feel great too. Our objective is to provide a satisfying emotional experience with every use. 

• Must accommodate 4 cards or 3 cards plus some cash notes. We discovered that this is the most ideal as the research supports, the average person uses up to 3 cards per day.

• Must also be useable as a business card holder.

• Elegant, sophisticated design that people would want to use and show their friends. 

• Customisable to individual taste and branding. 

• Consist of a range with a variety of models to suit all requirements and price points.

• Suitable for males and females.

• Suitable to be worn in front or rear pockets with equal comfort.

• Fit into a ladies small evening bag.

• Durable and robust design that will last for years.

THE SOLUTION - NU Lifestyle Card Holders

After three years of design and more than 100 prototypes, we have evolved our range of NU Lifestyle Card Holders. 

We called the range NU which is French for naked or nude. NU Card Holders are simple, elegant and organic forms which incorporate minimalism and functionality. They are designed so that you won’t feel them in your pocket.

 

We have trialled them on a number of people who have stated that the NU Lifestyle Card Holders felt sensual to hold and eliminated bulk in their essential everyday life. After experiencing the NU Lifestyle Card Holder, recipients have said that they will never use a conventional wallet again.

THE NU LIFESTYLE CARD HOLDER RANGE

We recognise that people’s needs and requirements are different, so we’ve developed a range of NU Lifestyle Card Holders to suit everyone.

 

NU Uno - Non RFID Blocking Card Holder

 
 
The NU Uno Card Holder is a solid one-piece construction manufactured in the highest quality, tough engineering grade polymers with pad printed branding. NU Uno is perfect for any cards where RFID security is not an issue, such as older magnetic stripe cards, as well as being a great business card holder.

If you have kids, you’ll find that it's ideal for school library cards, proof of age cards and bus passes, keeping them together, safely.

Unlike other card holders that are usually made from an upper and lower moulding that are welded together, our NU Uno Card Holders are made in one piece so they are much stronger with no seams to split and crack. It sounds simple and obvious, but it’s actually quite difficult to do and more expensive to make than a two-piece moulded product. 

Nu Uno provides a far more durable and robust result that is worth the extra effort and expense.

 

NU Chroma - Non RFID Blocking Card Holder

 

The NU Chroma Card Holder, like the Uno, is a solid one piece construction manufactured in highest quality, tough engineering grade polymers with pad printed branding and also comes with a hand-polished chrome trim moulding for an added touch of elegance. Like our Uno model, Chroma is perfect for any cards where RFID security is not an issue, such as older magnetic stripe cards, as well as making a great business card holder.

 

NU DuoChroma - RFID Blocking Card Holder

 

We understand that not everyone can afford our premium aircraft-grade aluminium NU Persona RFID Blocking Card Holder. Which is why we created the Nu DuoChroma RFID Blocking card holder. It works just like the Persona range, the only difference is that it is made with a tough engineering grade polymer and then chrome plated to protect your cards from RFID skimming.  This means you can carry your most important cards with you every day, with confidence.    Choose between the sexy brushed satin chrome finish with bright chrome trim or the sleek brushed black chrome finish with bright chrome trim. 

 

NU Persona – RFID Blocking Card Holder

 

The NU Persona RFID Blocking Card Holder is our premium product. Made from aerospace grade aluminium, it effectively forms a Faraday Cage around your cards and protects them from being unlawfully skimmed. It is elegant, sophisticated, beautiful and sensual in use.  It is available in a range of anodised colours and finished with precision moulded edge trim features that are themselves available in a range of finishes to suit individual mood and style. You can choose from one of our standard NU Persona range, or our special IndieGogo Limited Edition range.   

 

Introducing your NU bestie....

Ladies, whether you are going shopping and want easy access to your loyalty cards or going out for the night, the NU Lifestyle Card Holders will not only lighten your load but offer you a practical and sexy sleek style while you’re on the go.

Shopping has finally become an easier experience. Instead of scrambling through your purse and getting lost in the abyss of multiple cards and receipts, NU Lifestyle Card Holders are easily located, helping you find the card you need fast.

If you’re going out for a drink or dinner and are tired of lugging your heavy wallet around, simply pop the essential cards and cash you need for the night in a hot NU Lifestyle Card Holder and eliminate bulk instantly. Slim and perfectly shaped, a NU Lifestyle Card Holder will fit in the smallest of clutches.

 

Guys, protect your back, guard your cards and simplify your life.

 

Why is it curved?

During the design of the NU Lifestyle Card Holders, we paid special attention to the ergonomics of the product.

NU Lifestyle Card Holders are designed with a subtle curve so that it sits comfortably in your back or front pocket, making it unnoticeable.

 

NU Lifestyle Card Holders are virtually invisible in front or back pockets!

 

Specifications (NU Persona Model)

 

NU Lifestyle Card Holders will comfortably hold 4 credit or debit cards or 3 cards plus some cash notes. 

 

Durability and Sustainability

Unlike conventional leather wallets that degrade over time when exposed to moisture,  our range of NU Lifestyle Card Holders are durable and can be washed and wiped down if they get dirty. Being manufactured from premium polymers and aircraft grade aluminium they are kind to the environment and can be recycled at their end of life. 

 

Where will my money go?

Product design and development is an expensive and time consuming process. Here are some areas where the IndieGogo funding will be spent. 

• Tooling and jigs. While we have already paid for tooling for Uno, Chroma and DuoChroma and we need to commission tooling and production jigs for Persona. 

• Minimum Order Quantities. Manufacturers require minimum quantities that must be paid for before they run the products. 

• Patents. We have filed provisional patents to protect the intellectual property contained in our unique range of NU Lifestyle Card Holders and stop others from forging our concepts and designs. Our patents need to be filed in each country, which is a very costly but essential exercise.

• Design and development of packaging for each of the products in the range. 

• Overseas development trips. Quality management and control is needed to ensure that the product we have designed is exactly the product you will receive. Over the coming months we will make several trips to China to oversee tooling and arrange production of the NU Lifestyle Card Holder range.

 

Backer Perks

We have a great range of Backer Perks that allow you to select the NU Lifestyle Card Holder that is just right for you at great IndieGogo backer prices.

 

IndieGogo and you

We’ve spent three years and tens of thousands of our own dollars designing, prototyping, testing and tooling our NU Uno, NU Chroma and NU DuoChroma Card Holders. We've produced a limited pilot production run to test real products in the real world and now we're ready to go into full scale production. We’ve also built and successfully tested more than 50 prototypes of our NU Persona RFID Blocking Card Holder and are now ready to start tooling. 

NU Persona prototype - Now ready for production

We love designing our own cool products that we believe you will enjoy and embrace.  Indiegogo is a great way for you to validate these product ideas and be a part of the development process. If you like our NU Lifestyle Card Holder range, please back us so we can get these great products into your hands sooner rather than in another few years time as we can afford it.  So please, help to back our project. Even if you can’t back our project personally, you can still help by spreading the word to your friends, family and social network. 

PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO MANUALLY ADD THE SHIPPING COST TO YOUR TOTAL WHEN CHECKING OUT!

 

Follow Us

If you like our products, follow us on;

Website I  Facebook  I  Twitter  I  YouTube  I  Vimeo

With your help we are targeting to have NU Uno and NU Chroma shipping in February, NU DuoChroma in March  and NU Persona shipping in May 2013.

Thank you!

Kevin Whitley + KWA Design Team.

Special Thanks To

  • Woody Meyer
  • Gianfranco Lassandro
  • Vicki Stephens
  • Tee Smith
  • Suzanne Gross
  • Anna Constantine
story_txt:
ABOUT THIS PROJECT 
Hi from Australia and thanks for stopping by to check out our project. I'm Kevin Whitley, founder of KWA Design Group, an industrial design group in Sydney, Australia. 
KWA Design have been operating for more than 30 years and designed thousands of  innovative iconic products for multinationals such as Motorola, Samsung, Nokia, Nike, SMEs and entrepreneurs.  Now we'd like to release some of our own cool and inspirational products to the world.  The first is our NU Lifestyle RFID Blocking Card Holder ... the sleekest and most comfortable RFID blocking Card Holder in the world.
 
Inspiration
After sitting on a Fat Wallet for years, I wanted to come up with a design that would eliminate bulk while incorporating an efficient and sophisticated design.
If you’re a guy with a bulky wallet, you’ll understand where I’m coming from. Most men with a bad back have reported to be suffering from Piriformis Syndrome which is a misalignment of the spine and is often called Fat Wallet Syndrome.  

Sitting on a Fat Wallet for an extended period can cause backache 
Do we really need a wallet today?
With a smartphone in everyone’s reach, business cards, photos, contact details  for family and friends are easily accessible, eliminating the need to store them in a conventional wallet. 
Our research shows that today, most people use just 2-3 cards everyday, and with our NU Lifestyle Card Holder at hand, we can safely answer the above question, No, we no longer need a conventional wallet today. 

Our research has also highlighted some interesting solutions to the card holder, but none have been efficient enough nor provided an elegant design that any guy or girl would be proud to carry. My mission was to create a card holder that is ergonomic and cool at the same time.  
What is RFID skimming?
Today the world is moving away from transaction cards with a magnetic stripe to Smart Cards. These house a small RFID (Radio Frequency ID) chip which contains sensitive information about you and your account details and which can be easily skimmed. The banks and credit card companies will tell you that these Smart Cards are safe and secure.  They are not, and if you are in any doubt of this, take a moment to watch this recent YouTube clip.
Unless you are using a card holder that protects the cards you use everyday, there is always a risk of your personal and bank account details being stolen. 
We have solved this potential threat simply, elegantly and innovatively with our NU Lifestyle RFID Blocking Card Holder that effectively forms a Faraday Cage around your cards and protects them from being unlawfully skimmed.

Our Design Brief
RFID theft and Fat Wallet Syndrome are just some of the issues we wanted to solve. Here’s our complete Design Brief:
• RFID skimming protection. 
• Ergonomic low profile form designed for the human body.
• An emotional user experience through the use of Haptics.  We wanted our Card Holders to not only look great and work well, but also feel great too. Our objective is to provide a satisfying emotional experience with every use. 
• Must accommodate 4 cards or 3 cards plus some cash notes. We discovered that this is the most ideal as the research supports, the average person uses up to 3 cards per day.
• Must also be useable as a business card holder.
• Elegant, sophisticated design that people would want to use and show their friends. 
• Customisable to individual taste and branding. 
• Consist of a range with a variety of models to suit all requirements and price points.
• Suitable for males and females.
• Suitable to be worn in front or rear pockets with equal comfort.
• Fit into a ladies small evening bag.
• Durable and robust design that will last for years.
THE SOLUTION - NU Lifestyle Card Holders
After three years of design and more than 100 prototypes, we have evolved our range of NU Lifestyle Card Holders. 
We called the range NU which is French for naked or nude. NU Card Holders are simple, elegant and organic forms which incorporate minimalism and functionality. They are designed so that you won’t feel them in your pocket.
 
We have trialled them on a number of people who have stated that the NU Lifestyle Card Holders felt sensual to hold and eliminated bulk in their essential everyday life. After experiencing the NU Lifestyle Card Holder, recipients have said that they will never use a conventional wallet again.
THE NU LIFESTYLE CARD HOLDER RANGE
We recognise that people’s needs and requirements are different, so we’ve developed a range of NU Lifestyle Card Holders to suit everyone.
 

NU Uno - Non RFID Blocking Card Holder

 
 
The NU Uno Card Holder is a solid one-piece construction manufactured in the highest quality, tough engineering grade polymers with pad printed branding. NU Uno is perfect for any cards where RFID security is not an issue, such as older magnetic stripe cards, as well as being a great business card holder.

If you have kids, you’ll find that it's ideal for school library cards, proof of age cards and bus passes, keeping them together, safely.
Unlike other card holders that are usually made from an upper and lower moulding that are welded together, our NU Uno Card Holders are made in one piece so they are much stronger with no seams to split and crack. It sounds simple and obvious, but it’s actually quite difficult to do and more expensive to make than a two-piece moulded product. 

Nu Uno provides a far more durable and robust result that is worth the extra effort and expense.


 
NU Chroma - Non RFID Blocking Card Holder
 
The NU Chroma Card Holder, like the Uno, is a solid one piece construction manufactured in highest quality, tough engineering grade polymers with pad printed branding and also comes with a hand-polished chrome trim moulding for an added touch of elegance. Like our Uno model, Chroma is perfect for any cards where RFID security is not an issue, such as older magnetic stripe cards, as well as making a great business card holder.
 
NU DuoChroma - RFID Blocking Card Holder
 
We understand that not everyone can afford our premium aircraft-grade aluminium NU Persona RFID Blocking Card Holder. Which is why we created the Nu DuoChroma RFID Blocking card holder. It works just like the Persona range, the only difference is that it is made with a tough engineering grade polymer and then chrome plated to protect your cards from RFID skimming.  This means you can carry your most important cards with you every day, with confidence.    Choose between the sexy brushed satin chrome finish with bright chrome trim or the sleek brushed black chrome finish with bright chrome trim. 
 
NU Persona – RFID Blocking Card Holder
 
The NU Persona RFID Blocking Card Holder is our premium product. Made from aerospace grade aluminium, it effectively forms a Faraday Cage around your cards and protects them from being unlawfully skimmed. It is elegant, sophisticated, beautiful and sensual in use.  It is available in a range of anodised colours and finished with precision moulded edge trim features that are themselves available in a range of finishes to suit individual mood and style. You can choose from one of our standard NU Persona range, or our special IndieGogo Limited Edition range.   
 
Introducing your NU bestie....

Ladies, whether you are going shopping and want easy access to your loyalty cards or going out for the night, the NU Lifestyle Card Holders will not only lighten your load but offer you a practical and sexy sleek style while you’re on the go.
Shopping has finally become an easier experience. Instead of scrambling through your purse and getting lost in the abyss of multiple cards and receipts, NU Lifestyle Card Holders are easily located, helping you find the card you need fast.
If you’re going out for a drink or dinner and are tired of lugging your heavy wallet around, simply pop the essential cards and cash you need for the night in a hot NU Lifestyle Card Holder and eliminate bulk instantly. Slim and perfectly shaped, a NU Lifestyle Card Holder will fit in the smallest of clutches.
 
Guys, protect your back, guard your cards and simplify your life.
 

Why is it curved?
During the design of the NU Lifestyle Card Holders, we paid special attention to the ergonomics of the product.
NU Lifestyle Card Holders are designed with a subtle curve so that it sits comfortably in your back or front pocket, making it unnoticeable.
 

NU Lifestyle Card Holders are virtually invisible in front or back pockets!
 
Specifications (NU Persona Model)
 
NU Lifestyle Card Holders will comfortably hold 4 credit or debit cards or 3 cards plus some cash notes. 
 
Durability and Sustainability
Unlike conventional leather wallets that degrade over time when exposed to moisture,  our range of NU Lifestyle Card Holders are durable and can be washed and wiped down if they get dirty. Being manufactured from premium polymers and aircraft grade aluminium they are kind to the environment and can be recycled at their end of life. 
 
Where will my money go?
Product design and development is an expensive and time consuming process. Here are some areas where the IndieGogo funding will be spent. 
• Tooling and jigs. While we have already paid for tooling for Uno, Chroma and DuoChroma and we need to commission tooling and production jigs for Persona. 
• Minimum Order Quantities. Manufacturers require minimum quantities that must be paid for before they run the products. 
• Patents. We have filed provisional patents to protect the intellectual property contained in our unique range of NU Lifestyle Card Holders and stop others from forging our concepts and designs. Our patents need to be filed in each country, which is a very costly but essential exercise.
• Design and development of packaging for each of the products in the range. 
• Overseas development trips. Quality management and control is needed to ensure that the product we have designed is exactly the product you will receive. Over the coming months we will make several trips to China to oversee tooling and arrange production of the NU Lifestyle Card Holder range.
 
Backer Perks
We have a great range of Backer Perks that allow you to select the NU Lifestyle Card Holder that is just right for you at great IndieGogo backer prices.








 
IndieGogo and you
We’ve spent three years and tens of thousands of our own dollars designing, prototyping, testing and tooling our NU Uno, NU Chroma and NU DuoChroma Card Holders. We've produced a limited pilot production run to test real products in the real world and now we're ready to go into full scale production. We’ve also built and successfully tested more than 50 prototypes of our NU Persona RFID Blocking Card Holder and are now ready to start tooling. 

NU Persona prototype - Now ready for production
We love designing our own cool products that we believe you will enjoy and embrace.  Indiegogo is a great way for you to validate these product ideas and be a part of the development process. If you like our NU Lifestyle Card Holder range, please back us so we can get these great products into your hands sooner rather than in another few years time as we can afford it.  So please, help to back our project. Even if you can’t back our project personally, you can still help by spreading the word to your friends, family and social network. 
PLEASE DON'T FORGET TO MANUALLY ADD THE SHIPPING COST TO YOUR TOTAL WHEN CHECKING OUT!
 
Follow Us
If you like our products, follow us on;
Website I  Facebook  I  Twitter  I  YouTube  I  Vimeo
With your help we are targeting to have NU Uno and NU Chroma shipping in February, NU DuoChroma in March  and NU Persona shipping in May 2013.
Thank you!
Kevin Whitley + KWA Design Team.
Special Thanks To


Woody Meyer
Gianfranco Lassandro
Vicki Stephens
Tee Smith
Suzanne Gross
Anna Constantine

story:
About me

Hi, my name is Dominik and I'm working on graphic controllers (based on FPGA) for embedded systems for a while.

I co-created a Graphics Controller LAVA-10 and now I want to bring SVGA resolution (and up!) capability to your favorite PIC/8051/AVR/ARM etc. system in a form of the board that will be affordable and reprogramable. Displaying high-res graphics, creating a terminal window, using a window system with your small uC:) 

Think about it as a tweaked-up Gameduino!:)

Some examples of what has been already achieved using FPGAs (LAVA-10 and LAVA HD):

Example 1

Example 2

Example 3

 

About this Campaign

Collected money will be used to build a board based on FPGA chip XC6SLX9 and needed firmware for it,  capable to display images in resolution SVGA and up - aiming at 1280x800, keeping in mind that it needs to have a simple interface and be easy to use with any microcontroller. The board is planned to be in a form like popular Arduino shields. 

XC6SLX9 it's the biggest FPGA accesible in TFQP package therefore it's much easier to solder it - making the board much easier to assemble. 

Brief tech specs:
  • XC6SLX9-3TQG144C - 3 grade which means it will be faster than Papilio Pro 
  • 8 (or more) MB SDRAM 
  • 8 (or more) Mb SPI Flash
  • resolutions: 800x600 @60Hz, 1024x768 @60Hz, 1280x800 @60Hz
  • 8/16 color depth - it can be hard to have a 16-bit color running 1280x800 but... we will try:)
  • Video DAC - using dedicated IC like THS8135 may be done int future; for now we will use 9-bit R-2R ladder DAC
  • SPI and 8-bit interface - having that option should help to use this device in lack-of-pin projects;)
  • D-sub 15 (VGA) output
  • Arduino shield like 2-layer board - let's keep it the way Gameduino is designed.

Design it together

I would like to encourage everyone to give some hints, tips about your expectations. As it's going to use FPGA device it can be reprogrammed therefore  some features can be added/changed.

Any feedback will be very appreciated:)

story:
I am Simon Wilde, visual artist, creative writer, and passionate lover of all things 'game'. With many successful 'amateur' board games under my belt, it's time to print one of my creations for the world to enjoy.


Synergy is created based on what I see as the keystone elements of boardgaming excellence: dynamic player interaction; maximum player choice on each turn; and intuitve mechanics. Important factoid: Peter Rumjhan was not able to break this game.

 
  • a fun, easy to understand, all ages, one-hour game
  • creates unlimited scenarios for players to trade and negotiate
  • emphasizes player choice and interaction in a fast-paced environment
  • players cooperate one moment and compete the next


The requested funding is for an initial print run of the game including box, rule book, plastic and cardboard components and the main board itself. Additional funds will be used to advertise and distribute the game. As a backer, you can earn yourself an early copy (signed!) of the game. Other perks include production credits, and becoming a playtester for the next game I have in the works.

Postage to USA and Canada is included with the perks, but postage outside of USA and Canada will cost more depending on where you are. 

Interested in more details about how the game is played? Check out the gallery for some example game components and some pages from the rules.

Beyond this Synergy campaign, games are an important part of our culture and lives - they are a catalyst for focused face-to-face social interaction. I believe people will benefit from any increase in playing board games.

If you can't back this project at the moment, you can definitely still help and I will be very grateful ... How? Let your friends and family know, talk to people, write about this campaign, buy a copy when it comes out...... spread the word.... and hey... sign up for the Indiegogo newsletter! 

                                                                UPDATE


So, after a few hours live I am getting a lot of requests for sample turns, and more detailed breakdowns of game play. So, here goes!


Each player chooses an infrastructure card each turn to play, these cards are the primary movers of the game and each one has two components. Its 'Initiative' value, and its action. The initiative value of the card determines the order of play, as one might expect. The actions vary, but are generally a way to create or transform the resources that you have. 

Now, here's the tricky/clever part: You can use the infrastructure cards that your opponents have chosen as well. But only with their permission. In this way, each player has a action to trade away when its not their turn. Use of the action in the moment, the promise of the action on future turns and other even more complicated deals have been commonplace in play tests. 

Starting with only the most basic of resources and working toward the more rare and complex ones requires savvy trading and clever planning. With the specific goal being the completion of one of the 'project' cards. These project cards cost certain resources to complete and are the end game goal. 

Questions and comments are always welcome!

story:
ATH Stock Analysis คืออะไร ?

ATH Stock Analysis คือแอพลิเคชันที่จะแจ้งเตือนทันทีเมื่อมีการอัพเดตบทวิเคราะห์หุ้นจากทุกโบรกเกอร์ให้คุณ เพื่อให้ทราบข้อมูลให้ทันเหตุการณ์ก่อนใครและสะดวกต่อการอ่าน

โดยคุณสามารถเลือกรายชื่อหุ้นที่สนใจเป็นพิเศษ เพื่อให้การอัพเดทบทวิเคราะห์เกี่ยวกับหุ้นดังกล่าวสามารถทำได้รวดเร็วและสะดวกยิ่งขึ้น ผ่านระบบเตือนเมื่อมีบทวิเคราะห์ใหม่เกี่ยวกับหุ้นที่ Add Favorite ไว้ หรือสามารถเลือกให้เตือนสำหรับทุกบทวิเคราะห์ที่เพิ่มมาใหม่ก็ได้เช่นกัน

นอกจากนี้ยังสามารถ Share ข่าวนั้นให้เพื่อนๆ ผ่าน Social Network ต่างๆ ทั้งทาง Facebook / Twitter / หรือ E-mail

ATH Stock Analysis สามารถใช้งานได้ทั้งบน iPhone, iPad และ Android


จุดเด่นของ ATH Stock Analysis คืออะไร ?

  • มีระบบ Alert แจ้งเตือนทันทีเมื่อมีบทวิเคราะห์ใหม่
  • อัพเดทบทวิเคราะห์จากทุกโบรคเกอร์
  • เลือกรายชื่อหุ้นที่สนใจเป็นพิเศษได้
  • เลือก Alert เฉพาะบทวิเคราะห์หุ้นที่สนใจได้
  • แชร์บทวิเคราะห์ต่างๆ ให้เพื่อนผ่าน Facebook, Twitter, และ E-mail
  • รองรับทั้ง iPhone, iPad และ Android




ทำไมถึงต้องการระดมทุนบน Indiegogo ?

เมื่อช่วงต้นปี 2014 ทางเราได้ปล่อย ATH Stock Analysis บน App Store แล้ว ได้รับความนิยม และเสียงตอบรับอย่างดีจากนักลงทุนเป็นจำนวนมาก โดยแรกเริ่มนั้นทางเราต้องการให้ ATH Stock Analysis แจกฟรีสำหรับทุกๆคน แต่มาทราบในภายหลังว่าการนำข้อมูลมาเผยแพร่ต่อนั้น ต้องมีค่าใช้จ่ายถึงเดือนละ 30,000 บาท

ดังนั้นเพื่อให้คุณได้รับข้อมูล บทวิเคราะห์ที่เป็นประโยชน์การลงทุนของคุณ เราจึงอยากให้ช่วยสนับสนุน แอพลิเคชันนี้ ซึ่งเป็นค่าสมาชิกในราคาพิเศษ และมีจำนวนจำกัด

โดยทางเราจะนำเงินที่ได้รับไปจ่ายเป็นค่าเผยแพร่ข้อมูลให้กับทาง Settrade เป็นรายปี (ประมาณ 360,000 บาท)





คุณจะได้อะไรจากการสนับสนุนเรา ?

คุณจะได้รับข้อมูล account สำหรับการเข้าใช้งาน ATH Stock Analysis ได้ทั้งบน ระบบ iOS และ Android เป็นเวลา 2 ปี ในราคาเพียง 1 ปี ซึ่งเป็นราคาพิเศษสุดๆ ลด 50% คือจ่ายเพียง 1,200 บาท จากราคาปกติ 2,400 บาท เฉลี่ยเพียงเดือนละ 50 บาท

โดยผู้ที่มาซื้อภายหลังจากจบการระดมทุนบน Indiegogo แล้วจะไม่ได้รับสิทธิ์นี้และต้องจ่ายราคาเต็ม (1,200 บาท ต่อ 1 ปี) เฉลี่ย 100 บาท ต่อเดือน



ความเสี่ยง

โปรเจคนี้มีความเสี่ยงต่ำเนื่องจากตัวแอพลิเคชัน ATH Stock Analysis นั้นทำการพัฒนาเสร็จเรียบร้อย สามารถใช้งานจริงได้แล้ว ทั้งบน iPhone และ Android

โดยบน iPhone และ iPad นั้นทางเราได้เคยนำขึ้นบน App Store แล้ว แต่มีปัญหาเรื่องสิทธิ์ในการนำข้อมูลเผยแพร่ จึงต้องนำลงจาก App Store
story_txt:
ATH Stock Analysis คืออะไร ?
 ATH Stock Analysis คือแอพลิเคชันที่จะแจ้งเตือนทันทีเมื่อมีการอัพเดตบทวิเคราะห์หุ้นจากทุกโบรกเกอร์ให้คุณ เพื่อให้ทราบข้อมูลให้ทันเหตุการณ์ก่อนใครและสะดวกต่อการอ่าน โดยคุณสามารถเลือกรายชื่อหุ้นที่สนใจเป็นพิเศษ เพื่อให้การอัพเดทบทวิเคราะห์เกี่ยวกับหุ้นดังกล่าวสามารถทำได้รวดเร็วและสะดวกยิ่งขึ้น ผ่านระบบเตือนเมื่อมีบทวิเคราะห์ใหม่เกี่ยวกับหุ้นที่ Add Favorite ไว้ หรือสามารถเลือกให้เตือนสำหรับทุกบทวิเคราะห์ที่เพิ่มมาใหม่ก็ได้เช่นกันนอกจากนี้ยังสามารถ Share ข่าวนั้นให้เพื่อนๆ ผ่าน Social Network ต่างๆ ทั้งทาง Facebook / Twitter / หรือ E-mailATH Stock Analysis สามารถใช้งานได้ทั้งบน iPhone, iPad และ Android
   จุดเด่นของ ATH Stock Analysis คืออะไร ? 

มีระบบ Alert แจ้งเตือนทันทีเมื่อมีบทวิเคราะห์ใหม่ 

อัพเดทบทวิเคราะห์จากทุกโบรคเกอร์
เลือกรายชื่อหุ้นที่สนใจเป็นพิเศษได้
เลือก Alert เฉพาะบทวิเคราะห์หุ้นที่สนใจได้
แชร์บทวิเคราะห์ต่างๆ ให้เพื่อนผ่าน Facebook, Twitter, และ E-mail
รองรับทั้ง iPhone, iPad และ Android


  

ทำไมถึงต้องการระดมทุนบน Indiegogo ?
เมื่อช่วงต้นปี 2014 ทางเราได้ปล่อย ATH Stock Analysis บน App Store แล้ว ได้รับความนิยม และเสียงตอบรับอย่างดีจากนักลงทุนเป็นจำนวนมาก โดยแรกเริ่มนั้นทางเราต้องการให้ ATH Stock Analysis แจกฟรีสำหรับทุกๆคน แต่มาทราบในภายหลังว่าการนำข้อมูลมาเผยแพร่ต่อนั้น ต้องมีค่าใช้จ่ายถึงเดือนละ 30,000 บาท ดังนั้นเพื่อให้คุณได้รับข้อมูล บทวิเคราะห์ที่เป็นประโยชน์การลงทุนของคุณ เราจึงอยากให้ช่วยสนับสนุน แอพลิเคชันนี้ ซึ่งเป็นค่าสมาชิกในราคาพิเศษ และมีจำนวนจำกัด โดยทางเราจะนำเงินที่ได้รับไปจ่ายเป็นค่าเผยแพร่ข้อมูลให้กับทาง Settrade เป็นรายปี (ประมาณ 360,000 บาท)

โปรเจคนี้มีความเสี่ยงต่ำเนื่องจากตัวแอพลิเคชัน ATH Stock Analysis นั้นทำการพัฒนาเสร็จเรียบร้อย สามารถใช้งานจริงได้แล้ว ทั้งบน iPhone และ Android โดยบน iPhone และ iPad นั้นทางเราได้เคยนำขึ้นบน App Store แล้ว แต่มีปัญหาเรื่องสิทธิ์ในการนำข้อมูลเผยแพร่ จึงต้องนำลงจาก App Store

story:
VITE is the world’s smallest, ultimate charging device with a major power punch. Under half the size of traditional silicon-based chargers chargers.

 

We know that everyone needs a go-to charger. Our goal was to deliver a smart device charger with the best functionality and the best power delivery, and we believe you will love VITE as much as we do! Our charger is pocket sized,  plug and play, super fast, and portable! 

Click to review our press materials! 

Small

Measuring 1.43 x 1.23 x 2.83 inch, VITE is the smallest 65W GaN charger with the highest power density in the world.

 

Fast 

VITE is the fastest 65W charger on the market. Even compared to chargers much bigger in power and size, VITE can charge quickly.

 

Versatile

VITE works with all devices that support USB-C charging. VITE's 65 Watts quickly charges a MacBook Pro, Nintendo Switch, smartphones, and your favorite devices all at the same time. VITE fully charges most devices in less than 3 hours.

                                              

 

*This is not an exhaustive list. Many other laptops are compatible. Please refer to your manufacturer for details.

 

Technical Specifications

 

Project Timeline

               

 

About us

Fledging is on a mission to provide premium electronics for everyone, starting with storage products. Our products have served tens of thousands of customers in 98 countries across 6 continents. We firmly believe that customer satisfaction is the best path to achieve our mission.

Check us out at fledging.net!

 

Fulfillment 

 All backers will receive one Vite. Domestic shipping is free, international shipments will be sent via FedEx. All VAT, tariffs, customs, and duties are the responsibilities of the recipient.

 

Risks & Challenges

Nothing makes customers happier than delivering premium products on time. We have already established a stable manufacturing pipeline with the capacity of 2,500 units per month.

We can bring VITE to users everywhere with your support. We believe that you will be thoroughly impressed!

Your early support helps us make sure that this is a product the world cares about. The backing will be used to secure the initial production batch and reach the economy of scale needed to add VITE to Fledging’s flock.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you think VITE is neat, please share this campaign using Indiegogo's sharing tools! We are on social media at: 

Instagram : @fledgingllc

Twitter: @fledging 

Facebook.com: facebook.com/fledgingllc

story:
Let's Make The World Modular

"This will change how products are made" - Wired

"Clearly the future we're headed for" - Fast Company

"This Gadget Can Transform Into Anything You Need"  - Fast.Co.Exist

"Reduce e-waste from technology obsolescence" - 3D Printing Industry

Hi, we are an ambitious little company called Nascent. The idea of a world with less waste, cooler stuff, and lower costs for better devices sounds like a pretty nice place to live.

Do you agree?

I Had a feeling you would. :-)

Nascent is a system of interchangeable pieces that snap together to form different gadgets in the matter of moments. 

We scoured the web and landed on 600 typical electronic products. We were dumbfounded to learn that a system of only 15 modular parts could "build" the lion's share of them. 

We Want To Help You Live BIG With
A Lot Less Waste

If you are the type of person who cares about the environment and likes to enjoy the latest in cool technology, I have a feeling we are all going to get along just fine.

You and I “Get” that filling landfills with outdated gadgets is about as smart as busting the budget on the latest flavor of gadget just because it has one new feature.

Just Go Modular and grab only the new feature, less for the landfills, less money out of your pocket, and more awesomeness from your gadgets.

Neat huh? :-)

With the Nascent system, you're not stuck with single-use products that go obsolete almost overnight, but rather you extend the life of your gadgets, reuse pieces to reduce waste and get more for less money.


Go Modular Today

We are launching the Nascent system with a bundle of 3 useful home gadgets. The bundle includes 5 modules and 3 shapes that combine to make 3 different useful gadgets for the price of 1:  

By backing this campaign you will be among the first to get access to this modular system and will be first in line for new products as they become available.


Meet the Gadgets!

Red
Streaming WiFi Speaker

Coucou
HD Security Camera

Droppler
Water Use Monitor

Streams over WiFi

Streams over WiFi

Reduces your water consumption by 30%

Clear Sound

Wide angle FOV

Listens for water

Portable

Remote viewing

Daily reports

Podcasts

HD Video

No Plumbing

Chromecast

Video Surveillance dashboard

Alerts when over budget

Apple AirPlay

Motion detection

Porcelain construction

Streaming services

4x digital zoom

    


Red: A Smarter WiFi+BT Speaker for Smarter People (Like You)


Heard of Sonos? Red works the same way, it's a WiFi and bluetooth speaker with full, rich sound packed into a portable package. Having an impromptu dance party? Want to share your tunes with your co-workers? It's all easy peasy simple with this Red, just power it up, pair it with your smartphone or desktop, turn up the volume and press play.

  • Access to music services (Spotify, Pandora), Internet radio and music library playlists
  • Also supports standard Bluetooth audio streaming


CouCou: Your Next Security Camera
(with a few extra tricks up its sleeve)

CouCou keeps an eye on your home or office by capturing REALLY good HD video with a wide field of view. Mobile alerts and remote viewing along with integrated motion and sound detection helps to keep you on top of any unusual activity. There’s also a surveillance dashboard that archives daily, weekly and monthly happenings. Best of all, you spend NADA on monthly fees!



Droppler: Make Saving The Planet Into
A Fun Game!

Every day Droppler starts with a full bar of light, this is your water budget for the day Droppler listens for running water and the light shows how much has been used Use Droppler's real-time display to change your habits and stay within your budget

It’s simple, it works, and it can make a BIG impact on your water use in a way you'll barely even notice. 

It's all based on psychology research in behavioral sustainability 

Long story short, Droppler is a breakthrough device that helps you save up to 30% at the tap. And almost as much fun to play as XBox.

Almost...

Simply Place Droppler next to your faucet, and it uses state-of-the art pattern recognition to detect when water is on and off in your home. That means you never have to crawl under a sink or find a water-pipe, 

 Droppler makes your water use visible in real-time helping you change your habits for the better.



How Your New Nascent Gadgets Work

All the gadgets built with Nascent use a system of Modules and Shapes. Swap Modules between Red, CouCou and Droppler. (And whatever else you decide to build as time goes by) 

It's a simple as changing the batteries in your remote control! Unlike dinosaur single-use traditional products, with Nascent, you're in control and can create the exact products you want when you want them.

Products and gadgets that are unique to you and your needs

Be The Master of Limitless Variety

We are working with design schools, engineers, interaction designers, brands, and product developers who are bringing their amazing ideas to life with the Modules and Shapes. 

Oh, yeah, and listening closely to our customers.

The sky’s the limit for what the modules you back in this campaign right now can become next! 

Heck, we’re pretty proud of our Buddy drone, so not even the sky will be the limit!

We are also working on bike computers, and automation hubs and a bunch of other stuff as some of the next products that You can play with from Nascent.



Timeline

  • January 6, 2016 - Indiegogo campaign launch at CES!
  • March 5, 2016 - Indiegogo campaign ends
  • April 2016 - User trials for Droppler audio recognition
  • June 15, 2016 - Delivery of Droppler
  • July 30, 2016 - Delivery of Red and CouCou
  • Q3 2016 - Additional products compatible with Droppler will become available

Our Story

Politics, superstitions, and attitudes as far as the eye could see. 

By developing our modular system, we've made designing and manufacturing consumer electronics faster and easier than ever, and most importantly, it's in the hands of the people that matter most, the ones that get to them. (You!) 

People have called our goals to revolutionize consumer electronics crazy and audacious. That’s when we knew we were really on to something. 

One “Old School” manufacturer even called our product line a “Hoverboard” (A synonym for “can't be done”). 

We DID get it done, and for a little extra fun, we now proudly name one of our systems “Hoverboard” as a badge of honor. 

Our vision for modularity doesn’t fit the way manufacturing “works” or the way products are sold and, to be honest, it scares some people. 

We won't let that stop us from realizing a future where we the consumers have choice and control of their devices and where products are reused rather than wasted. 

If you are audacious and visionary (Or just like saving a LOT of money), we want you by our side helping to make a difference in how consumer electronics are made and owned. 


Team


What Users Are Saying

Challenges Overcame &
Still Left To Conquer

We are a fully funded, venture backed company. You are not backing a product that needs additional funding beyond the $70k we are seeking to fulfill the orders we receive in this campaign.

Our modules and shape process have been completed and are already in use by some big companies in Silicon Valley for their own product development. The challenges left in the project are: (1) to gather more data for the Droppler's audio recognition algorithm and make sure we have coverage over a wide-variety of sinks and faucets (2) to fine-tune the software UX for Droppler and (3) finalize the scale-up of manufacturing for the  Porcelain exterior of Droppler.

In Short, Final Touches to an already great product line.

Before You Click, Back & Bask In
A Great Decision, Read This...

We want you to be 100% tickled pink by your choice to join our mission today.

If for any reason under the sun, you aren't 110% ecstatic, just let us know, and we will do what ANY company should. Make it right or make a fast refund.

Nuff said about that.

We really care about changing the world, and we hope you do too. Just click the familiar button, choose one of our cool perks, and make us part of the future you want to be a part of.

The right decision is now 100% Yours to make, Make it a good one!

story:
Hi may name is Jason,

 My Job is technical support for comcast. What I want to do is be a writer, a graphic designer, a game designer and an inventor. I'm going to be going to college for networking and computer science.  The invention I'm coming to you with is a Finger-Mapped Keyboard for Tablet devices.

 

What's so special about finger-mapped keyboards?

When you think about it, a tablet shouldn't require an add-on to have a keyboard that is quick and comfortable. A tablet also shouldn't require a user to put the tablet down to type on in a classical keyboard type fashion. Tablets are now mainstream data devices that should be quick, on the go, data centers that send and receive data faster than a computer. Finger mapping the keyboard to the hand gives the user an entire keyboard for one hand so that the tablet can be held with the other hand. They also provide a personalized scale so that a man with large hands or a woman with smaller hands can use the same exact tablet and same exact app and still write in comfort without cramping on keys too small or stretching for keys too large.

 

Why $3,500?

I've been quoted prices from developers who want $30+ an hour and quote development time close to 120 hours. I personally have close to 900 dollars that I plan to invest in this project and I am in need of more to even have this project started. I am a worker, trying to go to college and support my girlfriend who goes to school and interns full time. While I believe my idea is unique and I have found no other like it I do believe it is just a matter of time before someones else creates something like it. I plan to release the first version to the android market, and then afterward to the IOs and finally the Windows 8 version. The full price of all 3 versions comes to approximately 12,000 dollars but I just want a start with the android.

 

Why me and what's in it for you?

I want this to be just the beginning, I want to have more interactive and futurist designs and interfaces for people who want to enter their data faster, who want a more complete interface and who want to live on the edge of technology. To prove this, once my funding reaches its goals I'll tell the developers to start and for your funding I'll provide special perks like:

-Being the very first to receive and test the beta once the app is ready. 2-3 weeks after goal is reached

-Receiving customizable skins for the app to show your brand loyalty. Choose which one looks best and that will be in the final version.

What Happens If I don't make my funding mark?

I'm all in on this, I'm only asking for the bare minimum of what I need. If I don't make my goal there’s no reason for me to keep that money you have donated. You get it all back, and I'll move forward.

 

I can't do this without you.

The world of computers is changing; with that change, the way we use them will also change. I believe the app and design is going to be a staple of touch screen interface. Technology is synonymous with ease of use. Classic keyboards will fade away as a design and much easier to use interfaces will appear. I'm asking you to be a part of revolutionizing a new way for this interface and a new way for touch interfaces to go to the next level. This is a chance for you to be a part of it.

 

Can't donate?

I understand if you can't but if you think this is idea is cool or has some merit please do me a favor and share it so maybe one of your friends may be able to.

 

This is my dream, design and work.

I came up with this idea, I've drawn and designed it and right now that’s as far as it has gotten. I would love nothing more than to have this dream fully realized with a working prototype and video of how it works. But right now I don't have the resources and it is just a dream, and just a design. I want to put in the hard work and bring to you the fully functioning product. Once my goal is reached I will love to share my work.

Thank you so much for your time! Thank you so much for your support!

story:
Short Summary

Hello, we are Robby Erskine, Bobby Schmitt, and Jack Clare. We are three Bellarmine University students with the passion to invent something that matters. We first started our partnership by contemplating problems in our everyday lives. We arrived at the issue of texting and driving and how so many people get injured or even die from it every year. We wanted to come up with a way to 100% guarantee that people would not use their phones while behind the wheel. We came up with a way to guarantee this; make a phone case that holds your car key. This way your key along with your phone is required in the engine to start the car.


The Drive Safe Case could change the world, if widely accepted it could completely eliminate texting and driving.  In order to make the Drive Safe Case a world known phone case we need your help.

What We Need & What You Get

If we receive funding we will have plenty of things to put it towards. We will first develop multiple plastic molds of the product and have potential customers test them out to see which is preferred. Once we purchase the materials required to make them and start producing the product we will have to partner with a company to help us manufacture our product. The Drive Safe Case will do more than just prevent the use of your phone while driving. The case will be as sturdy as an Otterbox while also eliminating the need for a key chain. We will also look into developing other products such as wallet cases that will still function as a key holder as well.


If we do not get funded we still hope to develop a product. Without the funds it would make the process much more difficult as fundraising would be required. Ultimately we need you and your donation to get our product to the market as quickly as possible so it can begin saving lives!

The Need For the Drive Safe Case


Texting and driving is a growing trend among young adults that needs to be put to a stop. The act of glancing at your phone for just a quick glance may seem harmless, but according to the Virginia Tech Highway Safety Association, texting takes your eyes off the road for approximately 4.6 seconds. That is long enough to travel an entire football field when going 55 MPH. There are laws in nearly all states prohibiting texting while driving. The Drive Safe Case gives our customer a 100% guarantee that their eyes will be on the road 100% of the time.
